116a2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag/ chos kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par gyur te/ chos kyi snang ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyi chos bstan pa yang mngon du gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yang nye bar
116a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ smon lam gyi rgyun ji lta bu 'dod pa yang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi rang bzhin zab mo mtshan ma med pa dag ming dang mtshan mar brjod pas/ ston
116a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad pa la ltos/ chos kyi rang bzhin brjod cing lta ba rnam par dag pa sbyong bar mdzad kyang / 'di la cung zad kyang ston ba med do// ston par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med do// kun
116a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo chos kyi sgo 'di ni ye shes tshad med pa yang dag par rtsom pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang / mi skye ba'i chos rab tu rtogs
116a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pa skyes la/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang / byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// kun dga' ngo gang dag 'di la sems dang po bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
116a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ bskal ba grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / spobs
116a8(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas pa nyid la yang nges pa 'gyur bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dag bkye ste
116b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer nges kyang 'jig rter gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi le'u 'di thos
116b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// thos nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongasasu smin par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs meng bdag gi sems can rnams kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
116b3(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to// lha'i me tog go char yang dang par gyur to// 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / 'di skad du sems
116b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par gyur cig ces tshig tu smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mtha' yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
116b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas gzungs kyi rgyal po ngaHna ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ spobs pa tshang med pa zhes bya bar
116b6(dkon brtsegs): yang zung shig/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya spyod pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ spobs pa mtha' yas 'di ni don thams cad yang dag par sdud pa
116b7(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo yin te/ nges na chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sgo 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tsom thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni nga'i rjesu ston pa yin// 
116b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog kha dog sna lnga pas mngon par gtor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 
117a1(dkon brtsegs): / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / wa dang dri za dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod / 
117a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// 
117a3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le ru stong phrag pa las le'u gsum pa/ lagan rdo rjes nus pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ 
117a4(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ta thAg ta ma cing t+ya gu h+ya ni de sha nA ma ma hA yAn su tra/ ngong skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi
117a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ dam dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cadal phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ma
117a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod daphung po'i ril/ dge slong ba ni khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa/ 
117a7(dkon brtsegs): phal cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba ni stong dang skabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bzod pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
117a8(dkon brtsegs): gzus thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thong ba/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ phyogs bcu mtha' las pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mangs pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ pas
117b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa'i bsgrub pa shes pa/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa
117b2(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par rab tu zhugs pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur la rab tu bsngags pa/ bskal pa bye ba
117b3(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par byang chub kyi lam mtha' yas pa/ mthar gtugs pa/ sems sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mtshungs pa/ na mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa'i byams pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la
117b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa chags pa'i gnas sgrib pa dang chong pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ mthu bo che 'i lus thob pa/ rdo rje ltar sra ning mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 
117b5(dkon brtsegs): sang+ka'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'jigs pa med par mkhas pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma mogamog bor byed pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum
117b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa ye shes kyis ston pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la zhugs pas rtag pa dang / chad par lta ba'i mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa/ bsam
117b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mnyam par gnag pa dang / ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ dam pa'i chos dngon
117b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad par byed pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
118a1(dkon brtsegs): / dpa' zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i tog dang / ri bong can gyi tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / dpal brtsegs dang / dpal sbas dang / mthu bo che dang / klu dag dang / klu'i
118a2(dkon brtsegs): bla ma dang / klu'i byin dang / gzugs 'dzin dang / mya ngan gyi lha dang / yon tan sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na sgron ma dang / rtag tu lag 'deg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / lag na phyag rgyar rin po che dang / lag
118a3(dkon brtsegs): na rin po che dang / kun tu snang dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros chen po dang / rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gsum
118a4(dkon brtsegs): u bar gnon dang / mtha' las rnam par gnon dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / nor gyi blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 
118a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / rtag tu mos dang / rtag tu dgod cing rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med
118a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gzi brjid 'chang ba dang / brtson 'grus 'bar dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rtag par lha dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / na mkha'i
118a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzod dang / mi 'dzums pa dang / brjod med dang / rin chen dam pa dang / rin chen sems pa dang / legs par rnam par sems pa dang / don legs par rnam par bsams pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i blo
118a8(dkon brtsegs): gros dang / gzus kyi dang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / zhing yang dag par brgyan pa dang / rin chen 'chung gnas dang / bug sbas dang / dbang po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / 
118b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs 'dran pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lag bzangs dang / mig bzangs dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ngal glang pos kyi glang po che dang / seng ge'i
118b2(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / don grub blo gros dang / kha lo sgyur dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba ni stong dang / gang dag stong
118b3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za'i dngang
118b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ namanga' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dbang che bar grags pa yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus
118b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / chu lha dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / gser mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas dang / 
118b6(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong phrag mang po bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen dkur
118b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / thags zangs ris dang / lag bzangs dang / sa la dang / tal dang / bde mchog
118b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sim dang / che rang dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gzhan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong mang po/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
119a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / phyag byung dang / mchong ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya dang / chos mnya par phyir/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ 
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi gnyen dang / 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de ma yin pa
119a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'khor bani po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos
119a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa'i phyir 'khod de/ de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// sarba na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ros kyi lha'i bu rnams
119a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag byang dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan ba'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan pa
119a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba yongasu bskang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di
119a7(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
119a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
119b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong
119b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni/ spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad
119b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa ri ye shes su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni/ sems las su
119b4(dkon brtsegs): rung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong ga tshogs ni 'ocom dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chu rab sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni ni 'gras pa med pa
119b5(dkon brtsegs): sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par
119b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
119b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'thung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs ni/ byas pa'i las chung ma
119b8(dkon brtsegs): za bar 'gyur ro// dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dran
120a1(dkon brtsegs): banye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong nga'i tshogs ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / 
120a2(dkon brtsegs): dge nga'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes
120a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// stobs lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzingar 'gyur ro// byang chub yan lag gi tshogs ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad
120a4(dkon brtsegs): las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bden pa'i tshogs ni mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro// so so yang dag pa ra rig pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par
120a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// ston pa'i tshogs ni gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro// bsam pa
120a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i tshogs ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// nang du
120a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni ji skad thos pa'i chos chud mi gzon par ra gyur ro// sdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni
120a8(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par 'gyur ro// bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i
120b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs mi/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
120b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs brgyad par bshad de/ tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo sdu ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas
120b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bgyi
120b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshang pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag 'ang
120b5(dkon brtsegs): skam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nan/ kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi nang du 'dus shing rjes
120b6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs ni rnam par bsgrub pa thams cad rnam par sgrub bo// ye shes kyi cho ga
120b7(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshogs la
120b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// ye shes
121a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs kyis ri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis ri lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so// byang chub sems
121a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lam la gnas pa ni bdud sdig can gyis thul bar dka'o// bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ phyir
121a3(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad ston te mi 'chab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
121a4(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zha 'bring ba nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/ gsang da pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas gang nyan thos dang / 
121a5(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can tha ma lnga smos kyang ci dgos pa la brtsoms te/ khyod spongs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i
121a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
121a7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa dang / de bzhin
121a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spro bar mdzad du gsol// de skad ces
121b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan
121b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dod de/ khyod la ngas bskul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la rtsoms te/ 'khor 'dis spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
121b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhir gshegs pa'i
121b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang nga rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi tsam zhig bstan pa/ bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang lha sde dper bgyi na mtshan mo mu pa pun nag na mar me'i mthus
121b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad ganga' ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i gas
121b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'dug par bgyi ba tsam bstan par bgyi'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba
121b7(dkon brtsegs): rngo gros la 'di skad du ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'irigs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams thong nas mi sngangs mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur
121b8(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'khor legs par 'khod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas
122a1(dkon brtsegs): dpam kyi mi byung ba ni gsus te/ ban ga na/ 'an ne/ las bams kyis khyab ba dang / klung ras kyis mi nyung ba dang / bamam gtan papa ma rtsom mi khyang ba
122a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yang grogs po dag gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkod do// bas
122a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa 'ang ba ni'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so// grogs po dag de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam/ 
122a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyad pa thob nas/ mi sdang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang / dngang dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher bskyed par bya'o// de nas byang chub
122a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ ji ltarathams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsang ba nyan pa la mos par gyur cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
122a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smra so// zhi ba'i blo gros de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gang
122a8(dkon brtsegs): chun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ de tshun chad
122b1(dkon brtsegs): zadung chung sems dpa'i na 'bring na 'dugar/ byang chung sems dpa'i lus 'gyur ba'am/ lus tshul 'chos pa/ khabs nam yang ma mthong ngo // ngag 'gyur ba'am/ ngag gi kha gas ga kyang mthos
122b2(dkon brtsegs): sengar 'gyur ba'am/ sems g.yong yang ma mthong ngo // de lus dang lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ tshig tu mi smra'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
122b3(dkon brtsegs): / dab lus kyi srung la mamatha' las su med par snang rje/ napa'i dugros sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi srung lamang na / byang chung sems dang bum kyi skyong las yang de nga du lhun gyis grus
122b4(dkon brtsegs): cing rmil pa med par gnas so// 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi ngas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ bsam gtan gyi sgo dang lam ston to// rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kyis
122b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i dbyangs kye spyod lam dang / khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khye'u yi spyod lam dang bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
122b6(dkon brtsegs): la bu mo'i spyod lam dang / bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bud med kyi spyod lam dang / skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod lam dang / gzhon nus
122b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gzhon nuri spyod lam dang / bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar ma'i spyod lam dang / rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang / 
122b8(dkon brtsegs): yan lag ma tshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i spyod lam dang / gdol pa rkang lag chad pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lam dang / 
123a1(dkon brtsegs): mug pa dang / 'a ba 'phru ma ca dngas la/ mug pa nga 'bye che zung lam dang / ma 'a sa 'du ba semasaca rnams la/ yang da
123a2(dkon brtsegs): nga ya / sems can bral ba pa ga rgyas kyis du ba'i semasas sa la/ sems cand dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi byung lam dang / ru chu stegs dang / gci ma tsham mas
123a3(dkon brtsegs): ngos 'dus ba'i sems cad rams dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig sa dang / ma spyod lam dang / lngas 'dul ba'i sems can dmas la// lha'i spyod lam dang / kU dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
123a4(dkon brtsegs): d+hi dang / lham son dang / mamakha' lding dang / mi 'amadang / lto 'phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dang / gnad sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mtha
123a5(dkon brtsegs): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang / brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ @byi gyis spyong lam dang / tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can
123a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang / 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang / 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod
123a7(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong gi spyod lam dang / dge slong mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems
123a8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge bsnyen ma'i spyod lam dang / nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi spyod lam dang / 
123b1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'as 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang / de bzhin gshegs
123b2(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gzugs med pa ni ma gtog so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa
123b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing / yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog cing / btang
123b4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam sngon mod kyi/ lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o// lus kyis lus kyi la sa byed mod kyi lus kyi dben pa yang mi 'dor ro// de lus yongasu
123b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed do// lus la mi lta bas sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dong ba/ 
123b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gi lus las de dag bstan nas/ bdag srog dang bral te sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do// khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do// rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par
123b7(dkon brtsegs): byed do// gzi byin za ba rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed do// ni ba'i blo gros de ltar sha ri longs spyad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gdag gis lus las bslabs te/ srog dang bral nas sems can de dag la
123b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par byed do// de'i lus tshad ming ba ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do// de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi zad pa mngon par
124a1(dkon brtsegs): rlub bas rab tu rig par 'gyur ro// de lus kyis sems can rnams yong su smin par byed de/ gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa/ sdug pa'i rnang pa dang / mtsha mar 'ja
124a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ bsun sdug pa stor te/ de la sems can de dag chags pa skyed nas/ thugs shing kun tu byugs te/ de dag pang du 'jog go/ 
124a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag skyes bu de dag gi bang du son pa dang / rnyis shing skams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do// mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas/ skyes bu de dag nges yid byung nas bor te/ song ba dang / shi ba'i ro de dag
124a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid las skyes bu de dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ralas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstad pa/ des bu 'brung // yang zhi nga'i rngo gros byang chub sems dpa'ade slong gsum gyi
124a5(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te/ sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'bru la bya ba bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khengs par byed do// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lag pa'i
124a6(dkon brtsegs): sor mos g.yogs kyang / de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de lus kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing rim gro byed de/ me tog gdugs ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo// de bzhi dag rtse
124a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi skom bu dag kyang mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ de song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i
124a8(dkon brtsegs): snod gcig tu mos te/ ri rab tsam gyi snying po 'ber bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin
124b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te mar me 'bung ngo // de 'bar bar gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
124b2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur te/ sems can dag gis kyang mthong zhing shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa de mthong nas kyang / sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
124b3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do// nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la yang bdag gi gzugs chen po che chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te/ der sem
124b4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrag nas/ byang chub sems dang / 'di la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tshalo// de la chos kyang nyan par 'dod do// gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod can
124b5(dkon brtsegs): po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa der yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi lus chen bro shi zhing dus las 'das par ston te/ der yang sems can
124b6(dkon brtsegs): dud 'gro skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ji tsam 'dod par sha la zos nas/ tshe'i mthar phyin te/ 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing / shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o// de yang de dag gi
124b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du rgyur 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ shi ba'i lus la sems can gang
124b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi zos pa de dag nyid la mtho ris su skye ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa grub/ 'dod pa
125a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grub/ smon pa 'grung bo// ni ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'di'i ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung
125a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa nam mkhas bskor ba/ 'di nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste/ de na grong dang tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po dang / srog
125a3(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/ der sems can dag nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur na/ phal
125a4(dkon brtsegs): cher lus shub can dang / lus rnags pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpal dang / thor bu dang / rlung dang / ma bris pa dang / bang kan gyi nad kyis rgyas par gyur to// de'i
125a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma/ sems can de dag gi nang de zhi bar bya/ ba'i phyir/ brtson par gyur kyang / sems can de dag gi/ nang de bsal bar ma nuso// der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i
125a6(dkon brtsegs): dpyad ma rnyed de/ skabs med rten med nas 'di skad du// nad 'di las ni thar byed pa/ lha 'am klu 'am dri za 'am// gnod sbyin dang na mo yang rung / mi ma yin pa su zhig yod// sdug bsngal 'di las
125a7(dkon brtsegs): thar byed pa// de la nor rnams thams cad gtang // rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bya// byas bdag kyang gzo bar bya// zhes khu tsho cher 'don to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di/ 
125a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs shes bya bar gyur te/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas sems can de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa yang mthong / 
125b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas/ ku co chen po 'don pa'i sgra yang thos so// des de dag mthong zhing thos kyang snying rje chen po bskyed de// de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gi
125b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// skyabs med pa dang / rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ des de ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod
125b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu srog chags nges pa zhes bya bar rdzus te skyes nas/ steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba/ ku ru'i grong
125b4(dkon brtsegs): khyer nye ban// srog chags nges pa shes bya yod// de li sha la su zos pa// de ni nad las thar bar 'gyur// 'jigs bar ma byed skrag par ma byed par// ji ltar 'dod pa de li sha long
125b5(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'di ni sman yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / tshong dus
125b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji snyed pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags nges pa'i
125b7(dkon brtsegs): lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ nges pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur shes zad par mi 'gyur ba/ 
125b8(dkon brtsegs): bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha/ 'dir ni nams kyang zad par ma gyur cig/ ni ba'i blo gros de ltar phyogs bzhi'i sems can nang pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gi srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i lus la
126a1(dkon brtsegs): sha ba cad cing bcang cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba'am/ gang bar yang mi mngon te/ yang bcad yang bcad kyang byir skye bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de sar sems can ji snyed kyis srog
126a2(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag/ zos mthag tA nad thams cad ni bar gyur te/ nad med cing bde ba dang / nyams pa med par gyur to// de nas mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi nang tham
126a3(dkon brtsegs): cad bsal bar gyur to// zhi nga'i blo gros de nas 'dzam bu gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag 'di snyam du sems te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa des/ bdag cag nad las yongs su
126a4(dkon brtsegs): thar cing / nad med par byas te bde zhing 'gyur ba med par byas kyis/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas shig bya'o// snyam nas/ de nas thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chags kyi
126a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa nges pa ga la der songs nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs// khyod ni bdag cag sman pa sman/ 
126a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba// khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol cig/ de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag gi brgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po
126a7(dkon brtsegs): de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa// nga la nor dang zas skom dang // gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med// thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni// dge ba bcu yi las lam bsrungs// sems can kunar la pan/ 
126a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'abyor// byang chub sna ni lam bstan pa thog/ phan pa'i ngos pa nyid kyi sems// gcig la gcig kyang byams pabyed// brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos// sems can dag bang pa' rtse// shis
126b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa yi// dge ba ru yi las lar blangs// zhi nga'i blo gros de tshun chad 'jam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo do snyed las tha na sems cad gcig kyang / 
126b2(dkon brtsegs): log par ltung bar song bar mi dran no// de tshur cad de dag thams cad shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas kyang / bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ de dag
126b3(dkon brtsegs): yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod nas/ de la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
126b4(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed ngo // kha cig ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yong
126b5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa ste/ de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas ni sems/ can tshad med grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so// gzhan yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems
126b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni nga'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mi shig pa/ srang brtad pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ rdzus te skye ba ste/ lus de ni 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can
126b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jig go// lus mi 'jigs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dang gi phyir thams cad du thams cad du mi 'jig ste/ mes mi tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs
126b8(dkon brtsegs): shing dngos rdo rje la sra ning brtan te mi shigs pa'o// ni ba'i blo gros de lur byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems can longasu smin par byed kyang / byang chub sems dnga' mi sems mi rtog ste/ lus la lus
127a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so// lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid sheso// lus kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben
127a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyis su mi byed de/ lus kyi dper ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su 'jug go// de rang gi lus
127a3(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dben par byed do// de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / 
127a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid du sheso// chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i ma tshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rjes
127a5(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid sheso// sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid sheso/ 
127a6(dkon brtsegs): de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid sheso// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid sheso// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa
127a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
127a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do// phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun tu nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par rtsa ba'i de bzhin nyid do// 
127b1(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i
127b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid do// mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni/ de kho na nyid dang / de lta bu nyid dang / 
127b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / mi 'byung ba nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de// gzugs med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces
127b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ gzu gas thams cad kyang gzugs med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de bzhir nyid
127b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs su mi byed do// de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang stor te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'a khrugs par mi byed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de bzhin
127b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis/ bdag gi lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go// lus ri shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas na/ lus thams cad ni lus med pa
127b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mthong ngo // lus thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rab tu sheso// shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo// de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas/ chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te/ phung po dang / 
127b8(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / skye bached kyi lus ni ma yin no// de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas na/ mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// thos pa dang reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste
128a1(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ smad pa'i rgyal ngo 'tsho byed kyis kyi thams cad bsdus te/ chu'i shing mang po las du ma ro gzugs pazang zhing mnges pa balngar sdug pa legs par byas te/ legs par zin cing legs par
128a2(dkon brtsegs): byi dor byas pa de 'ong ngam/ 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// der nad pa gang btsun pa btsun pa rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ tshong
128a3(dkon brtsegs): dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ blon po 'am/ rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ sman gyi bu de dang sprad nas/ de dag phrang ma thag tu nad thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde la nyams par 'gyuraro// 
128a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros gang sman pa gzhan la med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi 'jig rten gyi nang gso ba'i shes pa la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yang sems can bung
128a5(dkon brtsegs): med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang / dang / gti mug gis yong su gdungs pa ji snyed pa dag gi lus la reg na reg ma thag tu/ de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyun chad
128a6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyuraro// lus yongs su gdungs pa dang bral ba yang shes so// de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di'ang byang chu
128a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin/ khams kyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de zas
128a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o// nges zas za yang ming ba ma yin/ za'ang khong du 'jug par mi byed do// chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams/ yongs su mi
128b1(dkon brtsegs): nyam so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang 'byung ba med kyang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba dang / 'chi pho dang 'byung ba yang ston to// de 'chi 'pho yang
128b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu sheso// 'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu sheso// skye yang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu sheso// de chos kyi sku dang ldan// 
128b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi zas dang ldan/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing / chos la rton pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam pa'i sku/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam nga'i sku/ 'jig rten
128b4(dkon brtsegs): gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku/ dpe med pa// 'dra da med pa/ dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i
128b5(dkon brtsegs): sku/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma skye sa pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel pa'i sku/ sgyu ma dang / 
128b6(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu dang / chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la nges par brtags pa'i sku/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i na mkha' khyab pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i
128b7(dkon brtsegs): sku/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i sku/ 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku/ mi g.yo zhing rlom sems med pa'i sku/ gnas pa dang mi gnas pa dang / mi g.yong thod pa'i sku/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma
128b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i sku/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/ sa'i khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chu'i khams kyis ma yin/ me'i khams kyis ma yin/ rlung gi khams
129a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyis kyang rabang bye ba ma yin te/ ma byung ba kun nas ma byung ba'o// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu bye ma yin pa'o// 'byung ba ma yin te/ 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten
129a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o// mig las ma byung ba'o// rna ba la mi gnas pa'o// snas shwe pa bya ba ma yin pa'o// lces rab tu ma bye ba'o// lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o// nye bar spyad pa ma yin pa'o// sems dang mi 'jug
129a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi 'jug mi ldog rje su mi 'jug pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni de 'dra'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'as de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas/ byang chub
129a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod cing / stong gsum gyi da stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling bani pa yang rung / 'dzam bu gling yang rung / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
129a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor dang / pho drang 'khor ji snyed yong pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar yang byed la/ bdud thams cad kyi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de mthong bar yang byed la mthong
129a6(dkon brtsegs): bar sdang ba'ang med do// mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar snang ngo // mthong ba dang thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba yang ma yin no// sems can yongasu smin par bya bas/ rab tu phye
129a7(dkon brtsegs): yin yang lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongasu mi nyams so// de lus mi rtag pa dang / lus sdug bsngal ba dang / lus bdag med par yang sems can rnams la ston la// lus
129a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu sheso// de lus rab tu dbye ba yang sems can rnams la ston la/ rgyu gang dang dmigs pa gang dag gis lus mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa po
129b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / tshor nga po med par yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // lus rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang / lam dang mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes so// de lus kyi las yongasu dag par yang sems can rnams la ston te/ zhi ba'i blo gros
129b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs mar me mdzad tshun chad/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongasu dag
129b3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa brgyad stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par
129b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshang med bsam gyis mi khyab bo// nges pa ri le ru ste dang po 'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa
129b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// bam po ba nges pa/ gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smraso// 
129b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i
129b7(dkon brtsegs): rangs ji snyed par sgra la 'jug par yang de snyed do// sems can de dag gi sgra brjod par dang / tshig gi lam brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda' dang / smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / mtshan ma dang spyod pa dang / 
129b8(dkon brtsegs): bdeng dang sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ tha na srin bu dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang ma dang / bye ma
130a1(dkon brtsegs): led kyi sgra dag la yang ye shes mthong ba 'jug/ sgra'i rnam par rig pa sgrags pa ji lta bus/ sems can de dag gi lus shin tu sbyangs pa/ sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra
130a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rig pa bsgrag pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo // 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ji ltar sems can tha ma gang yang med// de ltar skyes pa'i rangs de dpag tu med/ 
130a3(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa ngabargya snyed bshad kyang mtha' ma med// bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya// skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che nga'i tshig/ sems dang bsam pa rgya chen rang ston pa// nam pa' lta bur gang med bri me dang // 'on
130a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang dpe don ldan pa bshad par bya// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / ngaH byin gyis sgra skad du 'byinang dang / 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin
130a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam/ mnga' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi slas/ da du 'byin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa
130a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi ma smad tshig/ gang ba med cing bri med namakha' bzhin// sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan
130a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dag/ de dag brjod pa rnams la nan tan nyon// byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang // dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rang bshad de// tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung nas// legs bshad des ni tshangs pa
130a8(dkon brtsegs): tshim par byed// gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid 'ong sgra// de dag de'i sgra brjod zil gyis non// rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni// chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dang ga meng 'byung // mi 'am ci'i sgra dag gang yod pa
130b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas de'i sgra mchog phun sum tshogs// de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de// de'i tshig gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pa// rol mo'i sgra dang lnga'i sgra mang po// chos kyi don 'byor
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dge bar ldan pa yi// de yi tshig gis kun tu tshim par byed// mi yi 'dren pa yi ni tshig thos nas// 'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi// gti mug g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa ni// don rnams gtan la phebs shing the tsom
130b3(dkon brtsegs): med// gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang gnas pa// de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed// mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces byang chub tshol// klu dang dri za lto 'phye che rnams
130b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas/ yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa// thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed// 2dzam gling 'di na tha dad phyogs rnamasu// kun na sgra skad mtha'
130b5(dkon brtsegs): yas gyur mod kyi// de'i skad kyi rnam pa bsgrags gyur na// de thos mi rnams thar pa rjesu 'thob// sa bla'i lha dang de bzhin par snang lha// de dag sgra skang 'jug pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar de la de yi sgra yang
130b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug/ rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o// ngang pa khrung khrung ka la ring ka dang // rma byan mo khu byug shang shang te'u// ri skegs dang ni ngur ba kun la kun// ji lta'i skad kyis nges ni tshim par byed// stag dang se
130b7(dkon brtsegs): ge de bzhin dom dang spre ru// gzig dang byi la ri dgas glang chen bse// rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun// ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed/ gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa// rkang mngangs dang ni
130b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rkang med rnams// bskal dang chad pas gcad dang pan gdags phyir// kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug/ sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na// rang ngam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma 'am// dmyal
131a1(dkon brtsegs): bdung 'phrog shin rje'i 'ag rten dang // lha mi rnams dang de di nang kyang 'thun// ji ltar rigs par byed paston kyang ni// mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med// mtshar ma med cing 'dzin
131a2(dkon brtsegs): med 'ching ba med// mnyam par gzhag pas sems ni 'khrug pa med// dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na yang // de la 'ang dang sems 'dzin med par ni// bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong du yang // gang+gA'i bye snyed
131a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyis go bar byed// stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci long ba// de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra thos nas/ chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor tu// thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud bar byed// sems
131a4(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag rab tu sgra 'dod dang // nga rgyal zil non su la'ang mi 'dud pa// de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas// thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed// 'on pa glen pa dag dang lce med
131a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // rig pa rnams dang gang dag skad 'dzer ba// de dag de yi re/ gas smras snyan thos nas// sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par byed// nyon mongs gdus shing nyon mongs gzing ba dang // nyes
131a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris pa rnams// de dag de yi dge tshig dag thos nas// 'gyod pa btul bar gyur cing bsil bar gyur// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra// mi rtag sgra thos nas ni sems can
131a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams// sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros rtsom par byed// sangs rgyas dbyangs dang mar med gang gnas pa// mtha' yas dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes
131a8(dkon brtsegs): cam/ de dag rnams kyi yon tan thams cad ni// bskal pa bye mang brjod kyang zab mi nus// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni chags pa 'am/ sdang ba'am/ rmongs pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ thogs
131b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/ nye bar thogs pa 'am/ dman pa 'am/ rab tu dman pa 'am/ brlang ba 'am/ zher 'debs pa 'am/ mi rdzogs pa 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ rjesu chags pa 'am/ khong khro ba 'am/ byang rgyal lam/ bgal
131b2(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba 'am/ 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs bag la nyal ba 'am/ mi brtan pa 'am/ gtsam pa 'am/ khengs pa 'am/ 'gying ba 'am/ myur ba 'am/ dus ma yin par smra ba 'am/ 
131b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dong ba dang ldan pa 'am/ sdug pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par che ba 'am/ shin tu chags pa 'am/ rab tu lhod pa 'am/ rab tu bsngangs pa 'am/ rab tu dal ba'am/ dbang po nyams pa 'am/ 
131b4(dkon brtsegs): gangangs nyams pa 'am/ sems nyams pa'am/ yo ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ mi gsal ba 'am/ skad sub sub po 'am/ ngor byas te/ smra ba 'am/ 'gal bar smra ba 'am/ glags pa 'am/ 'byung ngam
131b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa 'am/ gshe bar byed pa'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyurar ba 'am/ bdag dang pha rol gdung bar byed pa 'am/ tshig blang bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa ma yin
131b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ tshig dang ba ma yin pa 'am/ rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa 'am/ 'byor nga'i tshig ma yin pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig gam/ yang dag nga ma yin pa'i tshig gam/ gnogs 'drid zer ba 'am/ chos dang mi
131b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ 'gal ba 'am/ gnod pa'am/ dus las yol ba 'am/ tshong las 'das pa 'am/ lung bstan pa la thogs pa 'am/ tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsag dang ldan pa 'am/ rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod
131b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig gam/ 'byung ba ma yin pa ston pa 'am/ mig 'khrul par 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ som nyi'i tshig gam/ sdug par byed pa'i tshig gam/ mi sdug cing gnang du 'bebs pa'i tshig ma/ 
132a1(dkon brtsegs): khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gam/ rang gi phyogs bsten pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi phyogs tshar gcad ba'i tshig gam/ bdag stod pa la rjesu chags pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi bstod pa la rab tu gcod par
132a2(dkon brtsegs): smra ba 'am/ thing spang dang / gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig gam/ gzhan la rab tu rom pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba ma yin pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ gsang rdol ba'i tshig gam/ ngag bsrung ba ma yin
132a3(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshig gam/ mkhas pas smang ba'i tshig gam/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ klang 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ ngor mngon sum du bstod pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa dus ma yin par
132a4(dkon brtsegs): gleng ba'i tshig gam/ zug rngus gnang du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ ga/ zhan gyi nyes pa kun rjod pa'i tshig gam/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed pa'i tshig gam/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brdar spyod pa'i
132a5(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ rje su 'thun pa ma yin pa'i tshig mi 'byin to// zhi ba'i blo gros yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs
132a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas bden pari rje su 'brang ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no// gal te de shing drung na 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ nyal yang rung / la la
132a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'ongs nas/ kye skyes bu shing ljon pa 'di la mngab ma ji snyed cig ces zer na/ de shing ljon pa de la yang mi lta/ mdab ma la yang mi 'grang bar shing ljon pa de la mngab ma ji snyed yod pa de bzhin du mi nyung mi mang bar
132a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ngo // yang gang ga'i bye ma'i 'bru de brgya phrag ji snyed cig yod// stong phrag ji snyed cig yod// 'bum phrag ji snyed yod/ bye ba phrag ji snyed cig yod/ 
132b1(dkon brtsegs): ther 'bum phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khrag khrig phrag ji snyed cig yod/ dkrigs brag ni ji snyed cig yod/ gtam phrag ji snyed cig yod/ khyad phyin ji snyed cig yod/ mi 'khrugs pa ji snyed cig yod/ dpag tu
132b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa ji snyed cig yod/ grangs med pa ji snyed cig yod/ gtan pa ji snyed cig yod/ phyin byed phrag ji snyed cig yod/ stobs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ glang po'i stongs phrag ji snyed cig yod/ bgrang ba
132b3(dkon brtsegs): drag ji snyed cig yod ces 'dri na/ de bye ma de dag la yang mi lha mi 'grang bar bye ma'i 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa bzhin du 'di snyed cig go zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i ngag 'byung ste/ bye ma de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
132b4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis 'di snyed cig yod do zhes mkhyen pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mngon sum du gyur pa ma gtogs par lha 'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ rlung lnga
132b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ namakha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ nyan no sa sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum ni ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon
132b6(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i dus na bram ze sngo sangs bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo // yang de'i dus na shing n+ya gro nga'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba yug dang 'dab ma mang po yod pa/ khor lug tu
132b7(dkon brtsegs): tshang rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/ der drang srong snang ba de gnaso// de na gnas pa'i tshe nges mngon par shes pa'i spobs kyi/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po bzang po de'i yal ga grangs su yod pa/ lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyi
132b8(dkon brtsegs): bar du bgrangs te rtogs par byas shes par byaso// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ bram ze sngo bsang zhes bya grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te/ nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/ 
133a1(dkon brtsegs): nges zas kyi bya ba byas te/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/ mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te/ phyogs
133a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug/ de nas drang srong snang ba zhes bya bas bram ze sngo bsangs shes bya ba la 'di skad smraso// kye bram ze mi'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na gang shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod pa brtsi ba 'am/ 
133a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par byed pa 'am/ shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa mchi so// drang srong gis smras pa/ bram ze de gang yin bram zes smras pa/ btsun pa bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o// 
133a4(dkon brtsegs): drang srong gis smras pa/ kye bram ze de'i phyir grongs shig/ de nas bra ma ze sngo sangs de shing ljon pa de la yang mi lta/ 'dang ma rnams la yang mi 'grang bar skad cig la 'dab ma rtogs pa la zhugs nas/ de'i tshe
133a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag smras so// mi 'khrugs drug bcu stong brag bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag/ bcu gsum dag dang / dkrigs pa phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig brag/ bcu dgu
133a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu dang ni ther 'bum phrag/ brgyad spong dang yang bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis/ bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal// de skang thos nas sngo sangs la// snang bas
133a7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa bram ze'i mchog/ khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smras pa// legaso legaso 'di bden no// lo ni khyud khor bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma bdun du mngon shes kyis// 'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs/ 
133a8(dkon brtsegs): gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen/ khyod ni gzigs pa mi mdzad cing // bgrang ba mi mdzad skad cig tu// mngab na rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs// mkhyen 'di nyid kyi'am lha yis bsan// bram ze bdag la don 'dig / 
133b1(dkon brtsegs): sngo sangs kyis smras pa/ kye btsun pa gson zhig/ 'di ni lha yis spras pir mi yi ste// bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/ nam pa' zang par grum par 'gyur srid kyi// kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi srid do// snang bar
133b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shA ri'i bu// bram ze sngo sangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra// bden la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
133b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams ngag yong su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dag gi gsang ba dang / ngag yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par zad kyi/ de bas gong du bstan na byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yong su dag pa zang zin
133b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// gnad yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' di bi'i blo ma
133b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smraso// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dang sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongasu dag pa gang zhe na/ ni nga'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyis
133b6(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed do// mngon par shes pa las kyang mnyams la/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang byed do// mngon par shes pas kyang rnam par rtsel bya ba thams
133b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang ston to// mngon par shes pa la yang gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la yang gan so// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni ye shes kyi rnams pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa
133b8(dkon brtsegs): de ni shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa ste/ thams cad kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs thams cad
134a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir/ gzugs thams cad mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sngor gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgra thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'o// 
134a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la lba ba dang / sems kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog cing blta ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni bskal ba mtha' yas pa rjesu dran pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' ngang
134a3(dkon brtsegs): byi mtha' yong su ma chang ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon du gyur cing / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa zad pa'i
134a4(dkon brtsegs): rjesu 'thun pa dang / dus la lta zhing dus las mi yol ba'o// de dag gi/ mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 'phags pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'o// de dag gi mngon
134a5(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtog/ sa par dka' ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni don zab cing bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa
134a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub kyi snying po sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mchog yin no// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang 'thun pa'o// de dag gi mngon par
134a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir/ dbang bskur ba thob pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sem
134a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems yongs su dag pa de nyon mongs pa med cing yongasu byang ba/ 'od gsal ba lta/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang rab tu dul ba dang / legs par sbyangs pas/ ngasam
134b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog kyang / shin tu zad pa dang / mi skye ba nyid du lhung nga yang ma yin na/ bsams bzhin du yang 'dir skye la 'dod pa'i khams na 'khrug
134b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yang med/ bcings bzhin du skye ba yang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'bo nga yang ma yin/ 'acings bzhin du 'byung ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las grol ba'o// kun nas nyon
134b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o// byin ci log tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa las grol ba'o// des na grol bzhin du skye'o// grol bzhin du 'chi 'ba'o// grol bzhi du 'byung ngo // de skye yang theg pa chen po las nyams pa
134b4(dkon brtsegs): med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis kyang phun sum tshogs so// phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongasu tshol yang me/ steng mi dmig so// de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang chos thams cad kyang
134b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi cho su rtog so// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / chos thams cad kyang chos ma yin la/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin par khas len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ri kun tu
134b6(dkon brtsegs): btsal na yang mi rnyed ngo // mi dmig so// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal na mi rnyed cing mi dmigs pa de la ni dgrang ba gang yang med de// chos thams cad ni dgrang ba'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa'o// 
134b7(dkon brtsegs): gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni/ chos sam chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa med de/ mngon par zhen pa med pa ni chos rnams kyi don to// don la rlom semasu byed pa gang yin pa do na de'i gnod pa
134b8(dkon brtsegs): chen por 'gyur ro// gang yang rlom sems med pa la ni don tam/ don ma yin pa de'i mdun na mi 'dug go// don du mi lba ba'i blo ni gang du yang thogs pa med do// de ni blo thogs pa med pa'o// gang dro thogs pa med pa de'i
135a1(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med do// gang chags pa med nga de ni rgyud tshang ba med pa'o// gang rgyun chad pa med pa de ni nyams pa med pa'o// gang nyams pa med pa de'i brtsal bdon med ngar mi 'gyur ro// gang gi
135a2(dkon brtsegs): btsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ba de la skyon med do// gang la skyon med pa de la bdag gi ba med do// gang la bdag gi ba med pa de la yang yongs su 'dzin pa med do// gang la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la rtsod pa med ngo // gang
135a3(dkon brtsegs): la rtsod pa med pa de la 'gyed pa med do// gang la 'gyed pa med pa de ni mi rtsod pa ste/ dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gang dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa de namakha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'o// gang na mkha' dang
135a4(dkon brtsegs): lag mthil du mnyam pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtog sa/ gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin pa de la ni kha dog med/ 
135a5(dkon brtsegs): rtags med dbyibs med do// gang la kha dog med/ rtags med dbying sa med pa de ni de 'dra ba nyid rje su rtog so// de ci 'dra ba rjes su tshogs pa de 'dra ba nyid rab tu rtog so// ci'i phyir rje su rtogs pa
135a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la rjes su rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir rjesu rtogs pa dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros
135a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyigs pa'o// zhinga'i bru gros gnan yang byang chub sems dnga'i sems kyi gas pa ni gang byangs pa yang yinas bdag med pa nyid kyang min/ dring rje yang yin la sems can med panyid
135a8(dkon brtsegs): ma da ya nang gru me yang mangs pa kyang gang ba nga na/ rgyag sa pa pa se ma nga ba bya na/ rdum ma pa ma pa pag mam
135b1(dkon brtsegs): yang yin la sems mi zad pa nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la sems dben pa nyid kyang yin/ bsam gtan yang yin la sems nges par sems pa nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyang yin la rgyu med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 
135b2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang yin la dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams kyang yin la/ yang dag par sems mnyam par nyid kyang yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang
135b3(dkon brtsegs): yin la spros pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dad pa yang yin la chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la lhun gyis grub pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa yang yin la rang byung gi sems nyid kyang yin/ 
135b4(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyi dbang po yang yin la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dadabang po rnams kyang yin la chos thams cad la dbang po med pa'i mtshan
135b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ stobs rnams kyang yin la mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yin la/ blos rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ lam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin
135b6(dkon brtsegs): la bsgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ zhi gnas kyang yin la sems nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ lhag mthong yang yin la rjes su ma mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa yang yin la
135b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa yang yin la/ yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos yid la byed pa'ang yin la chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid
135b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin/ dge 'dun yid la byed pa yang yin la mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sems can yongasu smin par yang byed la bzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang yin la
136a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ning yongasu dag pa yang yin la/ sems namakha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang yin/ 
136a2(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang yin la/ ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ mtshan rab tu thob pa yang yid la/ mtshan med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub
136a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi snying po'i rgyan nyid kyang yin la khams gsum gyi snying po sems nyid kyang yin/ bdud tshar gcod pa'i yang yin la/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyang yin la chos thams
136a4(dkon brtsegs): tsang dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba lang yin la mi 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang sngon la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang
136a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni bzo da pa thod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yong su dag pa'o// sems dag pa des sems can
136a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems yong su dag par rtogs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang chub kyi sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no// byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar
136a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin no// ni ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// ni nga'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams
136a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye
136b1(dkon brtsegs): dgu'i srog chags las stong phrag bdun khri nyis stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 
136b2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgyad khri bani stong ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi
136b3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char mngon par dab bo// 
136b4(dkon brtsegs): ma skyong par sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra stong snyed rab tu grag par gyur te/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin
136b5(dkon brtsegs): cing mos par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni/ byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang
136b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o// sems can de dag ni
136b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la phan thogs par gyur ba yin te/ sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum
136b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la dka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod
137a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te/ 'di lta bu'i sgra byung bde su li mthu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ni ba'i blo gros 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams spring ldan
137a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba/ nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / 
137a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag la blta ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi
137a4(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dadapa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya de lus mi snang bar steng gi bA snang la gnas nas nga dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ 
137a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra yang rab tu byung nas/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dedang / las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad bka'
137a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ ring por ma lon par/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ zhes bya ba/ bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya skor ba byas nA/ 
137a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te/ gnod nga chung ngam/ 'am ngab
137a8(dkon brtsegs): nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes spyan gsol lo// yang bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba ba'i bdag pos bskur pa chen po 'di bstan
137b1(dkon brtsegs): to zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa 'thob par rdo thog lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka'
137b2(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod legs par 'ongaso// khyod 'dir 'ongs pa lag so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang nga'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro// sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa 'ongs
137b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gsangang ba'i bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji
137b4(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig la 'dis bsnyen bkur byas/ 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btang na/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems
137b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi nga'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya chen po tshang
137b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa brgyan pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
137b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhang su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin
137b8(dkon brtsegs): chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa de yang 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos
138a1(dkon brtsegs): gang ba/ lag mthil lhar mnyam 'gyur ba/ gsegs dang / gyo mo med pa/ chung ga der skyes pa yang 'jam pa gos ka tsa li ni ka ltar reg nang deng / rma bya'i mgrin pa lngar sngo zhing / gsung dru
138a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil bar gas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ gom pa bor na sor bani 'thur du dma' ba/ rkang pa bteg na sor ba ni gyen du mtho ba/ ha cang yang mi grangs ha cang yang mi tsha ba'i rlung / chung ngu
138a3(dkon brtsegs): bsil ba 'dod pa dang 'thun par ldang ba'o// sa chen po de yang de DUrA sngon pos brgyan pa'o// sems can de rnams kyang rnam par bzang ning mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur te/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug chung ba/ nyon
138a4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad chung ba/ legs par bshang ba'i don kun shes par byed nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das lo na tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gash+ye
138a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod/ do// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag sum cu cha gnyis yod do// de sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug
