159b1(dkon brtsegs): mos mchod pa// ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa// rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su gsol// slar yang zhing rab tu mchi bar bgyi// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus// bcom ldan 'das
159b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba nod kyi phung po'i rol gnas pa des/ gnas pacar mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol ba btab ba'i sgra de thos// thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skang
159b3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'dengs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkara' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ri mo'u dgal gyi bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ras rung phyogs logasu
159b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshar zhes bya bar/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ 
159b5(dkon brtsegs): de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod das/ gsol ba 'deb/ sa pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo // kun dgar ngos gsol pa/ brjor/ ldan 'das mo ru dgal gyi bu cher po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams
159b6(dkon brtsegs): der mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ngo mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di sngar 'ongs 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
159b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mchan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtar po'u dgal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'chal
159b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol btang pa mkhyen das/ mdzod spunas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung dgu gu cu dgu'i byes
160a1(dkon brtsegs): snyed po de dag las thal te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'ong zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyang bar gyur to// den thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges 'jig rten gyi khams 'ong zer gyi rgyal
160a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
160a3(dkon brtsegs): 'debs pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa lo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brel ste shog shig/ de nas gnas
160a4(dkon brtsegs): brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi da 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/ sems kyi rnam bar rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khabs ri mjed 'dir
160a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyad sngar byin nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ la na bdud skor ba byas nas/ spyar sngar yan lag lngas la gtugs te phyag
160a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal nas/ nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas/ de srid du ring du mchis pas
160a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag nongs pa can te/ nongs pa 'chag so// bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ji tsam pa de tsam lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ moru
160a8(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/ mo'u dgal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad ngam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems
160b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de ni nam mkha'i tshad ngam/ mtha' yongasu tshol bar sems pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo// gnas brtan mo 'u dgal
160b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshang pa na/ srog chags khris/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
160b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros gyis
160b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag/ yin pa de dag kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i
160b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba'am/ brtsi ba'am/ brtag par mi nus na/ sems can thams cad
160b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lha smos kyang ci dgos lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ ni ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i
160b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ji snyed par/ 'di lta ste sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du byung ste/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni
160b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog cing / btang snyoms pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong gsum sems can gang yin pa/ de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas// bskal par sems can gcig cig gis
161a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang // nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes// 'dir rtogs par mi 'gyur
161a2(dkon brtsegs): ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems pa dag ni ji snyed pa// 'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag de rnyed do// chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na// dbyangs kyi yan lag ji
161a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa// chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi// chos bstan pa yang de tsam mo// sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni// mi dang sems pa ji snyed pa// sems can snying po'i spu gcig nas// 'od zer
161a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba de snyed do// 'jig rten mgon po'i spu kun gyi// 'od zer dag ni de snyed pa// mi yi dbang po chos ston che// gsung gi yan lag de bas mang // dpe dkon nas ni sangs rgyas kyis// 
161a5(dkon brtsegs): bskal par rab tu bstan mdzad kyang // sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dbyangs kyang / mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod/ 
161a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa// thams cad du ni mi dmigs te// de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa// shin tu dmigs par mi
161a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// ji ltar tshig ni yid min te// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsungs// gang yang rnyed par mi
161a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs kyang // de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gnas pa med pa yang
161b1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// ji ltar sil skar 'khrul 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba// sgra 'byir byed pa gang yang med// 'on kyang sgra rapas de dag 'byung // de ltar sngod chang rnam dag phyir// sems can kun gyi
161b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bskyod// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang // 'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'// ji ltar brag ca rnams kyi sgra// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung // nang dang phyir rol pa
161b3(dkon brtsegs): ga so// ngi'u rin chen mi rtog par// snang bas sems can tshim par byed// de ltar rgyal ba'i mi tog gsung // sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
161b4(dkon brtsegs): gi gsang ba ni// sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ skye ba'i gnas
161b5(dkon brtsegs): tha dad bdag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par bzhag go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug
161b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ za ba dang
161b7(dkon brtsegs): za nga'i rtsang dang / za ba sel ba dang / za ba 'gog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba
161b8(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de bar snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jug pa dang / kun tu 'jug byed dang / kun tu 'jug bral dang / kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / 
162a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pade/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya
162a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ 'byung ba dang / dpog pa dang / srog pa dang / 'jig byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang
162a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang / kun snyed dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug
162a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod pa snyen dang / gnod pa zang
162a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod ba zang ba sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa
162a6(dkon brtsegs): de/ dga' ldan lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ shin tu mi spun dang / mi srun rtsab dang / ldog pa dang / yang dag par ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
162a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'brul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / kun tu rgyal byed dang / rgyal zad
162a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal zang sgo zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gzhan
162b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha ha ho dang / ha ha thob byed dang / ha ha bral dang / ha ha dral byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal
162b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / 
162b3(dkon brtsegs): mur sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di
162b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ sdug pa dang / sdug byed dang / sdug pa nyal dang / sdug par 'khor zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / 
162b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag pa dang / kun tu 'dzag byed dang / rgyud gcod dang / shin tu 'byung
162b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi 'di
162b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya ste/ ma dang / rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / rma rung dang / mnye bar zhi byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsnga
162b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal byed dang / rnam par rgyal byed dang / rgyal ba mthar byed dang / byed pa thob byed ces bya'o// 
163a1(dkon brtsegs): nga ga sngal dang / drug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / drug sngal 'azhog pa dang / sdug sngal 'azhog par 'gro la 'a byang gang ma nga /  rung gis sa
163a2(dkon brtsegs): ga ces byaste/ gtsang /  / nga / sa nus mdu byar// nga sdug sngal dang / sdug bsngal ga 'byung ba dang / drug sngal 'gag pa dang / sdug 'jog par 'gro ba lam nas bya
163a3(dkon brtsegs): da tshang / gzug mas na che na/ ma / dadzu dzi/ rdeg / nig gyur/ 'a drug la dang / drug 'i ku lung bdang / 
163a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa dang / sdug dasngal 'gog par 'gro bab lam shes bya ba med pade/ chad meng dge ba'i rnarnams 'di nad cis bya ste/  na padang / yang dag par babyen pa dang / rang ba'i babyen par
163a5(dkon brtsegs): ku tu brten pa zhes byar// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsnga kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug sa sngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes byang gang yin pade/ dge rgyas
163a6(dkon brtsegs): na ces bya/ gangang / mgatsang chung nga / ma pa nga/ yatanam ga ces byar/ chug la dang / drug sngal su 'jung nga / drug rdzal 'a
163a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyun brdzal 'gog par 'gro bab lam zhes bya ba dang yin pang / mtsha pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dzin ces byaste/ de'u 'gru dang / ma 'dzim yin dang / rjes kyi mtshams dang / rjem thu mtshams 'gro
163a8(dkon brtsegs): ga/ nga rdzu la dang / drug pardzas pan 'byung dang / drug bcwa lag dang / rdzug 'i dzin par ba'i lam shes bya gang dzin / tshigadu ma'i thams kyi gang ces
163b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / dag pa can dang / dag pa yongs dag dang / dag par 'gro zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba
163b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de/ gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma ma ma ma dang / ma ma ma me dang / man nur la dang / man nug ma zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang
163b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug 'basngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ grol ba dang / grol ba can dang / grol ba'i rtsa ba dang / grol
163b4(dkon brtsegs): dbye drag phyed par mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de
163b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi bya ba dang / ma byed pa dang / byed bral dang / byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / 
163b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin tu mthar thug
163b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi rtog pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o// ni nga'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gnag pa de bzhin du/ klu rnams kyi yang gzhan no// gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan no// 
163b8(dkon brtsegs): dri za rnams kyi yang gzhan no// lA ma yin rnams kyi yang gzhan no// namakha' lding rnams kyi yang gnan no// mi 'am ci rnams kyi yang gzhan no// lho 'phye chen po rlabs kyi yang gzhan no// gnod sbyin lag na gnod
164a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs rnams kyi yang gzhan no// dreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan yin no// ni ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po bcu drug tu bsdungs bsdus pa'i yul stong gi 'dzam bu'i gling
164a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yongasu gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/ brda' yang tha dad ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta bzhin du/ ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam
164a3(dkon brtsegs): bar dkod de/ 'di lta ste/ yul kA sha dang / ba du pa dang / tho kar yul dang / ya ngan dang / kam po dza dang / kha sha dang / hun dang / rgya yul dang / dar ta dang / u ra sha dang / pi lin dang / bo ma dang / dram
164a4(dkon brtsegs): re dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmas rigs dang / di rbab dang / kir ta dang / bu yin ta dang / pun dra dang / ku ru na dang / lnga len dang / shar phyogs dang / pu ru rang dang / 
164a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang / ka ling ka dang / gcer bu dang / banas ka dang / ban ta dang / sa la ka dang / khyi gdong dang / wa gdong dang krib sha'i gdong dang / spyi bu tshugs pa dang / gnam gdong
164a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / d+ha phyogs dadong dang / byang mtshanas gdong dang / rjesu rmugs dang / rgya mtsho'i khol pa dang / yul mthas gtags pa dang / ya ku dang / mang kur dang / snga me dang / rdo krang / phyogs
164a7(dkon brtsegs): gcer ma / rgagagazogs sa cer drungad/ ga te 'grang / rdzogs byed rnangs pa dang / lag na bya bar dganas pa'i yul ladzegs pa/ phul dang gis 'angam du gling 'ongs su dang rtse/ 
164b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gsung / sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing / rnam par shes pa'i rjesu 'brang ngam yin pa 'byung ngo // ni ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten khams 'di na/ bden pa ming tha dad bas bstan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig
164b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag dgu cu rtsa bzhi yod de/ bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang / 'di lnga ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par
164b3(dkon brtsegs): don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi nga'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog dertsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi
164b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa// bas pa lnga zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi som nyi
164b5(dkon brtsegs): sel ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi
164b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus
164b7(dkon brtsegs): thong bar gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA rangadwa ti'i bu'i shes rang dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams
164b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing / rnam grangs 'dis sems cadan thams cad shes rang dang / ye shes de lnga zung lda pa
165a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ zhi nga'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyi bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par/ the tsom gyi dri ba bsam shing gzhal te yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig
165a2(dkon brtsegs): gi the tsom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de/ gnyis pa'i ma yin zhing / zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis/ sems can thams cad kyis the tsom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gam du dong nas/ sa
165a3(dkon brtsegs): rgol gtogs pa srid pa tho tsam gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang / des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas/ gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tsom gyi dri nga thams cad gcod de
165a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyang / rang rang gi the tsom gyi dri ba chad par shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas/ thams cad kyang sems rangs par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na
165a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don sa pa gcod cing / sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa 'am
165a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la/ mdzad pa de yang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// 'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o// 'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o// 
165a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gi gsung ba 'di/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i tshe/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bskal pa bzang po'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
165b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis/ gsangang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams btang ngo // de nas me tog de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skul
165b2(dkon brtsegs): yang phog/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la yang ngog cing / 'khor thams cad la yang 'thor ro// rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
165b3(dkon brtsegs): gi steng na 'dug go/ rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nying rang du
165b4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'di bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang nga lag so zhes sgra byung ngo // 
165b5(dkon brtsegs): de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar tu gyur nas/ gas nga ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis/ gsang ngapa'i
165b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thob pa bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mos shing som nyi za bar mi
165b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang
165b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi
166a1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthud pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po la gar rdo rjes
166a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstar to// bgrang ngo // yang dag par bshad do// gang dag chos bstar pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
166a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ras mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mi dang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de nyid
166a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bas ngan par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig can gyi khams
166a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ sdang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po yang bab bo// sil skad dang rol po'i sgra yang byung // 
166a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni/ rje su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sem
166a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med bdag gis ni skye ba cig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smir bar byas so// de nas
166a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi khyams de'i dbus nas/ bcod ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar chu'i rgyun shing na'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dadag tshad stong phrag drug su cu brgyad pa rol te/ mngon du byung bar snang ngo // 
166b1(dkon brtsegs): ri ngag steng gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rter gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus sagacas btang bar gyur to// de nas bcom
166b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags
166b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros nu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang / ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po b.rol te/ mngon par
166b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig pa dang / lta bar
166b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i sgo grags bcag nas chos sdang ba mi zad pa dang / shes rab dang spobs pa 'thung bar 'gyur ro// des skyes bre de dag gi legs par bshad ngas sems can thams cad
166b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur te/ 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u sa
166b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad
166b8(dkon brtsegs): spras so// ni ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'ad lnga ste dper na/ gzugs med par myong ba'i
167a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri ba'i sdong du gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du/ de dag
167a2(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhar gyi rjes su mi 'brang ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes
167a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang mi gnas pa ste/ gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nung mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngar
167a4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ldog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'
167a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mi mnga'/ thu gas 'gug pa mi mnga'/ thugs sel ba mi mngar/ thugs g.yeng ba mi mngar thugs khengs pa mi mnga'/ 
167a6(dkon brtsegs): zugs dma' ba mi mngal/ thugs kun tu srung ba mi mngal/ thugs rgyu ba ma mngar/ thugs shi tu rangs pa mi mnga'o// thugs rnam par 'khrugs pa mi mngang / thugs la 'khor du 'dzin pa mi ma 'o// 
167a7(dkon brtsegs): thugs g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs nges par sems pa mi mnga' thugs dgyes pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs
167a8(dkon brtsegs): la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par rtog pa mi mngar/ thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong mi mngar/ thugs la rnam par
167b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'isu 'aldang bamam pa/ rang gi thugs la gnas pam nga / gal gyi semam las pa mdang / drug sa tshag lags 'angs pa/ blags bdang / nA dang / byed/ 
167b2(dkon brtsegs): sa nga/ 'ad lags ma / thugs gzungs pa gas pa mdang / bras nga / drang // gas gangs pa nga/ chu sa lan
167b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa sa garnas pa ma pa/ thugs med la gnas pa ma pa/ rgyags na gnas ma / drugs byor ba dag sa ma nga// drun tho mas 'dun na/ 
167b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la mi 'jug go// thugs de 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ dasang byung mo ga go/ rdo gros de na gshegs pa ni dbyar thugs mongs su dag pa
167b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi thub la/ chos saHcad la 'ang ngo'i le shes mchags sa thogs pa 'jug na/ rang gi drugs yongs su dgapas/ sems can gang gi
167b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin ning rnam par mi 'ag ga/ gzigs kyang smos par ma mang ngo // gzigs pas gzigs pa dang / rnang pa
167b7(dkon brtsegs): gas pa mi gcan so// da na dgashegs pa legs na na pamigags nga ngas na mtshan/ bya'i rig gi thong bdang na pa ma tshan/ shes rab kyi ma tshang ba dang na
167b8(dkon brtsegs): yin chos kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i na ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa yin/ gnan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan
168a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnar par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ zag zad bapa shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/ de chos thams
168a2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa yang yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yin no// de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan rnams ni sgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar
168a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la yang gzigaso// sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar rab tu mkhyen to// de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
168a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga'
168a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang / mi da dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la
168a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du yang mi chagaso// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni// 
168a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang mi mnga'/ yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ sku'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga' gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mngar/ thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi/ 'di
168a8(dkon brtsegs): lha ste sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas mnya mo// sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis
168b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog go// chos sku'i rtsom pa dang / gsung gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/ de yang lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la
168b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par
168b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can la thugs brtsebs de bzhin du bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa
168b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams la gnas pa ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang na ga nus pa ma yin/ phyi la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas
168b5(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten/ pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma thob dang bcas pa la gnas par
168b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin// zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 
168b7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi
168b8(dkon brtsegs): mnga'o// de chos gang yang mngon par mi bsgrub pa la/ sems can la thugs brtse bas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes
169a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba/ chags pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de yang lhun gyis grung cing bsgrib pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' ngas 'jug go// ni nga'i blo gros
169a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang nga ste/ mnyam par gnag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la/ sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas/ thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid// 
169a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa
169a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na/ da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slang na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis
169a5(dkon brtsegs): lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyis nog shig/ lha dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la
169a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi shA ri'i bu gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag/ gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
169a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa yid ches par mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu nga'i phyi ba nin 'brang ba mthong
169a8(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di bdag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba ba'i bdag po
169b1(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab na yang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag na rdo rje'i gzugs
169b2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu ston to// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab tu gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ lag na rdo rje'i
169b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kun tu bstan kyang / des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong
169b4(dkon brtsegs): ngam gsor ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ngagadod mthong lags te/ sngon na ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal ba/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong
169b5(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nas/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas/ lhags pa de dag gis
169b6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo // sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
169b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang / de dag thams cad kyi rgyang na yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste/ byin gyis brlangs de dag thams cad ni gsang
169b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dag po yin no// sha ri'i bung bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgya ba na yang / 'dir byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ sha ri'i thugs
170a1(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje dade ltar ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stongs dang ldan no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje'i yod tan yongs su rjod pa'i
170a2(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba ba'i bdag po byang chung sem
170a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dkar ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la rtsams te/ den rmang du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba/ gang
170a4(dkon brtsegs): du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gsang pra pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni chad med de/ de dag ni tshe
170a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad bskal par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste/ bstan bar sla ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig/ brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems
170a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa ni rnam pa gcig ma yin te/ mu stegs can gnom pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas spyad do// dka' thub dang / lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang / lus kyi
170a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam ji snyed kyis/ pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par bsnyems pas de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub
170a8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag de dag gis byas pas kun tu bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te/ ni ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya cig bcug ste
170b1(dkon brtsegs): sde 'dug par mthong // kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg sa 'dug par mthong // kha cig gis ni nyi ma la ldanang 'judug par mthong / kha tsag gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong / kha cig gsan
170b2(dkon brtsegs): tsog tsog por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa btsugs te/ mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ste/ 'dug par mthong / kha cig
170b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ni khas dung tu 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo dkrung bcas te
170b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa mthong / kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la gnyis pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la gnyis pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la gnyis pa dang / kha cig gis ni phyag
170b5(dkon brtsegs): ngar khrod mnyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su bsgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsubal ba
170b6(dkon brtsegs): dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dwags kyi pags pa gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa ri gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni bsgren mor 'dug pa dang
170b7(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis rtsa dar d+ha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred zab dang / kha cigr-i ni nas za bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni nu za ba dang / lo ma tha
170b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / me tog za ba dang / 'bras bu ba ba dang / sdong bu za ba dang / gzegs ma za ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsab za ba dang / zhag drug sbyang ba dang / sha mi za ba dang / rgya shug zab dang / nas shin te ma zab das
171a1(dkon brtsegs): ci tse za ba dang / mor sde'u ba ba dang / mor sran gre'u za ba dang / bra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skan zang dang / chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tshong dang / mar gyi thig
171a2(dkon brtsegs): pa tsam gyis 'tshor dang / sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tshong dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi rba ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar ma mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni
171a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa 'da' shig tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang / dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/ 
171a4(dkon brtsegs): lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to// brtul zhugs shin tu da bar du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dka'
171a5(dkon brtsegs): thub brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang / dka' thung thams cang ston kyang sems can gzhan dang gzhan la ma mos pa dang / bdag gis brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub gnan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ 
171a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis/ sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub mthong ngan ma gtogs so// zhi nga'i blo gros de la/ 
171a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag kyang kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyad pa 'dis/ lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsang ni theg pa gsum po
171a8(dkon brtsegs): dag la yongs su smin par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa/ yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing / 
171b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bas gtan byed pa dang / mi g.yo ba dang / bde ba mang ba dang / lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de la
171b2(dkon brtsegs): lnga dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa/ chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/ zhi
171b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba/ ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// 
171b4(dkon brtsegs): bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug chang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang / 
171b5(dkon brtsegs): dka' thub de dag las langs te/ chu rlung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du song nas/ 'jig rten dang thun par khrus byas te/ lus gtsang bar byas nas/ chu rlung ne ran dzan nas byung ste
171b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par gyur to// de na grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes pa des/ ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo // gzhan lha dang klu
171b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu yang rang rang gi zas thogs te/ 'khod na/ so so nas tshig 'di skad
171b8(dkon brtsegs): kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces zer ro// ni ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpas grong mi'i bu mo legs kyis ma la
172a1(dkon brtsegs): sos pa/ daklung/ gang tun da/ dri bye thu hru ba dang mas cad dkyi kham gzums/ mas cad sa / dun mdza/ 
172a2(dkon brtsegs): res kyang / byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba
172a3(dkon brtsegs): sheso// de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba
172a4(dkon brtsegs): spyo pa yang dag 'phags shes bya ba'o// zas len pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa/ dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// 
172a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te/ lus stobs dang / ldan par gyur nas/ zas zos te/ byang chub kyi snying / bo ga la ba der song ngo // de song ba dang / sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu
172a6(dkon brtsegs): sa bzangs shes bya bas/ sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras pa/ sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi bskyod pa// sred pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing
172a7(dkon brtsegs): drung byon// sa ga ni dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// legs so zhes te sa la spyod rnams dgar/ stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed// me tog sil ma bkram ning spos mchog bdugs/ 
172a8(dkon brtsegs): spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab// lag na gnong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs// gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin par snang ba// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'o// de tshe me tog
172b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs char tu bab// gling ba ni bdag rnams na skyong ba bani// ji snyed pa dag thangs cad thams cad 'khor bcas te// rnam par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// gser gyi drangs stong gsung thams cad dgas/ 
172b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa// de ltar stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan 'thab bral lnga
172b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad rab dga' ste// skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun// na mkha' bai DUR+Ya yi dra bas bkab// dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lnga
172b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang // de dag mu tig drangs brgyan pa byas// rgyan phreng de bzhin zla gam rnams kyang thogs/ mu tig sil ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs// lha'i rgyal po rangab tu 'phrul dga'i bar// rab
172b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' nas 'dzam bu chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra ba gser gyi dang bcas dang // sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkag/ thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir// dbang sgyu
172b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis lha'i rin po che// rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pas// 'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul/ klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci kun gyis// rang rang gnas pa
172b7(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa rnams kyis ni// 'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon pa
172b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs par mthong nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gon chen po snabs pa/ das bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra bsdabs
173a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs yongs su mi skyo ba// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga'
173a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rdza su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ 
173a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi brlab pa/ sems can thams cad la rang
173a4(dkon brtsegs): tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par
173a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrungs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od cen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma
173a6(dkon brtsegs): gos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyong ba/ ri rang chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ 
173a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongasu dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de/ bdud kyi
173a8(dkon brtsegs): sde rab tu gdul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar bzhed pa dang / spongs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
173b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen pos bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi spyan pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can
173b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsdad par
173b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba
173b4(dkon brtsegs): la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa ma na po mi mjed kyi bdag po de yid rab tu dga' nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong
173b5(dkon brtsegs): mang por brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po ngas pa de/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzung kyis/ de la khyed kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis/ song gsum
173b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyad par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// lhar bcas 'jig
173b7(dkon brtsegs): rten dag la lan bzhed pa// lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi lha// thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen kyi ye shes 'tshang rgya dang // rdzogs
173b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bskang dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang // sems can thams cad nim par bya ba dang // dam pa'i chos meg
174a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su srung ba'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// bas kyi rgol ba rnams na tshar gcang dang // sdod kyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas
174a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni// sa'i gzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye/ 
174a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos// 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin// de ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya// tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang leg so zhes// rab tu dga' nas
174a4(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum brgyan par gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod dasnang ba// de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag bstan// me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang // rin chen rnams kyi
174a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod cing sol snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha'i rnams// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang / dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas// rang rang gnas
174a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas// lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang // lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha yi bu mo bye ba drug bcu brgyas// byang chub rdo rje gdan ni brgyan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun tu
174a7(dkon brtsegs): chag chag 'debs// me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thob par byed// sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bkram// byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nuso// de snyed tshad kyi
174a8(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa 'dir byas gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ 
174b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang / dka' thung rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa/ sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di byang chub kyi snying por bcud kyis/ de la khyod kyis
174b2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la tshigasu bcad pa
174b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag smraso// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// pan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad bdag nyid che// de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du// shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud
174b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dod par bya// stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni brgyan par bya// 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang // yang ngag mchod na bsod nams mtha' las 'gyur// tshangs pa de dag tshig
174b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog de thos nas// stong gsum thams cad ma lus brgyar byed cing // legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// 'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa
174b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bye ba'i gdugs rnams na mkhar de dag sprul// sa la'i shing rnams me tog mchog smras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul// lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa// de ni shing rta bdun gtams tshad du sprul/ 
174b7(dkon brtsegs): rin chen bani la gser gyi pad+ma bkram// kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag lha mi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong // sum cu gsum dbang rnams rgyal khang 'dra ba/ 
174b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gling gzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'og min lha'i rnams/ stongs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni// byang chung snying por ngam
175a1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyan par byed// byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ri// 'dod pa'i khams 'dir bkod mchog gang yod pa// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skad cig de la
175a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lhags// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis// byang chub shing ni mngon du ldan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs// byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te/ 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): sumacu rtsa gsum lha'i longs 'du 'dra// lha rnams bye ba dag gi mdzes sprul pa// bkod pa de dag tshig gi brjod mi nus// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ rkang pa'i mthil
175a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / ngagashin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi
175a5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba rnams rgyun bcad do// klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas klu'i bdag po nag blo / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid ras
175a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'khor la tshig su bcad pas smras pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od// gnas 'dir lhang nger gyur pas na// kho bo'i lus ni
175a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu tshim// sems kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur// kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi// lhas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni// gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur// legs par bye ma phreng
175a8(dkon brtsegs): bang // snga ma tog drug pa // gser nga nor bre cig dang // du dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang // rom mo po la stan rnams thogs pa// gdugs da rgyal ma thogs napa na// bdang
175b1(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang bsgreng byos te// ston pa la ni mchod pa bya// klu'i rgyal po'i gnas 'din// bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa/ de dag rab tu dga' ba yis/ sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya// de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po/ 
175b2(dkon brtsegs): chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas te me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / 
175b3(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ spos chu'i char ba ni 'bebs/ klu'i mu tig dang / klu'i me
175b4(dkon brtsegs): tog gi char ni 'bebs shing / klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas ste/ 
175b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang / sil snyan len pa dang bcas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu
175b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis 'od ni rab bkye bas/ sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur/ skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi// nag po'i gnas kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur// klu'i rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas// rab tu dga' ste
175b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe tshig smras pa// gser gyi mdog gi 'od 'di byung las na// de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du gdon mi za// klu mo khrag khrig dag gi mdun pa dang te// gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs na su// byang chub sems dpa' de ni pa
175b8(dkon brtsegs): lar song // phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug/ sa kun rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhig de che mdzes par brgyan// shing mchog kun dang rtswa rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud// 'dir yod pa'i chu klung thams ca
176a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'bab ma pa' la drung ri ldang // de ring bdud dngul ngas ri 'jig rter thams cad zil gyis gnod par 'gyur// srid pa gsumar btu byed tshangs pa'i mazla ba'i 'ong ri sdang // mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis
176a2(dkon brtsegs): reg nas de ring ngan song gsum po zhi// bdag gi gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par bgyid// de ring rgyal bar byod par 'gyur gyis dgyes mdzod rangs shing che bskyed// bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam khar song ste khyod
176a3(dkon brtsegs): la skor ba dang // tsa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag na mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang // lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa las// de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod/ 
176a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam du 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnye da gzi brjid che ldan pa// mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin gser thub ces ni bya ba mchod// mi mchog 'od srung dang ni shAkya mchog
176a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod de ring bdag gis mchod// bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don du gnyer// sa ni gum zhing ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// su zhig byang chub tu ni sems
176a6(dkon brtsegs): nges lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa// de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni mchis ma lags// seng ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung shig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas
176a7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa// gser 'od ces bya ba de/ klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan
176a8(dkon brtsegs): phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha dang mi yi phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang / ngog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa
176b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang lhan cig tu/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la mthong zhing / tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par brjod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi sdang ma bsnyengs pag mi cha// ma'um
176b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dman rab dgyes mi 'thul chags mi mnga'// sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba// rnam grol drang srong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dogs bral zug rngu bral zhing dul la ma rig sel/ 
176b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel// gnas dang skabs dang gling ma mchis pa mkhyen nas ni// gnas khyod skabs khyod 'jig rten gsum po dag tu byung // ji ltar lha'i tshogs rnams dad cing rab
176b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste// mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang / ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor ba bgyid las na// drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar deng 'gyur snyam// dgyes skyed shing dbang
176b5(dkon brtsegs): drung gshegs mi bsnyengs bzugs mdzod la// bdud sde pham par mdzod de nyon mongs dra ba drol// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang ded / ga sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub ba mchog zhi ba 'chang rgyar
176b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzod// gang gi ched du khyod kyis bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba dag ni dgrol phyir dka' ba rnams kyang spyad// khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dang drung gshegs te// byang chub mchog la reg par mdzad pa'i dus
176b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lags// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa// bam po drab par/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
176b8(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste 'gro ba na/ lam gyi g.yas rol na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtsa rnga zhing 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'
177a1(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs pa mthong ste/ lha rnams kyis bskul nas/ rwa 'jam pa shin tu gnon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ dga'
177a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil pa g.yasu 'khyil pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba spar gang blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas byin pa dang / rtswa spar gang byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/ 
177a3(dkon brtsegs): ngas pa pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'byi bar/ byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtsa yang byin no snyam du sems na/ de
177a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar mi ngalnga'o// de ci'i phyir zher/ de ni rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngor gyi smon lam yin te/ ji ltar kho bo bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri shom pa bzhin no// 
177a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa bzang po 'di'i sngon rol/ bskal pa dgu cu rtsa gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
177a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
177a7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la dge slong song tham pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
177a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag lung bstan to// de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstad pa de thos nas
177b1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ seng ge'i khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam bta' bo// na
177b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa da/ gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyisu gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
177b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa 'tshong dkra shis pa 'di/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang / rtsa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di 'di ltar rig
177b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de kha cig la ni rtswasmra gang 'bul bar 'gyur/ kha cig la ni rin po che dkod pa'i seng ge
177b5(dkon brtsegs): khri dbul bar 'gyuraro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams/ lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang / spos
177b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bye ma'i pur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bye ma dang
177b7(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bdag nyid chen po mi snyems dpa' zhing dul zhi ba// dgyes shing
177b8(dkon brtsegs): ma pa bar 'thong la phyag lang mo// 'bar pazhams dbyes parnam tho ma mang ba/ skyo las grol ba'i sbyor ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon ming 'gro'ang la// 
178a1(dkon brtsegs): ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig/ 'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams spang ba'i phyir byung ba/ sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing
178a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba yis// lha'i me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs pa las/ 'dod dgra sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring bsnyes su nges// shing dbang drung du gshegs te
178a3(dkon brtsegs): khri der bzhugs nas su// bdud btul nas ni mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod// ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa/ de ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod// ji ltar khyod kyis
178a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du ni// bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba// drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog dod rdzogs kyis// shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar
178a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzod// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa sa rtswa s+phar gang khye ra nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du/ bdag nyid kyis rtswa gding ba bting nas/ byang
178a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi shing la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byaso// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas rtsa gding ba bting ma thag tu/ de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bani stong gis/ saidwe'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa mthong / 
178a7(dkon brtsegs): yangs pa/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer can/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu sbyangs pa/ ras bcos bu
178a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bani stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bsham so// zhi ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpas seng ge'i khri brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad la bdag nyid 'dug par kun tu bstan pa
178b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// lha'i bu de dag gis kyang gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong mi shes te/ lha'i bu re res kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhug so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang
178b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur
178b3(dkon brtsegs): to// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas seng ge'i khri de la 'dug ma thag tu/ de nas smin mtshams kyi mdzad
178b4(dkon brtsegs): spu'i bar nas/ bdud bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa 'i bdud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go// 'od des de dag la reg ma
178b5(dkon brtsegs): zag tu/ rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du smra zing zhes byed de/ rang gi bdud kyi gnas tshig cing mog mog bor gyur par shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir gnas 'di
178b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag mog mog por gyur par snang ba 'di la rgyun ci zhig yod/ rkyen ni ci zhig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ cig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
178b7(dkon brtsegs): 'chang rgyubar mi 'gyur grang snyam sde/ rnam par bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can de dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 
178b8(dkon brtsegs): bdud re re yang / gnod sbyin kha dog rnam pa mang po dang / cha byang rnam pa mang po dang / dbyibs rnam pa mang po dang / chu zheng rnam pa mang ba dang / g.yo ba rnam pa mang po dang / mdo
179a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa mang po dang / mtshon cha rnam pa mang po dang / rgyal mtshan rnam pa mang po thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis bskor te/ smra ba rnam pa mang po smra zhing / bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / 
179a2(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos bdud re res kyang / bdud kyi 'khor gyis/ rgyar dpag tshad nyi khri nyi khri ste/ khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri ba ni stong bkang nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros
179a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor chen po de dag dong ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe ling du mi 'ong ba/ mnyan par mi 'os pa/ mi snyan pa/ u dug ces bya ba dang / pi tshig ces bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba dang / rgyob shig/ 
179a4(dkon brtsegs): zug shig/ sod cig/ chings shig ces bya ba'i sgra chen po de lta shu byung bar gyur to// gal te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i sa mas can rnams kyis sgra de thos la/ ni ba'i blo gros gal te/ byang
179a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sgra de mi grag par ma byas na ni/ de dag kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing / 'chi ba 'am/ shi la thug par sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur ro// de na ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
179a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos non pas/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra de mi grag par byas par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i yul yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros
179a7(dkon brtsegs): skra de lta bu de thos kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tha na spu g.yos par yang ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra 'di thams cad brag cha dang mtshungs par legs par rtog pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros byang
179a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lhags par rig nas/ bdud sdig rten de dag la zlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis zlog par byed de/ sdig can dag phongs par 'gyur ba gdon
179b1(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' ba rnar ba 'di na bu 'di dag gis ci zhig byas thong shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdig can khyed ni kyang songs chung ngu la kyang spobs chen po dang bltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas brdabs par 'gyur ro// 
179b2(dkon brtsegs): sdig can khyed ni dpa' bo chen pos/ pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas pham par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni srin bu me khyer la/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar// do mad
179b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni pub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni shing sa la chen po rtsa
179b4(dkon brtsegs): nas chang ba lngar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar la gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni ri dgas kyi tshogs la seng ge ba ba pa ltar/ do mong byang chub sems dpas spangs par byas par
179b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni brjes kyi chu la nyi tshan bab pa ltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po
179b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po bab pa ltar/ ngo mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi g.yon can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar do mong byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can
179b7(dkon brtsegs): khyed na tshong ba lam rgyags mang po mes tshig pa ltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa lar/ ngo mong byang chub
179b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ri khrung khrung rgan po 'dang ma bregs pa lung / ngo mong byang chub sems dpas sems khongs su bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni 'dron
180a1(dkon brtsegs): / dgon par lam/ rgyags chang bltar/ do mong byang chub sems dpas 'phongs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru zhig ltar/ ngo long byang chub
180a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang sa smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas brnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod na
180a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo ba la rdo rje chen po bab pa ltar/ ngo mong byang chub sems dpas rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bzlog pa rnam babacu drug gis bdud sdig can rnams
180a4(dkon brtsegs): zlog par byed kyang / bdud sdig can dag phyir ma ldog go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par
180a5(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pad nga/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / 
180a6(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam
180a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba yongs su sbyang ba byas pas/ lag pa g.yas pa 'jam zhing gnon la/ shin tu gnon pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa brkyang ste/ snying rje chen pos bskyong ba dang / sems can thams cad
180a8(dkon brtsegs): rang tu thar par bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas spyi bo nas bzung ste/ lus thams cad la byugs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon du byas te/ dran pa dang / 
180b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan ning shes bzhin dus chen po la babaso// na ba'i bu gros byang chub sems dbas sa chen po la brdabs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshes chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rang tu g.yos so// kun tu rang tu gam
180b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gul to// rang tu 'gul to// kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu rab tu ldag go// 'khrugs so// rab tu 'khrugs// kun tu rab tu 'khrug so// 'ur 'ur ro// rab tu 'a 'o// 
180b3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem mo// rab tu chem chem mo// kun tu rab tu chemachem mo// shar phyogs dma' na/ nung phyogs mtho'o// nub phyogs dma' na/ shar phyogs mtha'o// lnga pog
180b4(dkon brtsegs): dma' ra/ byang phyogs mtho'o// byang phyogs dpa' na/ lho phyogs mtho'o// mtha' mthon/ dbus ngama'o// dbus mthon mtha' dma'o// zhi nga'i blo gros de ltar rnam pa drug dang / lhas
180b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po bco brgyad dus g.yos pa chen po 'jig rten du byung bar gyur // bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang / 'ur sgra dang / tug chem gyi sgra chen po dang / zung shig pa dang / rgyob shig
180b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chings shig pa dang / sod cig pa'i sgra thos so// bdud kyi 'khor gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus/ steng gi bar snang la 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di thos// drang srong nang na drang srong mchog/ 
180b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ri mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste// srog chags kun gyi skyabs yin gyis// 'di la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// zhi ba'i blo gros bdud kyi 'khor gyis sgra de thos pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
180b8(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyad cu khas bub tu sa la skyel nas/ skyes bu chen po yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes tshig de skad smras so// bdud sdig can lhag ma rnams ni dpung gi tshogs dang ldan cig
181a1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bros par 'dod na/ 'bros ma nus nas de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'as las 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des de dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ rang rang
181a2(dkon brtsegs): gi gan su dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di bstan pa na/ bdud kyi 'khor de las gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus ni/ bla na med pa lang
181a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu cu rtsa dgus ni/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// lha'i bu sdod sbyang ba byas pa brgyad khri bzhi
181a4(dkon brtsegs): spang rim skye ba'i chos la bzang pa thob par gyur to// bdung gartul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gsum par/ ni ba'i zla gros de ltar lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltarang bdud 'dul batshad med
181a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan par sheso// kha cig gis ni bdud longs thams cad du ma/ 'ongs par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug par sheso// kha cig gis ni byang chub
181a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par ma thong ngo // kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sa la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i dkyil na gnas
181a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing gi rgyal po a shed thar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing longs 'dus brtol du thong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing
181a8(dkon brtsegs): rin pa che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can du mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing / shing ta la srid tsam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing ta la phyed tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing / 
181b1(dkon brtsegs): shing bal bdud srid cam du mthong zhing seng ge'i khri shing tal byed dang gnyis sring tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chud kyi shing dbag chad brgyad khri ba ni stong pa'i bar du mthong zhing / seng ge'i khri dpag chang ba ni khri'is
181b2(dkon brtsegs): stong par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud gcig mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud rgya chen por mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sem
181b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bdud 'jom pa la rtse bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i dkyil na gnas shing / na mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / byang chub sems
181b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na/ 'khong ba de dag gi yon tan
181b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi cu'i khyad par ni chad med par snang ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog ngas par 'dug pa dang / sngon 'thun par spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med
181b6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu meng ba dag/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas lhags te/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra brjod cing shis pa'i sgra dang / bde ba'i sgra dang / kun dga'
181b7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sgra dang / mgyogs pa'i sgra dang / myur ba'i sgra dang / legs pa'i sgra dang / don yod pa'i sgra dang / dpa' ba'i sgra dang / skyes bu dam pa'i sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / rgyas pa'i sgra dang / 
181b8(dkon brtsegs): dkra shis pa'i sgra dang / mi gdung ba'i sgra dang / ma zhum pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi bsam pa'i sgra dang / spong ba don yod pa'i sgra dang / yid bde ba'i sgra dang / rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i sgra dang / skyes bungs
182a1(dkon brtsegs): ba rnam par rtsen pa'i sgra dang / phan pa'i sgra dang / skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra
182a2(dkon brtsegs): rjod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbugs
182a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis dbugs 'byin to// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngon legs par spyad pa ste/ des
182a4(dkon brtsegs): na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub se mas dpa' de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying bro mchog dam pa 'dug pa la/ dbugs 'byin cing mchod pa
182a5(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de la yang rjes su chags pa med la/ bdud kyi sde la yang khong khro ba med do//  ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa dang / khong
182a6(dkon brtsegs): khro ba dang bral bas/ skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes pa bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ 
182a7(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
182a8(dkon brtsegs): gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sku ma bsnyil tam zhes snyun gsol to// bsnyel ba mi mnga' bar byang chub bam/ rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ sgrib pa mi
182b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ngam/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ kun tu ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ngam/ spyod yul ma 'dres pa dang ldan nam/
