182b2(dkon brtsegs): snying rje cher po'i go cha bgos sam/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsams pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ram/ zhes yongs su 'dri'o// de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongasu smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de
182b3(dkon brtsegs): shes so// sems can gang dag dbang po yongasu ma smin pa de dag gis ri bya ba de mi shes so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhir gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzums par chos
182b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su btar ro// spyan mi 'dzum sa par byang chub kyi shing la yang gzigs so// lha'i bu song yang de la mchod do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// 
182b5(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
182b6(dkon brtsegs): tu sems kyang skyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas/ byang chub brnyes pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gam du dong bar gyur to// ba'i
182b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnab thos kyi bu ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag go// gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de
182b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gling bye ba phrag brgya ras/ rgyal po chen po bye ba phrag bani brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gam du dong ngo // zhi nga'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas/ lhung bzed bye ba phrag
183a1(dkon brtsegs): bani brgya rnapas bzhes to// bzhes nas kyang ltung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlangs na/ rgyal po chen po re re yang 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed ba zhes so// 
183a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// zhi ba'i
183a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ tshong ba ga gon dang / bzang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur to// de dag ni sngon 'di
183a4(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la/ thog mar nal zas dbul lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas
183a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de bzhin nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi lnga ga bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
183a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du/ sems can gyi don
183a7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang / ji lta ji ltar byang
183a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ tshangs pa gtsug phud can
183b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor cing mdun du dadar te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
183b2(dkon brtsegs): mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ sems can chos kyi snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
183b3(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo// de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste/ 
183b4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bung khas blangs nas/ bdag gis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo zhes
183b5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btang ba yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros tshangs pa gtsug bud can nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btad kyis/ gzhan dag gis
183b6(dkon brtsegs): ni ma yin no snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug bud can gyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang / de bzhin gshegs
183b7(dkon brtsegs): ngal gsol ba btang bar gyur to// brgya byin byed phrag cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye phrag bcus kyang / bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par
183b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gnang ba de'i tshe/ tshangs pa gtsug dud can gyis grong khyer bar na se drang srong lhung ba/ ri dwags kyi nags su/ bcom
184a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong yod pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dkrang / bltan sdug pa/ sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur
184a2(dkon brtsegs): to// ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag cu dang / brgya byin bye ba drag cu dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang rtsa
184a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byed phrag bcus kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dkra ba/ balngar sdug pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan nga bshams par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer
184a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po ba ra na se ga la ba dang drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ seng ge'i khri de dag thams ca dra la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun tu bstan to// de na re res kyang / 
184a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ngan/ ra bar gyur par shes te/ de dag dga' nga dang / mchog tu
184a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba de nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu
184a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// bcom ldan
184a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam par gyur par gnas te/ lag mthil ltar
184b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa 'am/ mi 'am lha 'am/ sems can ji snyed
184b2(dkon brtsegs): yong ba de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis
184b3(dkon brtsegs): gdod pa med cing gcig la gcig pa ma tsam du shes te/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma
184b4(dkon brtsegs): thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhag par gyur to// stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i
184b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dra za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / 
184b6(dkon brtsegs): mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // ni ba'i blo gros de ltar de'i tshe/ spong
184b7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa/ dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs gang khyad par ma gyur pa de ni/ than skra'i rtse mo'i cha gnag pa
184b8(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
185a1(dkon brtsegs): spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyod pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ gang yang rung bas chos dang 'thun par 'jig
185a2(dkon brtsegs): rten du ma skor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams/ rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun tu shes te/ 
185a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems
185a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de la ga
185a5(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du/ ko'u 'di n+ya mig mi rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la/ sdug bsngal gyi sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thos so// 
185a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes thos so// stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyi ni mig stong ngo zhes thos// zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o zhes thos so// dben pas 'dul
185a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyis ni mig dben pa'o zhes thos so// mi rtag pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so// gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni/ mig gnas med pa'o zhes thos so// sgyu ma la
185a8(dkon brtsegs): bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes thos so// rmi lam lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos// chu zla lta bu'i 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes thos so// 
185b1(dkon brtsegs): mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni ming / mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so// brag cha lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag cha lta bu'o zhes thos so// de bzhin du stong pa nying dang / mtshan ma med pa
185b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni/ mig stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon
185b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar thos so// rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni/ mig rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes thos so// mig la ji lta ba
185b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du yid kyi bar du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes thoso// de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnam sa dang / ro rnams dang / reg pa rnams dang / chos rnams
185b5(dkon brtsegs): spong ngo zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa dang / kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so// kha cig gis ni skye mched bdag med pa'o zhes thos so// kha cig gis ni phung
185b6(dkon brtsegs): bo mi rtag pa nyid du thos la khams la mi rtab pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ phung po la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam
185b7(dkon brtsegs): bar grol lo// kha cig ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig ni lam gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni drang ba nye bar gzhag
185b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni yang dag par spong ba'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gi
186a1(dkon brtsegs): ni stobs kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ri byang chub kyi yan lag gi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni lam gyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi gtam du thos/ 
186a2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni lhag mthong gi gtam du thos// kha cig gis ni brten pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan pa'i
186a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par
186a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang / sems
186a5(dkon brtsegs): can de dag bgrangs pa'i rtogs pas/ lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / 
186a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang bkod pa dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad khri
186a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems can tshad med pa dag ni theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i
186a8(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcung zhi ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de
186b1(dkon brtsegs): skad bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'am/ cig tu ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te de bzhin gshegs pa bstan parje su 'thun pa'am gcig lnga'ang lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
186b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bstan pa ni zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi mthun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgo
186b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni zab pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gi lus la gnas pa lags kyi/ 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal to// 
186b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ra bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir/ 
186b5(dkon brtsegs): chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po gnas ma yin ning go skabs med de/ gang de bzhin
186b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni gnas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
186b7(dkon brtsegs): de ba ni gshegs pas byin gyis ma rlabs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba shes par ram/ mnyar bar ram/ bshad par nus pa su zhig yod/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin
186b8(dkon brtsegs): bshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam
187a1(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra bar// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ 
187a2(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan to// babrang // rab tu bshad // gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos
187a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos pa dang / yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur ro// gsang ba ba'i bdag po ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo
187a4(dkon brtsegs): bos bsgyel ba 'am/ phrag pa la thogs par nus kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram/ dang par ram/ yid ches par yang mi nus nA thang
187a5(dkon brtsegs): bar ram/ kun chub par bya bar ram/ gzung bar ram/ sbyor bar bya ba lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos kyi rnam
187a6(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas byas pa ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ 
187a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsod nam kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di
187a8(dkon brtsegs): la nges par byas par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/ gnyis la ma yin/ gsum la ma yin/ 
187a9(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la ma yin/ lnga la ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas
187b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yongs su sbyang ba byas dang / theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol
187b2(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar ni ba zhes dgyi ba la/ nye bar zhi ba zhes dgyi ba 'di ni gang lags/ gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
187b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwag so// nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog
187b4(dkon brtsegs): banye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so// kun tu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtogs pa nye bar zhi ba nas bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so// 
187b5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar ni ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ byin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so// byin ci log nye bar ni ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig
187b6(dkon brtsegs): bla dgas so// rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so// ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba
187b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin panye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi
187b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig bla drag so// ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ chang pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so// chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ 
188a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dag so// ni ba'i blo gros de ltar na/ dmigs pa dang / rgyu dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pade
188a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo // 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhin lngab thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// 'jig tshogs la lta nga nye bar nin/ smon pa thams
188a3(dkon brtsegs): cad nye bar zhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta nye bar nin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gi rtsab bcad na/ yal ga dang lo ma dang / yal
188a4(dkon brtsegs): ga bre'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lha nye bar zhi ba na/ nyon mong sa pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig
188a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na/ nye bar len pa dang / ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo // 'jigatshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par gyur na/ nye bar len
188a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ste/ gnod par mi 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongasu 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// sems can kun nas mi spong ba dang / srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas
188a8(dkon brtsegs): mi slong ba ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnaso// lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin
188b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni/ ni nga'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yong su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun
188b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzod pas yang mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du
188b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs shes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros
188b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs shes bya ba de ni tshogs ma yin pa/ 'byung ba ma yin pa/ rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/ de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa/ kun brtags pa'o// 
188b5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ma yin zhing / kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni/ yod/ sa su brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtags pa ma yin no// yongasu brtag pa ma yin/ rnam par brtag pa ma
188b6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ma yin pa/ bslang ba ma yin pa/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang / bslang ba ma
188b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa/ nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes
188b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/ gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro// mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta
189a1(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na/ me ni rgyu las 'bar gyi/ rgyu medan 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi/ dmigs pa med na ni bar 'gyur/ 
189a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ bam pa dad / zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
189a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su dag pa ni/ dmigs pa ni banyid du yang rab tu shes la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do// nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi skyed la/ pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa yang skyong
189a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dung ngan pa'i nyan mongs pa'i dmigs pa yang spong la/ byang nub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos la dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sas rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa lang dmigs
189a5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang mi len la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems pa yang mi 'dor ro// stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog/ la/ sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni/ dmigs pa la dbang thob ste/ ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la yang nges par sems la/ 
189a7(dkon brtsegs): bsams bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo // mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dmigs pa la yang 'jug la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// 
189a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la yang dpyod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa yang chud mi gson to// smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa yang rnam par mthong la/ khams gsum pa'i/ 
189b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa la yang mi spong ngo // shes rab dang / thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par gyur te/ de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sdug
189b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba la sems gnas so// mi rtag pa la dmigs nas/ 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du gnaso// sdug bsngal la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las
189b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so// bdag med pa la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnaso// 'dod chags la dmigs nas/ sems can 'dod chag
189b4(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// zhe sdang la dmigs nas/ sem sa can zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po
189b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// gti mug la dmigs nas/ sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstar
189b6(dkon brtsegs): par sems gnas so// cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas/ sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnaso// 'dod chags dang bral
189b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la dmigs nas/ nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so// zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems gnaso// gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ byang
189b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so// gzugs la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnaso// sgra la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so// dril dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ba sung thob par bya bar sems gnaso// rol dmigs nas/ de bzhin
190a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro dro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar sems gnas so// reg bya la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gnon pa thob par bya bar sems
190a3(dkon brtsegs): gnaso// chos la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnaso// sbyin pa la dmigs nas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnaso// tshul
190a4(dkon brtsegs): khrims la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnaso// bzod pa la dmigs nas/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i
190a5(dkon brtsegs): bags pa thob par bya bar sems gnaso// brtson 'grus la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad bsgral bar sem sa gnaso// ga sam gtan la dmigs nas/ mngon par
190a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so// shes rab la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun bcad par sems gnaso// byams pa la dmigs
190a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnaso// snying rje la dmigs nas/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so// dga' ba la dmigs nas/ 
190a8(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems gnaso// btang snyoms la dmigs nas/ sems can rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba la sbyar bar sems gnas so// bsdu ba'i
190b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po la dmigs nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so// ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar sems gnaso// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
190b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnaso// gnod sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ bzod pa'i stobs dang / nges pa la sems gnaso// le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas/ 
190b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems gnas so// g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'chal ba'i shes
190b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas/ theg pa chen po yang dag par
190b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par sems gnaso// yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas/ sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so// ngan la gro ngan song yid la byas nas/ ngan 'gro ngan song dang mi khom
190b6(dkon brtsegs): par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab par sems gnas so// lha yid la byas nas 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnaso// mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar
190b7(dkon brtsegs): sems gnaso// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems gnas so// chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ slob dpon chos la dpe ma khyud med
190b8(dkon brtsegs): bar sems gnaso// dge 'dun rje su dran pa yid la byas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnaso// gtong ba rjesu dran pa yid la byas nas/ btang ba thams cad yongasu
191a1(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar sems gnaso// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ smon pa dang / bsam gtan dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yong su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnaso// lha rjes
191a2(dkon brtsegs): dran pa yid la byas nas/ lha thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnaso// lus yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnaso// ngag
191a3(dkon brtsegs): yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnaso// sems yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus byas la dmigs nas/ de bzhin
191a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus ma byas la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/ zhi ba'i blo gros
191a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni/ byang chub
191a6(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su bsngos pa'o// chos thams cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
191a7(dkon brtsegs): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sa las skye ba ni/ skye ba ji lta bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
191a8(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs gang ci yang
191b1(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ de thams cad ri 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang / 
191b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ldan pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang / byas pa ni gzod de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
191b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang / le lo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sem/ 
191b4(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag glen pa dang / rmongs pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang
191b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa na mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag phan 'dog/ sa pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rje su 'chags pa'i sems su mi
191b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag bsngags parjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpar khengs par mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi rjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi bar mi 'gyur ro// 
191b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o// sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// sems can gang dag gdul
191b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o// sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs
192a1(dkon brtsegs): can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su bsrung ba'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub seras dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang / bsdigs/ 
192a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang gdams pa'i blo skye'o// sems can gang dag zur tsar gyis gong de dag la byang chub sems dngas zab mo'i gtam bya bar bya'o// sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa'as
192a3(dkon brtsegs): gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag bkri dgos pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'as gtam go rims su pang ste brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang yi
192a4(dkon brtsegs): ge daskyangs te gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag ni gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o// ga nga dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
192a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtab brjod par bya'o// gang dag tshul khrims la chags ba de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas/ yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag thos
192a6(dkon brtsegs): ba la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chag
192a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad du sbyangs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag ga
192a8(dkon brtsegs): mug che ba de dag la thos pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byams pa'i gtam brjod par
192b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag cha mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skangs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste/ 'di
192b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ste mi sdug pa'i gtam dang byams pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag rjes su 'thun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gdam brjod
192b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ lhag pa'i sems kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la bden pa'i gtam gyi rjes su 'thun pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi
192b4(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag sma dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te byis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag rgyun mi chad par bstan pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag par
192b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du bstan par bya'o// dbang po yong su ma smin pa rnams la ni ma kyi brjod par mi bya'o// gang dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyi 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa gtan la bab pa bstan pa dang
192b6(dkon brtsegs): dab dbod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang gang zag med pa'i gta
192b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o// lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can smod lam la spyod pa rnams la
192b8(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phung po la gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye mched la gnas
193a1(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed
193a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 'phags pa'i rigs
193a3(dkon brtsegs): cho ga shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// lhas 'dul ba rnams laM gcig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// mtshan mas 'dul
193a4(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams la nga'i med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// nyan thos kyi 'dul ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang / de bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la dor nyung ba dang
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba nyung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// spyod pa la zhugs pa'i bya
193a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnabs la 'khor bas yong su mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye ba gcig gis
193a7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang ba med pa dang 'bras bu yod pas
193a8(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab yongs su dag cing / dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa yin/ legs par bshad pas
193b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ri mi skye ba'i chos la
193b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa skyeso// dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bco lnga pa'o// / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gsang ba pa'i
193b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni
193b4(dkon brtsegs): ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongasu
193b5(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
193b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gcod dang shel dang / dngul
193b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas 'od nges 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
193b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ 
194a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ 'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra// zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par bzhugs// nyi ma lta bu mun pa
194a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jom mdzad pa// mi mchog ci'i slad du 'dzum pa bstan// mos pas zhi gnas rdzing du rab tu bzhugs// thugs rje chu bo brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'khrungs// dran pas kha phye yon tan dri zhim ldan/ 
194a3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs pad ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dran pa snod bzang zhi gnas mar lags te/ snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sel mdzad// shes rab mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs
194a4(dkon brtsegs): mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa// rab rib sel ba sred pa skem mdzad pa// 'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni spyong mdzad pa// bde gshegs
194a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen// khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na'ang lhang nge ba/ drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams lha// mi mchog
194a6(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dir ni 'dzum pa mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i blo gros
194a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje thogs nas/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro// 
194a8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir/ 
194b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par byed par 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bzang po pade 'angs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyis dam pa'i chos rub ba na/ de bzhi gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning du skye bar
194b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ nge 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' der skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur/ don gyi
194b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul la yang 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du yang sgrub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed pa
194b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ ded/ ga gi gaman tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
194b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su smin parabyed par 'gyur ro// de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gang gA ri klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
194b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs
194b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur
194b8(dkon brtsegs): ba/ blan mong ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam pa
195a1(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de ni/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyabs dga' ba dang lha dang mi mang bas
195a2(dkon brtsegs): gang ba dang byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang dngul dang / bai DU rA dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dpar/ 
195a3(dkon brtsegs): bos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de mig mangs ris su byas pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bdeng / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po bres pa/ 
195a4(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog gis khebs bar byas pa/ spos kyi snying po dam pas bdugs pa/ steng
195a5(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang lnga'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro// 2 jig rten gyi khams de ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i
195a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod pa dang 'dra ba dang / yid la bsam pas/ zas dang skom dang skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan grub cing legs par brgyan par 'gyuraro// lha dang mi thams cad
195a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang khang pa brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go// 'jig
195a8(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams den 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rung ste/ theg pa gnyis kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems pas
195b1(dkon brtsegs): gtam 'ba' shig gsung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang yang
195b2(dkon brtsegs): cho ga nyams pa 'am/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'am/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ lta ba nyams par mi 'gyur ro// zhar ba'am theng po 'am/ sgur po 'am/ gtum po 'am/ rig pa 'am/ mi
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bsrun pa 'am/ kla klo can nam/ lkug pa 'am/ grum po 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
195b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad thung bar 'a gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro// ni ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam
195b5(dkon brtsegs): par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di ngag dang gzhan yang du yod ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de nam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ sku las/ 'od byung ba
195b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de nas sems can de dag gis 'ong de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyi bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo// de na kha cig ni
195b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa de
195b8(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la shing tal 'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham su skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs nas/ skus khyab par mdzad de sems can thams cad kyi sem
196a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
196a2(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos stod pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'am/ zlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do// seM
196a3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad ni dbang po rna ba/ mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams den chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnod pa de ma gtogs pa/ rgyal po
196a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na nga yid med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med
196a5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu'am/ mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang ba bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'am/ mir
196a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye bar gnas pa dang der lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas/ yid kyis bsams pas 'khor gyi khyamasu bstan pa dang / zas dang
196a8(dkon brtsegs): skom dang / ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod la bab ces gsol pa dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo// gshos gsol nas slar bzhud
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi
196b2(dkon brtsegs): khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par 'di dag dang / gnan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
196b3(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje'i lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog shig ces smod lam yang
196b4(dkon brtsegs): btab bo// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongasu dag pa der skye bar bcom ldan
196b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la ying rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde
196b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyes te/ rdo rjes de namakha'i dkyil du 'phang so// rdo rje de 'bangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// me tog gi char yang dang
196b7(dkon brtsegs): go/ rol mo sil snyan dargya'i sgra yang byung ngo // 'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par yang me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag byung ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
196b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par brjod ngo // chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zang chos kyi mdzod// chos rnams rab tu 'byed la mkhas pa 'gro don zheng // chos la thugs ma zhum zhing
197a1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu lhag par btang // chos kyi rjes 'thun chos sgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag/ yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig
197a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum du grags// ye shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bas ma 'tshal// chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs pa khyod la phag 'tshalo// zla ba las lhag yongs ngag tshul khrims rnam par dag/ 
197a3(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma las lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog/ tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba// dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni sku yang
197a4(dkon brtsegs): ston la sku dang ldan ma lags// khyod ni gsung yang brjod la sgra skad rtog mi mnga'// khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'ang shes bral// sems can thar par mdzad la sems can
197a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes bral// gang dag khyod bstan thos nas ji ltar bstan ltar// bsgrub pa snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs par// 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni// khyod/ 
197a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ka drin lan yon nam yang rngo mi thog/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges// ji ltar thags thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi/ 
197a7(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi phreng ba rnams/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ 'di sa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
197a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams pang sa tog ma tshogs kyi phrengs legs par brgyan par gyur cing / mig mngasaris su gdas pa kun tu snang ngo // gsang baba'i bdag po lag na rje lung bathun pa 'i le ru zhes byas/ 
197b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu drug pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mong // 
197b2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta ba'i lung bstan pas bdag lung bstan to// smras pa/ ci zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod lung bstan// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thob par bya ba med par lung bstan pa thob bo// 
197b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ ci zhig thob pa med/ smras pa/ sems can dang srog dang / gang zag dang gso ba dang / skyes bu thob pa med do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang skye mched rnam thob pa med do// 
197b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dang mi dge ba dang kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa me da ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang
197b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob pa med do// smras pa/ gal te thob pa med na 'dir ci zhig lung bstan/ 
197b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de'i rje su 'gro ba'i ye shes lung bston to// smras pa/ ye shes gang lung bstan/ smras pa/ gang gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba'o// smras pa/ gal te gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur
197b7(dkon brtsegs): na/ lung bstan pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir ye shes gnyis kyis rab tu phyi ba ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyi su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gal te ye shes
197b8(dkon brtsegs): ga'i su med pas rab tu bye ba yi na/ lung ston pa ni su zhig/ lung ni su la ston/ smras pa/ lung ston pa gang yin pa dang su la lung bstan pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'o// de dag ni gnyi su med pa'i mtha' la
198a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'o// smras pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po gnyi su med pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de la lung bstan du ci yod/ smras pa/ mtha' gang yin pa de nyid gnyi su med pa'i mtha' ste mtha' de/ 
198a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis lung bstan pa'o// smras pa/ gang la gnas na lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang yin/ smras pa/ bdag gis mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi mtha' dang srog dang gang zag
198a3(dkon brtsegs): gi mtha' la gnas na/ lung bstan par 'gyur ro// bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnaso// smras pa/ 
198a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang gi gnas yin/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gan sa ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnaso// smras
198a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gan sa yin/ smras pa/ shin tu ma skyes ma byung ba'i mtha'i gan so/ smras pa/ ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin/ smras
198a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha' ni gnas so// smras pa/ rnam par rig pas ci zhig rig par byed/ smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par byed na rnam par rig pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 
198a7(dkon brtsegs): ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed/ smras pa/ rnam par rig pa thams cad rnam par rig par mi byed do// smras pa/ gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes par byed/ smras pa/ gal te kun
198a8(dkon brtsegs): shes par byed na/ rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do// smras pa/ kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi/ 
198b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe rnam par rig pa khas mi len pa'o// smras pa ji ltar na/ rnam par rig pa khas mi len/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rje su mi rgyug pa'o// smras pa/ ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rje su mi rgyug/ smras pa/ gang gi
198b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe don la rten pa'o// smras pa/ don la ston pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don mi mthong ba'o// smras pa/ don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o// / 
198b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos don
198b4(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na de don du gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos don du gnyer ba ni ci yang don du gnyer ba ma yin no// 
198b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni/ chos ma yin te chos su mi rung ngo // smras pa/ chos gang yin/ smras ba/ gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa'o// smras pa/ 
198b6(dkon brtsegs): gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa de la chos gang yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la yi ge rnams kun tu mi 'byung ba de nyid yin no// de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa/ 
198b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu su zhig bdag smra'o zhes smra ba de 'chal par smra ba'o// gang 'chal par smra ba de la chos med do// 'dul ba med do// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang
198b8(dkon brtsegs): chos gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal ba gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhir gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungaso// ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bca
199a1(dkon brtsegs): dam/ de ltar mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigaso// smras pa/ smras na nyes pa ci yod/ smras pa/ ngag gi las kyi
199a2(dkon brtsegs): nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ngag gi las kyi nyes pa ci zhig 'byung / smras pa/ yi ge la sems pas glags pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ nyes pa med pa gang yin/ smras pa/ gang mi smra mi
199a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do// rnam par rig pa med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o// gang bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang / gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa des nyes pa med
199a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsang gang yim smras pa/ nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa// smras pa/ 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/ smras pa/ mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o// smras pa mngon par zhen pa'i rtsab ci yid/ smras pa/ 
199a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ni rtsaba'o// smras pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kur brtags pa'i rtsa ba ci yin/ smras pa/ lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ba ni rtsa ba'o// smras pa/ ci zhig la lhag par
199a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs/ smras pa/ gzugs rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams la lhag par dmigaso// smras pa/ lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gal te sred pa'i bag
199a7(dkon brtsegs): la nyal la lhag par mi dmigs pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de lta bas na/ sred pa la dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa
199a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ro// gnyi su med pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// 
199b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje brnag pa yongasu rdzogs par lung bstan pas/ dbugs byin pa thob ste/ tshim ning mgu la yid rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom
199b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs
199b3(dkon brtsegs): shing / dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par ci gnang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi po brang 'khor na/ gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri zadang / 
199b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phye chen po mang du mchis te/ sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan mthong zhing chos kyang tho sa na/ yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang / bde ba dang
199b5(dkon brtsegs): grub pa dang bde bar 'gyur lagaso// de nas yang khro ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lag so// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don
199b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sman pa dang bde ba dang grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par
199b7(dkon brtsegs): spel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang // nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa'i gnas
199b8(dkon brtsegs): lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad pa rig nas tshim zhing
200a1(dkon brtsegs): mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba
200a2(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste/ rang gi gnas su phyin to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag
200a3(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus
200a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ ba dang / bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya che na po byas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya
200a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam mo// des yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gi sa mngon par shes te/ dus gcig cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas
200a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig
200a7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe
200a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha dang / mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i bkod pa mthong gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gis
200b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal
200b2(dkon brtsegs): bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams
200b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi dbus na gnas par snang ngo // 'khor gyi khyams de yang
200b4(dkon brtsegs): yangs shing rgya che ste/ shar nub tu chur ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa/ lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad ba ni bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ sa bzhi ni bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rang bzhin du
200b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa/ phyir ni an+da rnyil las byas pa/ zung gi phrugs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad mas brgyar pa/ brgyan phreng sna tshogs du mas
200b6(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ ras bcos bu du ma bting ba mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma sbyangs pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba du mas bkab pa/ pog por du ma nas gdugs pa/ lha'i
200b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog kha dog sna tshogs du ma bkram pa/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lus tshim par byed pa/ sems la dga' ba bskyed pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa bsngags pa'i bstan
200b8(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsabs brgyan pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ rin po pad ma bkod pa dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ mig
201a1(dkon brtsegs): mangs ris su bres pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu dum bting ba steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ bkod pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung
201a2(dkon brtsegs): zhal zas ro bro ba brgya pa bsgos pa'ang bsham so// seng ge'i khri la mi can pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag
201a3(dkon brtsegs): bris so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ 
201a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mchod pa mang po yang bsham
201a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ nam nangs pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos chen po rnam
201a6(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gis ngo la khyed dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas par mi
201a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin
201a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang dri za dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba ba dang / lho 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la
201b1(dkon brtsegs): yang / grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ 'angs bcod ldan 'das srung ma can gyi po drang 'khor 'ding sun drangs na/ gshegs par gnang gis de la byed kyis ngan sems med pa dang / sdang med pa nga
201b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dang pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ chos kyang nyon cig ces bsgo'o// 
201b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyang pa/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa/ bzhin bzangs
201b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du
201b5(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshod gsol gyis/ khyed kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu nges byas
201b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa/ lag bzangs shes bya ba la smras pa/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la sa bla ba ri lha rnams nas bzung ste/ bar snang dang rgyal chen bani 'i
201b7(dkon brtsegs): ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab dral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' ba dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha bu rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje'i gnas
201b8(dkon brtsegs): lung lo can gyi po brangar khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis khyed kyi nang na su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yang de ltar bgyi'o zhes ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzangs kyis byas so// 
202a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis/ dpag tshad khri 'khor yug gi bar sdang khyad par gyur te// de nas
202a2(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te/ nam nangs pa dang / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud
202a3(dkon brtsegs): nas tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod dbab gsol ba/ thub pa chen po'i dus 'di lags/ skyes bu gtso bo gshegasu gsol// skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol// skyes
202a4(dkon brtsegs): bu cang shes gshegasu gsol/ thub pa chen po gdugs tshod bab// rkang gnyis gtso bo gsheg su gsol/ rkang gnyis dam pa gsheg su gsol// rkang gnyis cad mkhyen gshegasu gsol// 
202a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims pad+ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs// brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par 'phel// slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa// thub pa pad+ma gshegasu gsol// 'phags pa'i bden par gnas bcas te/ 
202a6(dkon brtsegs): byams dang thugs rje'i spyad mnga' zhing // bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rgyal ba seng+ge gshegasu gsol/ khrims ni rtsab chu ba dran// byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum
202a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// rgyal ba sdong po gshegasu gsol// shes rab rgya chen zab pa po// ting 'dzin chab ni grangs ldan zhing // rnal 'byor pa'i tshong bas bltam// yon tan rgya mtsho gshegasu gsol// thugs rje dkyil
202a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dpal ldan pa// shes rab 'od zer legs par brgyan// spob ma pad+ma kha 'byed pa// thung ba nyi ma gshegasu gsol// phas kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing // rnam thar la sogs sman tshogs can/ 
202b1(dkon brtsegs): slob dang mi slob ri dgas bltag// thub pa'i ri bo gshegasu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gdugs tshod bab par mkhyer nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 
202b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gdugs tshong phab kyis/ chos gos gyon la lhung bzed thogs shig/ zhag bdun byin gyis brlab pa byin gyis rlobs la gtsug lag khang skyong skos shig/ de na nyan
202b3(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis thar snang las dong ngo // gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
202b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis dkyil 'khor gyi khrod du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu na mkha'i dkyil gyis lam nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi sdang bar gyur nas
202b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor// nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du bdang / lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len/ 'od zer ni 'gyed me
202b6(dkon brtsegs): tog gi char ni 'bebs/ rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/ zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa
202b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi lding chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po/ 
202b8(dkon brtsegs): lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga bder namakha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par gshegs pa/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das namakha'i
203a1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil kyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po lngar thogs pa ni mi mngar/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/ rdza banya pa'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ni mtshungs/ lha'i
203a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po brgya byin ltar lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor cing gshegs par rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab
203a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid deb skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man nga ra ba chen po dang longasu
203a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dub dang / yongs su 'dru ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / san 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / sba la dang sbrul chen po dang / mdog/ mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor
203a5(dkon brtsegs): lo chen po dang / dri zhim dang / pad+ma 'dab brgya dang / 'dab stong / dang / skar 'od dang / skar ma dga' dang / kun tu bsrung dang / bsrung rtags dang / rtag tu me tog chags/ mig tu
203a6(dkon brtsegs): stug pa de dag dang me tog gzhan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan ngag kyang bsgreng ngo // rol mo sil snyan brgya stong yang ler to// de nas
203a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang / sil snyan
203a8(dkon brtsegs): dang glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa rnams dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan
203b1(dkon brtsegs): thos chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun kang du bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ sa chen po ngal zhing mi drag la sems can thams cad la yi gnod par
203b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas/ myur ba myung bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyer gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ rtse
203b3(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / 
203b4(dkon brtsegs): spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la ma tshod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'a tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // btsun mo'i 'khor dang
203b5(dkon brtsegs): dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya ga 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa dang / bcom ldan
203b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la brtsams te/ 'khor de ltar 'das pa de dag la de lta bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / glul bum dang / srin po'i 'khor de'i nang nas srog
203b7(dkon brtsegs): chags khri nyis stong gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas/ bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba
203b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing / 'khor dang yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
204a1(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad thogs shing / sil snyan dang / beg rdob pa dang / rol po'i sgra 'byin pa
204a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun kang ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun skor ba
204a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
204a4(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas te/ sil snyan dang rol mo byas nas/ bcom ldana' rangs la phyag byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas par lhan cig tu/ rang gi 'khor gyi khyams
204a5(dkon brtsegs): su spyan pra sau// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi rten pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi seng+ge'i gdan ji ltar bshams pa la bzhug so// byang chub
204a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa dag la 'khod // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong
204a7(dkon brtsegs): ba re dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smraso// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsu bgyis shig/ mchod pa dang rim gro gyis shig/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de la gang dag yi rang ba dang
204a8(dkon brtsegs): zhal ta bya ba byed pa ni de dag bsod nams skal ba can de dag yon ni chung ba min zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed kyis rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa dang / zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
204b1(dkon brtsegs): nams bya ba'i dngos po long shig/ de nas lnga'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo // de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 
204b2(dkon brtsegs): 'on te gsang ba ba'i bdag po'i 'am/ su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de dag gi bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyis brlabs yin te/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas
204b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
204b4(dkon brtsegs): dkong pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos stor ba der/ gsang nga nga'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod nga rngang pa 'di lta bu mthong nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams
204b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ding byin gyis brlabaso zhes sgra thos so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdar de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de ras de'i tshe ljang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi
204b6(dkon brtsegs): dwags dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba dang lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khor pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
204b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'dud do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ khyed
204b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus la lhan cig tu tshur sheg/ ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang ba
205a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ rang gi laganas gus par bsti stang du byas te/ bza' ba dang bca' nga dang
205a2(dkon brtsegs): gsod pa dang / ro bro ba rnam pa mang po du ba dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang
205a3(dkon brtsegs): chung sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstangs te tshim par byaso// bstangs te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed skus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas
205a4(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das
205a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal du bltas te thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// lcang lo can du gshegs nas gshos gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// // de nas gsang ba ba'i
205a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ ci nas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog
205a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba ba dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar
205a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / khyad par gyis khyad du mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces
205b1(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad
205b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gang la zhugs na/ khyang bar du 'phags par 'gyur zhing nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyed la bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
205b3(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes gsol te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
205b4(dkon brtsegs): to// grogs po dag 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bsam bu thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dang pa yin/ dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la
205b5(dkon brtsegs): lha 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / ser sna med par btang gtong ba dang / lag pa brkyang ste gas+ho nga ba la dga' ba dang / mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang / gto
205b6(dkon brtsegs): ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / 
205b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / som nyi med la the tsom mi za zhing / yid gnyis mi za ba yin/ de dkar po dang nag po'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi za bar rig nas/ srog gi phyir yang mi byang mi
