205b8(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang 'anab sems dang gnod
206a1(dkon brtsegs): / sems dang / log par ltang spangs pa yin te/ mi dge babacu'i las kyi las la mi dmigs pa yin no// de dang bar gyur nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze gang dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang
206a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / des pa dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa
206a3(dkon brtsegs): dang zhi ba dang dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo bzlog phod par smra zhing gtsam bur mi smra ba dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / mi dge ba'i chos yongasu spong ba dang / mi rgod pa dang mkhengs pa dang / mu cor smra ba
206a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / tshig ma 'chal pa dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / som
206a5(dkon brtsegs): nyi las nges par rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / yang srid pa las rgal ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnam pa de lta
206a6(dkon brtsegs): la dge ba'i bshis gnyen du rig nas bsten to// bsnyen to// bsnyen bkur byed do// mnyes par byed cing / mi mnyes par mi byed la dgyes par byed de/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes
206a7(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang
206a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par stod/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur bas/ sgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar yang dag par ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa'i 'o 'dzir sbyid
206b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par smi pa'o// 'di ni ser snga'o// 'di ri ser sna'i rnang par srir pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrim so// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni bzong pa'o// 'di ni bzod ba'i rnam par smin pa
206b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni brtson 'grus so// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni bsam gtan no// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni shes rab po// 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 
206b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab bo// 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes pa
206b4(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa 'o// 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi nyes par
206b5(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi nyes
206b6(dkon brtsegs): par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni dge ba'o// 'di ni mi dge ba'o// 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di ni byang ma yin pa'o// 'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang / phar
206b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bde ba dang grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag chos kyi gtam gyi yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang
206b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par dga' bar mdzad do// de nas de dag snod du rung bar mkhyen nas/ zang mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam nga
207a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa'i gtam dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam
207a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di ni med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/ 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig
207a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming rang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ 
207a4(dkon brtsegs): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred dba'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa 'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis/ rga sha~M dang / mya ngan dang
207a5(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal rgya phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di med
207a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang
207a7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred
207a8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba gagag/ skye ba 'gags pas na shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
207b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// de la don dam par na 'byung ba 'am/ 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do// de ci
207b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o// 'di la 'jug pa 'am ldog pa'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos
207b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med de/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu gti mug pas/ khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa'i rje su 'jug pa dang las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi
207b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dod pa 'byung ba ni ma gtog so// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi ngan du yong su brtags na/ chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por
207b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba med de/ gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug/ pa med/ ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o// de chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas/ som nyi med do the tsom mi za'o// 
207b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la ma chag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chag so// de mig dang gzugs dang mig gi
207b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa la mi chag so// rnang dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chag so// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / chos thams
207b8(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid che so// grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun
208a1(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ba dang 'bral
208a2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur// 
208a3(dkon brtsegs): de brtson 'grus brtsams ngas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro// chung ma dang bu dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang / brang mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba 'ongs su 'dzin pas yongasu spyod pa
208a4(dkon brtsegs): don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur te/ den tshad gzhon nur rnam par rtseb la mi dga'ar bas/ na tshad mdzes pa la bad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dang pas/ khyim nas
208a5(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu byung nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / dge ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'thob po// 
208a6(dkon brtsegs): de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to// sgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no// mang du thos pa yongasu btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin te/ 
208a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang / bkur bsti dang tshig su bcad pa la mi bar gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to// bdag gi tshig gi rjesu 'brang bar gzhan dag
208a8(dkon brtsegs): la chos mi ston to// de ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gnan dag la chos ston to// chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po 'thob bo// sems can thams cad la ni snying rje chen po/ 
208b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed // demang du thos par gyur pas lus pa zlog la mi lta ba yin/ 'dod bachung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rabatang ben pa dang mthu smra ba dang / gso srab dang / dgon pa dang bas mthar ngon par
208b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la yongasu rtog pa yin no// don la ston pa yin te tshig 'bru la ston pa ma yin no// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par gyur pa yin no// 
208b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'da' zhig gi phyir brtson pa pa yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phying / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di la ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yong su tshol lo// ngag yong ba lhur len pa yang
208b4(dkon brtsegs): yin te de la bag yod nga gang zher/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po sdom pa 'o// de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtogs su mi 'dzin pa yin no// de gzugs rnams
208b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu she so// de bzhin du rnabs sgra rnams dang / snas dri rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis
208b6(dkon brtsegs): reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtag su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa
208b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di ni bgayod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang dag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gnan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' bsel ba
208b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos la dga' nga'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gdod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam pa che ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgya med pa dang / 
209a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'i chung chags pa dang / ldang dang / ga sug gi rtsub med pa dang / lus kyi shes par spong ba'i rgyung med pa dang / ngag gi zhes par snang ba chub me dang / yid kyishes pa
209a2(dkon brtsegs): srung ba'i rgyub med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyub med pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'dzin pag yong pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag gyur napa ga yong bar
209a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang / rtag tu 'thun pa dang chos don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod
209a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag po ngang pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol tu ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yi na te/ de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la mi 'gro'o// 'bag
209a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro// gsang ba ba'i bdagapo gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te/ sangs rgyas mthong ba
209a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams mnyes par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam la yang gnaso// che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas/ che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par
209a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin tu grub pa dang bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson par
209a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gsang 'a ba'i bdag po sngon gyi dge ba'i chub rnams kyis/ 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar ltung de ba la ltos/ gas ba pa'i bdag pa del dge ba'i chub las mong su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shi
209b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun par byar// gsang ba ba'i bdag pa ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yang su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po bag yong bar gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnapas ni dge ba'i rtsa las nyams par mi 'gyur/ 
209b2(dkon brtsegs): de la ngag long pa ni sems rjesu srung ba dang yul 'dor ba dang / 'a ba la dga' ba rnam par spang ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba la bsnyen pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnong sems kyi rnam par
209b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa dang rnam par 'che ba'i rnab par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyub med pa dang / mi dge ba rnams dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyub med pa dang chag pa dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med
209b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lus dang gdang yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi chub med pa nas/ nyams pa'i mdang 'thun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi sgrub med bste/ 'dod pag yong pa zhes bya'o// 
209b5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa da/ brtsod 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang / dang pa/ byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson
209b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des/ dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o// dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi
209b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// gsang ba
209b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang long ba de yang yod par rab tu shes so// gang med pa de yang med par rab tu sheso// de la yod pa ni gang med pa gang zhe na/ yang dag par
210a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ 'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o de la med pa gang zhe na/ log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ 
210a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni med pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang las dang rnam par smin pa ni yod do// gang las de dang rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do// gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid ni
210a3(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa med do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la byang chub yod do// le lo can la ni byang chung med do// phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga
210a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni yod do// rgyu med pa'i las chos 'byung ba ni med do// gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzu gas ni yod do// rtag pa dang brtan pa dang ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i
210a5(dkon brtsegs): chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do// de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
210a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa ni yod do// rtag pa dang brtan pa dang ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do// gnan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis
210a7(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams shes bya ba de dag ni yod do// ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams shes bya de dag med do// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa de
210a8(dkon brtsegs): med do// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs shes bya ba de ni yod do// rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs shes bya ba de med do// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yong
210b1(dkon brtsegs): mang dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de med do// skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// skye ma ched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod ngo do// reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod / 
210b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa red na tshor zhes bya ba de med do// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// tshor ba med na sreng pa zhes bya ba de med do// sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod ngo // sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de
210b3(dkon brtsegs): reng ngo // len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod ngo do// srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de meng ngo // skye ba'i rkyen gyis
210b4(dkon brtsegs): rga shi dang mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do// skye ba med na rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
210b5(dkon brtsegs): yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs pa rnams med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dbu la por 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba
210b6(dkon brtsegs): ni yod ngo // tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do// thos pas shes rangab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod ngo do// thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do// bsgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod // 
210b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na/ nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod ngo do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba
210b8(dkon brtsegs): med do// mngor ba'i ngargyal caran la ni kun shes pa brda' sprod pa med do// mngon pa'i de rgyal can med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yong ngo do// gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong ba nyid ni yod de// 
211a1(dkon brtsegs): nang gi rjesu song ba'i bdag ni med do// ye shes dang ldan nga la ni thar pa yod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do// bdag gam/ sems can ram/ srog gam/ gang
211a2(dkon brtsegs): zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na bdag yong pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas/ 'jig rten dmakhas pa rnams la yong par grags
211a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni long bar rab tu shes so// 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chagaso med do zhes tha snyad 'dog
211a4(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang mi chags te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa gsungs pa yang dag pa'i rjesu rtog so// gsang ba pa'i bang ga po de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus
211a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam par gzhag go/ bzhi gang sher/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze zag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe rings dza/ rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir/ 'du byed
211a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde dar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams
211a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / rna bar rtog pa la spyod pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir/ mya ngan 'das pa ni ni ba zhes bya ba'o// 
211a8(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dwag so// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla drag so// bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
211b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi tshig bla dag so// mya ngan las 'das pani ni nga'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla drag so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing / tshul bzhin
211b2(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las mi nyams zhing yong su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongasu
211b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na
211b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ji ltar 'jig rten bskyang bar brgya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po na po ngani la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po
211b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyong shig/ de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa
211b6(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma dag la mi 'byo ba dang / chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / tha bar
211b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig med de zher mi 'debs pa dang / tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/ gzhan la mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa mang ba dang / gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang lta ba yongs su
211b8(dkon brtsegs): dag cing yang dag par song ba ste/ grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar bya'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de
212a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang thams cad du 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can
212a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/ grogs po dag chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa la
212a3(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams
212a4(dkon brtsegs): cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur bri'i chos dga' ba byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba/ bla mar bya ba
212a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin du ston/ ba dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / 
212a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la byam pa'i ngag dang / yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / 'gal
212a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang / gsum pa'o// rnyed pa gang dag chos dang
212a8(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa chos kyi rnyed pa tha na ltung bzed kyi nang du chud ba 'am/ lhung bzed gtogs pa de'u bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rnyed par bya'o snyam
212b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed ba dang / dga' bar byang dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdub
212b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o// tshul khrims ma nyams pa skyon med pa/ 'dren pa ma yin pa/ sra sre ma yin pa/ rang dbang can ma 'phags pa mkhas pas bsngags pa/ mangs pa
212b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par spyod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smang ba/ gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu/ tshul khrims 'thur par
212b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed/ pra dang / mgu bar bya ba dang / bla mar byed pa dang /  nga du 'ong bar byed pa dang / 'ga' bar bya ba dang / 
212b5(dkon brtsegs): mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / sbu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'o// lta ba gang / 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba/ nges par 'byed
212b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i cha dang 'thun pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bu'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa rnams dang lhan cig
212b7(dkon brtsegs): tu lta ba 'thun par bya'o snyam du 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya
212b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste/ grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar
213a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa spangs pas/ 
213a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas 'gro nga ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ste/ grogs po dag
213a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes
213a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / khrel yod pa ste/ chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten slong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ dben pa ni 'jig rten
213a5(dkon brtsegs): skyong bar byed pa bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong byed/ gya gyuramed pa 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/ grog po dag chos ga cig po de ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag de
213a6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten skyong bar byed do// grogs po dag khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas/ 'jig rten skyong shig/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// 
213a7(dkon brtsegs): danas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas/ 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun
213a8(dkon brtsegs): ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang
213b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i bdag po ngas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gsu gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa/ de dag pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas/ 'gro ba la phan pa dang bde ba'i bying ngas sems kyis drad
213b2(dkon brtsegs): bas/ gang dag smras pa/ de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs
213b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar tsog tsog por 'dug nas lag pa gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ 
213b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smraso// 'di lta ste/ a hAs/ hu la bA tI/ du la raN+Da/ a gu hA/ tsatsa tsatsatsa/ ni ShA ra NA/ kru tA/ krag/ kA ya/ ak+ka ya sa mA/ sha ma
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ka rA/ brtul hub ti/ khi la ba te/ kin A gi ti/ nis sa rat+ti/ dza dzA/ dza dza ma ta~M/ a ba nA/ bi ban/ pa tA/ bar+d+ha/ nus ri NI/ b+hu tA/ nu smai ti ho/ ma nu Sha nu
213b6(dkon brtsegs): s+thi ti ho/ de bA nu s+thi ta ho/ nA gA nA ma/ yag krA Na ma/ gan d+ha rmA nA ma/ kin na ra NA ma/ ma ho ra ga tA ma/ swa stir b+ha ba tu sarba sad ta nA ma/ bai ki ran tu ma hA pa ra rba tA/ sam bya tha tAn d+ha
213b7(dkon brtsegs): na~M/ gardzu tras mu dra big/ a ti// gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'ang bshad pa na/ lha yi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos so// sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po yang rang tu
213b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugaso// de thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang 'dar pang pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi
214a1(dkon brtsegs): khams de la zhabs gcig gis reg par mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhangs la ma reg tsam du nye bar 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol
214a2(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag la gnod lag so// bdag cag la rab tu gnod lag so// bdag cag 'angar bang pang lag so// 
214a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos
214a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po khrugs pa dang / khyed kyang nam par la granas nas/ rab tu g.yos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyam su/ 
214a5(dkon brtsegs): ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan to// 
214a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa/ dam po dgu pa/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i dra bas mngon par
214a7(dkon brtsegs): bkab nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba
214a8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can
214b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i byams pa chen po dang yong su mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po dang bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor ba'i ting nge
214b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum yongasu sbyong ba'i ye shes dang / bden pa mthong ba sbyang bar bya ba sgrib pa med pa dang / 
214b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan pa/ bla na med pa
214b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes bco ma ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a
214b5(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag/ par mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
214b6(dkon brtsegs): gnor nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis brtan pa yin/ 
214b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis bstan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin/ sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges par 'byung ba yin/ chos la rtag par mos pa yin/ 
214b8(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
215a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi snga ngas mi skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos dum dang ldan na/ bgyi ba thams cad la dbang ldan par
215a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur te/ ba ni gang zhe na/ legs par bsgoms
215a3(dkon brtsegs): shing nyams par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgos yongasu bsgos pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i
215a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyi rjesu rnam par rgyu ba'i thab sa dang / shes rab las nges par byung ba yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bya ba
215a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byung
215a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang skad thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa
215a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad pa bstan pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/ gzhon nu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
215a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ snying rje bar bya
215b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang / phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang / rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
215b2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i stobs dang / 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'i stobs dang / sems can bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang / bdud tshar bcad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / sems can
215b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gzhon du dgu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong sa
215b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na gsang nga ba'i bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ de dag bzod pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
215b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsang ba ba'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / semasacan sdod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba
215b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas bcom
215b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i
215b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / bdud dang pas kyis rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcang bar bya ba'i phyir/ ngas khyod la bskul gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang
216a1(dkon brtsegs): nub snying po mchog dab pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang / bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na tshar bcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi bzhi gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang / kha dor byas pa
216a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag la khyod spongs par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos brag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
216a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nga btud nas/ de'i tshi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smraso// tad+ya thA/ hu lu/ ha lA hu le/ d+hi ri/ dA rI te/ a ku sha la krA ye/ 
216a4(dkon brtsegs): tsa le/ tsa le ba ti/ sA re/ kU re/ krAn ting le/ kle me/ !na ti ka ra/ krA me/ hu lu/ a li khi/ kha re ba re/ a be sha ni/ sa re Ne/ dza le/ dza ya ba ti/ s+thi re/ a ba r+Ne/ bi ba
216a5(dkon brtsegs): rte/ a ba rta ni/ me tri b+hu tA nAn+da/ sa gra te/ nga me/ da med sa ma/ ban ne/ tir+Ne ta ra la se sa yan/ swa sti pe b+h+yo/ na ge/ b+h+yo/ ya kre b+h+yo/ gan d+harba rAkra se b+h+yo/ ma nuSha a ma nu She b+h+ya swa sIr/ 
216a6(dkon brtsegs): b+ha ba tu sa da su kham/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// ri'i rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur// chu'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrug/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod
216a7(dkon brtsegs): bas/ pas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang chong// chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus// chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs// gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni// lha tshogs kun tu dga' gyur nas// dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur
216a8(dkon brtsegs): zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos// 'khor kyang rab tu 'dar gyur nas// me'i dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la// gtug pa byas te skyabs su dong // de dag mi 'jigs der
216b1(dkon brtsegs): byin nas// ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal te// mdo 'di byin gyis brlab pas na// dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag
216b2(dkon brtsegs): bdun 'das su sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas/ zhag bdun 'das te/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas// gas
216b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/ namakha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni
216b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas/ lha bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding du mas ni bskor/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
216b5(dkon brtsegs): rnon skyong ba rnams kyis ni/ mngon par bstod/ 'od zer gyi drab ni rab tu 'gyed/ rol mo sil snyan ni len/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs// ning rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad cing
216b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / 
216b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/ sngar
216b8(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byon to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'brang bar gyur to// bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu pa'o// 
217a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos cher po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhug so// de ras bcom ldan 'das phyi ma red kyi dus kyi
217a2(dkon brtsegs): nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to// de nas rgyal po'i khad kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das slar
217a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par rig ras/ phyim red kyi dus kyi tshe me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ras byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / 
217a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'a ngas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes
217a5(dkon brtsegs): dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na 'dun khang na mchis mchis na/ gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis te 'di skad ces mchi'o// 
217a6(dkon brtsegs): yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang nga ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo caran gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol nas/ slar gshegs shes gda'o zhes mchi nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
217a7(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di snyam du bsam te/ gang gi slad du gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang sems can yongs su srir bar mdzad pa'i
217a8(dkon brtsegs): slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas 'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gtang ba'i sems can de ni/ sems can gyi ris na gang yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnabs
217b1(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung bstan pas/ gsang ba ba'i bdag
217b2(dkon brtsegs): po lag na rdo rje dga' bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji
217b3(dkon brtsegs): snyid cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na/ des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
217b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on gyis kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro// 
217b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gAng+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas
217b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de dag ni gam nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad
217b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ nges na spongs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang / 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med
217b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba'i yang rgya che ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus nam spang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya
218a1(dkon brtsegs): bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes du 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
218a2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod de/ rigs kyi bu khyad kyis lus
218a3(dkon brtsegs): ngang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' shig yang dag par stod to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe byang chub sengal dpa' stobs shes bya ba 'khor der 'dus
218a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang / 'a rnams lus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsams
218a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal bltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du myur du blan
218a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni/ le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam bdag bgyid do// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
218a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
218a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zher/ 
218b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la nos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni yang bde'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
218b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa/ de lta de ltar bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ slad kyi ci zhig bgyi
218b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyad yul du bgyi ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
218b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing / sems can gyi don la brtson pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong ba 'gyur
218b5(dkon brtsegs): chos tshad ma mchis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du dgyid
218b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rje su 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni btang snyom su ltung ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyis sems can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ning
218b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'tshal zhing sems can yongs su
219a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lagaso// de ci'i slang zher/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lag/ 
219a2(dkon brtsegs): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongasu
219a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa'as rang gi spyod yul la gnas par bgyi'o// rgyal po chen po de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi
219a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa/ legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sa rang gi
219a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gyi bya ba de dag la gus par byas te/ rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i gzhan gyis spyod yul la spyad par/ mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
219a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yong su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang / byang chub
219a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la khams gsum du yang mtshams sbyor ba dang / sel ba dang / sdud
219a8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang / zad pa yang shes la bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la yang
219b1(dkon brtsegs): mangs pa dang / skye ba med par yang rab tu rtogs la bsam bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sems can yang med la sems can yongs su smin par byed la yang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad dben
219b2(dkon brtsegs): bar shes la dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad namakha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la yang mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas
219b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chos kyi sku yin par yang shes la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongasu tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shas la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
219b4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su spyod la dor nyung zhing / bya ba nyung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ci bya'o cog la yang
219b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas la lus dang sems dben par dga' ba yang shes pa dang / chos bstan pa yang mi 'dor la/ smra ba la smad pa la yang mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan yang bskyed la
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi byed pa dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa shes la sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rje su yang 'jug cing / gtam yang dag par ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang 'byung ba med
219b7(dkon brtsegs): par yang shes la/ bsams bzhin du srid pa yang yong su 'dzin pa dang / lhag mthong yang shes la 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul
219b8(dkon brtsegs): yang yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi yul
220a1(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo// rgyal po chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des/ ba
220a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod las spyod yul yongasu dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
220a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yong su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag
220a4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ byang chub se mas dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos tha/ mas cad lag pa snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di la
220a5(dkon brtsegs): ste dper bgyi na/ gnas lags pa dang / gzugs snang / ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang na mkha'i spyod yul sgrib pa ma mchis pas/ gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni
220a6(dkon brtsegs): namakha'i spyod yul lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so// bcom
220a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugasu gda' ba thams cad ni namakha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug gi shing ljon pa 'am/ sman gyi shing ljon pa
220a8(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa 'am/ me tog gi shing ljon pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa 'am/ spos kyi shing ljon pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni dmakha' las rnam par
220b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel yang / mamakha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag par yang mi 'gyur/ rje su chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags// bcom ldan
220b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni/ chos thams cad lags te/ so so'i skye bo'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / slob pa'i chos
220b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ de dag thams
220b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni nges mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs ni rtsa'am/ nag/ sa tshal gang yang rung ste/ de las mi 'bros kyi de dag thams
220b5(dkon brtsegs): cad ni me sgron gsal bar 'bar bar bgyid pas/ phan par/ gyur pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi me sgron 'bar bar bgyid pas/ chos thams cad ni/ 
220b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na tshan po che'i lus ni zhugs kyi mi tshig/ mtshon gyis mi khums/ dug gi mi 'gum ste de la pha rol gyi gnod
220b7(dkon brtsegs): pas mi tshug so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyang nyan thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par dgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa
220b8(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
221a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'di lta ste dper bgyi na nor bu rin po cha chab dang bar bgyid pa ni/ rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rin po
221a2(dkon brtsegs): che yang sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs 'bral byed 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug dang lhan cig tu'ang mi
221a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas la/ dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa yang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am/ rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams dang
221a4(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'di sa na chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul la
221a5(dkon brtsegs): so// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de skad bsdu nab na srog chags brgya stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sem
221a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyis brgyan mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyeso// rgyal po chen po 'di snyam du de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par spyod kyi/ gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' snyos
221a7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur te/ 
221a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu dgoso// de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas// dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
221b1(dkon brtsegs): dengs rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du semasate/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de lci zhig gam/ ban te yang bzhig gang gi phyir na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lag rdo rje'adi
221b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi shugs chen po bdog pa zhes bya snyamo// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces
221b3(dkon brtsegs): smraso// rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci ba yang yin la yang ba yang yin no// smras pa ci'i phyir na lci ba yin la ji ltar na yang ba yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang
221b4(dkon brtsegs): dregs pas sems pa rnams yongs su gdul ba'i phyir lci ba yin no// sems can nga rgyal med pa dang drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa
221b5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje de sa'i steng du ban/ ga ba dang / de bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yoso// de nas
221b6(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i ste 'di nas theg shig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi
221b7(dkon brtsegs): shugs chen po dang ldan pas rdo rje de stobs kyi shugs thams cad kyis gdeg par 'dod na/ skra'i rtse mo tsam yang bskyod pa 'am bskul bar ma nus nas/ de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas
221b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang ya lad bskon pa'i glang po che yang lag pa ya gcig gi gdegs
222a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung nga 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul pa'i rdo yang ma thog na gdeg par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis
222a2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lcis 'di la khyod yi ma chad cig/ de nas rgyal ngo ma skyes dgras lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ko ru shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na dza
222a3(dkon brtsegs): rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang stobs kyi shugs thams cad bstan kyang / rdo rje de bskyong pa 'am bskul
222a4(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nuso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed
222a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag pa zangs ris kyi/ shing rta dpag tshad bdun brgya pa drag tu mchi ba yang 'dzin pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rjes chung ngu 'di bsgyu
222a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ bskul ba'i rngo ma thog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di ni ldi ste 'di la nga'i byin
222a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs ma yin par rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lci ba yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po ri rang ji tsam du lci ba ni dpe bgyi bar yang sla ba/ 
222a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko ru shika rdo rje 'di'i lci ste ko'u shi ka gal te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi khor yug gi ril bsnun na/ 
222b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang dper na phug ma spar gang gtor ba bzhin du rnam par 'thor te/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di'i stobs kyi shugs ni de tsam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad
222b2(dkon brtsegs): ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas tshe dang
222b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du/ rdo rje 'di gdag par ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de
222b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de la bzung ba dang / stong ga/ sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/ chu yang gnam du rgal cing / 
222b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa 'am/ skul bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na
222b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan
222b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar dbang che bar grags pa de ltar mthu che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthol gcig tu 'jog go// bco
222b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang dper na mi la la zhig gis/ kar sha pa ni gcig 'dzub mo'i rtse mos bsgre bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis skye bzlog go// bcom
223a1(dkon brtsegs): // ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mchi ba ya ba dag gis thogs par bgyid // r-i'i rgyal po rab kyang lag pa la gcig gis blangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
223a2(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'phen to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo de gnyis kyang brtul to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du yang mchis/ bdag gis ri rab tsam
223a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis kham de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul ba'i rdo yang ma thog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongasu
223a4(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs nga las yongs su nyams pa ni med
223a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs 'di/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrugs par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag
223a6(dkon brtsegs): gis lha smos kyang ci dgos/ mo'u dgal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa 'am bskul bar nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas
223a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar mi nus// tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni rmobs che ba lags/ 
223a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri rab ji snyed yod pa de dag ri cig tu gyur kyang de ni gdeg par nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di
223b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gdeg par mi nuso// de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang bas/ gsang ba pa'i
223b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje 'dir stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te/ ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pha ma las gyur pa lags sam/ 
223b3(dkon brtsegs): 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu pha ma las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yang rung ste/ 'dug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do// 
223b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mo myo pora'agyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta sta
223b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis phyogs thams cad du kun tu gzigs te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas
223b6(dkon brtsegs): theg shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par byas nas/ sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te/ 
223b7(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang las 'phangs nas des de bar snang la lan bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas pas bzhag go// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ gas
223b8(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sems can
224a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces smraso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem
224a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ stobs 'di lta bu 'thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ stobs 'di lta bu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
224a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang / srog ni yong su gtong gi/ dam pa'i chos ni yongasu mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad bdud cing / nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / sems
224a4(dkon brtsegs): can mthu chung ngu rnams la bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa dang / sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa
224a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can nad pa rnams yang dag pa'i gso ba bya bar spro bar/ nga sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la
224a6(dkon brtsegs): rdo thal gyis skud pa dang / sems can rnams la kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig sgrogs pa dang / sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba dal ba chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang
224a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu 'thob bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa lags shing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba
224a8(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 
224b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ bka' blo bde ba dang / drang ba dang mnyen pa dang / nges pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / phra dog med pa dang / sems la su rung ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpal
224b2(dkon brtsegs): chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan ra/ cang shes par 'gyur zhing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba du zhig mchis/ 
224b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang she na/ gang gi tshe mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de'i tshe/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
224b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / ralha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur
224b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / khyim bdag tshong dpon du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung / kha mnyes par byed pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag ni
224b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyis 'gro ba'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dang pa'i rgyu
224b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thun pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni longs spyod // gsol pa/ bcom ldan
224b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni shes rab bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 
225a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po tshul khrims kyi rgyu mthun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod pa'i rgyu 'thun
225a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni sems can rjes su srung ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
225a3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thur pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol pa/ 
225a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos
225a5(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun paci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen kho chos nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni the tsom spong ba'o// sol pa/ bcom ldan las chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu 'thun
225a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni som nyi med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben par gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' sprul pa/ 
225a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po dben par gnas pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po
225a8(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni 'bral ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni yongs su
225b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa 'thob bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'as sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar len pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom
225b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
225b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po zhi ba thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar ni ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka'
225b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus dang / sems dben pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci
225b5(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lus dang sems dben ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa
225b6(dkon brtsegs): ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa ni/ 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa
225b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po mos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu mthun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
225b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po
226a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta bu bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gso
226a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba su'i lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su dang ba bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang bskyes pa su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su byang
226a3(dkon brtsegs): chung tu sems bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
226a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das su'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa lags/ ba/ 'a stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o// gso dal pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po bskyed pa de ji lta bu lags/ 
226a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji ltar sems can rnams la rma ngasu mi gtong ba bskyed pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom lda/ 'das ji ltar na/ sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba lags/ 
226a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi bde ba yongasu gtong ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba gtong ba ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su dkon mchog gsum
226a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi gtong ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog gsum yongasu mi gtong ba su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de
226a8(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par
226b1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa lags par bcas pa dang / ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa rje su 'thun pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chab mi 'tshal ba dang / 
226b2(dkon brtsegs): rtag pa dang chad pa ma mchis pa dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa bstan pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang / mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar
226b3(dkon brtsegs): lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa/ dag ma gtogs par/ 'di ltar rgya che zhing 'dri ltar gya
226b4(dkon brtsegs): nom pa'i bstan pa 'di la brtson pa rnams la su zhig bzlog par bgyi dra/ gnod par bgyid/ spong bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la byas pa mi gzo ba
226b5(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi'o// gang gi mthus bdag nyid nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thamasacad dang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis sha dang / khrag gis kyang bka'
226b6(dkon brtsegs): drin glan pa'i ngo mi thog pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus bdag gi bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang / chos snang ba chen po thob par bgyis pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu
226b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bdag gis lan glan pa'i rngo mi thog lag so// tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di mtha' dag ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo zhes bgyi ba ni
226b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o// ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
227a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa// bar po bcu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gas
227a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ bcom ldan
227a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di kho bo'i dbang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig sprul na/ kho bo'i sprul pa gzugs tha dad pa/ rnam
227a4(dkon brtsegs): par rtsen pa tha dad pa yang de snyed de dag gi rje su 'brang ba yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba ba'i
227a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba ba'i bdag po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi
227a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ rigs kyis bu chos
227a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyed pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma smyos pa/ zad par mi 'gyur ba/ 
227a8(dkon brtsegs): nub par mi 'gyur ba'o// yi ge gang dag gis don gang brjod pa'i don de yang nub par bya bar mi nus pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni nub par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o// 
227b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir ne na/ de la skye ba ci yang med do gang skye ba med pa de mi 'gag go// bcom ldan 'das 'di la dgongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste chos rnams kyi chos
227b2(dkon brtsegs): shing dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin 'di ni 'dug pa nyid do zhes gsungs te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'gal ba yin no// gang rten cing
227b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba de dam pa'i chos yin no// dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de rtag par mi nub ste/ nges na dam pa'i chos shes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i
227b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pade dag gang du go mgyon/ smras pa/ gang dag dam pa'i chos yong su bzung ba'i phyir go mgyon pa de dag ni/ chos tham
227b5(dkon brtsegs): cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba yin/ smras pa/ yi ge dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/ chos dang ni nam yang
227b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro// de la gang dag mi dag la ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos
227b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros yod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni stong pa nyid du smra ba yin te/ 
227b8(dkon brtsegs): des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang bdag dang bdag gir smra ba yin la de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa
228a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag dang bdag gi med par smra ba yin te/ des na des 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la/ de ni rgyun las bzlog ste/ 'gro bas/ 
228a2(dkon brtsegs): des na de 'jig rten thams cad 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni tshe 'di lhur len pa yin la/ de ni tshe rabs 'pho ba lhur len pa yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten gyi phung po dang / kham
228a3(dkon brtsegs): dang skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la de ni/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ des na 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis na
228a4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos songs su 'dzin to// smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yongasu
228a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin te/ bdag yongs su mi 'dzin sems can yongs su mi 'a dzin/ chos yongasu mi 'dzin to// smras pa/ ji ltar yongs su 'dzin/ smras pa/ bdag dben pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / 
228a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dben pa dang bdag dang / sems can dang chos dben pa ma yin pa dang / 'das pa dben pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang da ltar byung ba dben pa dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus dben
228a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa ma yin pa dang / ning dben pa dang zhing dben pa ma yin pa dang
228a8(dkon brtsegs): chos dben pa dang chos dben pa ma yin par gang de ltar chos rnams rje su rtogs pa de ni dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba
228b1(dkon brtsegs): gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa leg so// leg so// 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin
228b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang gang chos thams cad la mtshan ma dang spros par mi 'dzin pa dang / kun tu spyod pa med pa dang gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing / rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal po
228b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
228b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' ni nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/ nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka'o// bcom ldan 'das de la gang dag dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye
228b5(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba lags te/ de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags/ mchod pa ma lags 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lag so// gang dag zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs
228b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 'dor bar ba de ltar 'dzin to// lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas/ dge slong stong ni sems rnam par grol lo// 
228b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ni nga'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras// lha'i bu spongs pa 'di su'i yin/ smras pa/ spongs pa
228b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni su ngag chags thams cad spangs pa dang / tshig gi lam thams cad med pa dang / don dam pa brjod du med pa dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gis spobs pa yin no// smras pa/ 
229a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu spobs pa ji ltar skye/ smras pa/ spobs pa med pa dang / spobs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe/ spongs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i
229a2(dkon brtsegs): tshig go// spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spobs pa med pa'i tshig go// rigs kyi bu 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin zhes smras pa la 'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / 
229a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su dmigs pa la yang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la yang mi gnas pa de'i spobs
