289b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lung nod pa dang / kha dog 'gyid par gyur pa de dag thams cad/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
289b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad shes rab dang spobs pa/ mtha' yas
289b8(dkon brtsegs): bathob par ma gyur pa de srid du / bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing
290a1(dkon brtsegs): der gang na kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyag mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshang ma mchis bdag kun tu gangar ba 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi phyi
290a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ganga' ba de lta bu'i 'od gsal bar mgyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob
290a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ bar snang gi bar las/ lha dang mi'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i bdug pi rigs bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la 'os pa dag dri rab tu ganga'
290a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i pog snod rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa brgya stong dag nas rtag tu 'dugs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom
290a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ me tog dri rab tu gangar ba tha dad pa'i char rtag tu 'bab par ma gyur/ ba dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i nga ro yid du mchis pa'i sprin rtag tuH
290a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ bdag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi kham
290a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dag tu sems can dag la gsal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad/ lha dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i bde ba dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag
290a8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ 
290b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bdag gi ming thos te/ thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas che rjes nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du gzungs thob
290b2(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis
290b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis padag ni/ bud med gang dag gis bdag gis ming thos nas rab tu dang ba skyes te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur la/ bud med kyi lus la spong bar gyur te/ 
290b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag che rjes nas gal te/ bud med kyi lus lan gnyis thob par gyur dab de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// 
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyang kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bas ma gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag
290b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ sems can gang dag gis bdag gis ming thos par gyur la/ ming thos pa tsam gyis byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du/ tshangs par spyod par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
290b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dngag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag na/ 
290b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis bdag gis ming thos la/ yan lag lnga'i phyag 'gyi bas phyag 'tshal ba dang / de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
291a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis sti snang du bgyi bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan las gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe
291a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gos 'khru 'am/ skams sam/ 'drub 'am/ 'tshed pa'i las bgyid par gyur la/ chos gos rin po che sar pa khre'u chung / rigs pa zang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba
291a3(dkon brtsegs): dag/ sems bskyed ma thag tu bgos par bdag gis mtshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub
291a4(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong dgra bcom pa yongs su gdung ba ma mchis pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur bde ba rnam pa de
291a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// / bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi
291a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing derabyang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par ma gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod par gyur par rnam pa de lta bu dag rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de
291a7(dkon brtsegs): srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du skyes pa
291a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/ dang po ma tshang ba thob par 'gyur bde srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan las gal te bdag byang
291b1(dkon brtsegs): nu thob pa'iH/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar ga dag gis/ bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu shin tu rnam par bye ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting per dzin thob par ma gyur ba nga byang chu chu sems dpa'
291b2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/ skad cig gcig 'das pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshangs mchis pa dag mthong la
291b3(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de bar mdor chab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i
291b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/ thos ma thag pa la sa byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnams byang chub kyi mthar bar du rigs bzang po'i rigs su skye 'a thob par ma gyur pa de srid
291b5(dkon brtsegs): du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'des gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ 'di las gzhan du gyur
291b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis ming thos par gyur la/ de thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du/ thams cad byang chub sems
291b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa la dgar ba dang / mchog tu dag raba'i ge ba'i rtsa bdang brang bar ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyi'o// 
291b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ 'di las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu/ kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bgyi ba'i
292a1(dkon brtsegs): cing nge 'dzin thob par ma gyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/ skad cig gcig las btsam gyis/ sas rgyas bcom ldan las gA sa ma mchis/ dbag tu
292a2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag la snying stang bgyid la/ ting nge 'dzin de byang chub kyi snying po'i mthi'i bar du bar ma dor chab 'tshal bar 'gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med
292a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs parar tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag chos bstan pa rnam pa
292a4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu nyan 'tshal bar gyur pa/ chos bstan pa rnam pa de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu mos par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
292a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos pa de dag bdag gi ming thos
292a6(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
292a7(dkon brtsegs): las gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu/ bzod pa dang po dang / gnyis pa dang
292a8(dkon brtsegs): gsum pathob par mgyung ba dang / las rgyam gyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog par ma chung bde brid du/ bag blan med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs papa chang rgya ba mi bgyi'o// kun
292b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de nas dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des/ smon lam gyi khyad par rnam pa 'di dag bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// gal te bdag gis byang chub thob tshe smon lam
292b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog khyad par 'phags pa rnam pa 'di 'drar ma gyur na/ stobs bcu mnga' ba mtshungs pa ma mchis sbyin pa'i gnas// mi'i seng ge sems can snying por bdag ma gyur// gal te bdag zhing rnam pa
292b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'drar ma gyur la// sems can dbul mngonor mang sprul par ma gyur cing / sdug bsngal gyur pa'i mi dag bde bar mi bgyis par // mi'i rgyal po dkon mchog tu ni bdag ma gyur// bdag ni byang chub snying por
292b4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar mchis pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams mang po thag grub che// mthar yas dag tu myur du ming grangs ma gyur bar// 'jig rten mgon po stobs brnyas par ni
292b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag ma 'gyur// byang chub mtshus med zhi ba yang dag tshol ba na// dran dngadu blo gros rtogs pa rnam par nyams gyur cing // gal te bdag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyod
292b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ 'jig rten ston pa stobs brnyes par ni bdag ma gyur// shin du rgyas 'ong ma mus pa ma mchis mtha' las pas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mgon po'i sangs rgyas zhing kun khyab// 'dod
292b7(dkon brtsegs): chags zhe sdang gti mug thams cad rab zhi zhing // sems can dmyal bar dong ba'i ma rnams zhi bar bgyi// shin tu mdzes shing yangs pa'i mig ni phye nas su// mi rnams kun gyi mun nag rnam par gsal bar bgyi
292b8(dkon brtsegs): ngal pa med pa dag ni ma lus bsal nasu// gzi brjid mtha' yas mtho ris lam du gzung bar bgyi// sngon gyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa spyad nas ni// mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od ni lam me ma lags shing // nor bu'i tshogs dang me da lha'i
293a1(dkon brtsegs): 'od rnams kyang // mi yi seng ge'i 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis gan// skyes bu mchog gyur sdug bsngal rnams kyi gter gyur te/ phyogs mtsham pa phyogs na de 'dri gzugapa ni ma mchis
293a2(dkon brtsegs): shing // dge babacu stong dag ni rab tu rdzogs gyur nas// 'khor nang mchis tes sa rgyas seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// sman gyi rgyal bar thung dag la lus bgyis te// btul zhugs dkar thub byed pa dpag med spyang nas ni/ 
293a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes phung bo ngas pa mchog rab btsal nas su// smon lam stobs ni rdzogs bgyis sems can snying por ra gyur// ji ltar bcom ldan ye shes gzigs pa chags mi mdza// mi'i bang po 'dus byas rnam gsum rab mkhyen
293a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bdag kya ma sus pa ma mchis sbyin garnamam khas pa dang / mi rnam pan na mo'i 'dren pa mchog gyur cig/ mi dbang bdag gis byang chuchub ba du tho nas ni// gal te smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dag 'gyu
293a5(dkon brtsegs): cen/ stong gi 'jig rten khams 'di rab tu g.yos gyur cing / lha'i tshogs kyis ma par las me tog char lob shi/ sa yang bdu g.yos te me tog char yang bab// nam par las kyang mil snyan nas
293a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra lang zung // lha'i can dan mdzes pa dag gi bye ma yang // mngon pa pa 'thor bar 'gyur te 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u so
293a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa// bam po gnyis pa// kun dga' bo dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan / 
293a8(dkon brtsegs): bud da'i bldan pam su su tsogs rnam pa dis bung ldan pa nga chulam pa de 'phreng ngo // rjod pa rlom pa yug 'dig rten du zung dus/ nga kyi mi med pa nas yi no// 
293b1(dkon brtsegs): dgar po dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i spyan sngar/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge
293b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i mdun du/ smon lam gyi khyad par rnam pa de lta bu dag bstan nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa la gnas par gyur te/ 
293b3(dkon brtsegs): de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi che ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thag gru chen po rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni grub/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa ni spyod cing / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
293b4(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ lan 'ga' yung 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog
293b5(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur/ lan 'gar yang 'dod pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'dus shes bskyed par ma gyur/ lan 'gal yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'du shes
293b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par ma gyur te/ gzhon nu de des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can dang / dgang sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / zhe sdang med pa
293b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rmongs pa med pa dang / drang ba dang / mi dman pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / sku med pa dang / ngang tshul bzang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / dkar po'i chos yongasu tshol ba la brtson
293b8(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'dong bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi don du smon lam chen po yang dag par bsgrub par gyur to// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus
294a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rtag tu go cha bgos te/ drang ba dang mnyen pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / kha gsag med pa dang / yon tan dang ldan zhing sems cad thams cad dge
294a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i sngon du ni 'gro/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skyi ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i gnas pas ni gnas te/ nga rgyal med cipa
294a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag legs par bsrungs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des ngag gi las 'byung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga la gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu spangs nas/ ngag gi las gang / bdag dang gnan
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dang gnyi ga la phan par 'gyur ba de la brtson par gyur te/ de ltar shes bzhin du gyur cing / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grol rdal dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pha brang 'khor rnam su 'jug pa na/ nam
294a5(dkon brtsegs): yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med par gyur to// dbyang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
294a6(dkon brtsegs): tuphyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcugo/ bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dang / banod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan yang de nyid/ 
294a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ gang dag dang ldan na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma sa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrub par gyur to// 
294a8(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag ngag gi las kyis mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin pa/ de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang / 
294b1(dkon brtsegs): chub la bkod// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ming phrag tu med pa de snyed la/ nabaza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar myur ba la reg par gnas
294b2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad kyi semang du byas/ bla ma byas/ rim gror byas te/ mchod pa byas so// sems can ji snyed rab tu smin par byas pa dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs
294b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag la rab tu bkod pa de dag kyang tshig gis bstan pas mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no// de bzhin du la ma bu'i gling gi dbang phyug nyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / 
294b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / rab 'thab bral nyid dang / yongs su dga' ldan nyid dang / rab 'phrul nyid dang / dbang sgyur nyid dang / lha'i rgyal ba nyid dang / tsha
294b5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po nyid la rab tu bkod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan la ngas grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed la sti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri gror byas te mchod nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
294b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor bar bya ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa de dag kyang / ngag gi las kyis bstan pas mthar phyin par slab pa ma yin no// nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med
294b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab// mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med par kha nas lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan dan dri rab tu zhim pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang / spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ me tog
294b8(dkon brtsegs): ut+pa la'i gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad na gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po brgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa dang / 
295a1(dkon brtsegs): de rin pa ci'i rgyan thams cadadang / gos dang chos gas mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang / me tog dang / spos dang / gdug pa dang / phreng dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ngon par stsu
295a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyas mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang / spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / lag pa gnyis nas 'byung ba dang / zas dang / skom dang / gza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / 
295a3(dkon brtsegs): bro ba mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang / longs spyod dang / yongasu spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang lag pa gnyis nas zag cing / 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba yang dag par bsgrub so// kun dga' bo/ de ltar
295a4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ yo byad thams cad la dbang ba'i pha rol tu son par gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
295a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags// / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'byung gan/ sa te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
295a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das lags sam/ 'on te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ da ltar na bzhugs la 'tsho zhing
295a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhes te/ chos kyang ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
295a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ngalhan bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'dridi nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong na/ 'jig rten gyi
295b1(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa dag dang nyan thos mtha' yas pa dag gis

295b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / bcu pa dang / nyi shu pa dang / sum cu ba dang / bzhi bcu pa dang / lnga bcu pa dang / 'od dpag tshad pa dang / 'od dpag tshad brgya pa dang / 'od dpag tshad stong pa dang / 'od dpag tshad brgya
296a1(dkon brtsegs): song ba nas/ dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du pa'i 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par gyur te/ gnas pa ni ma gtogaso// kun dga' bo dpe gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

296a3(dkon brtsegs): thub med pa dang / 'od chags pa med pa dang / 'od thogs pa med pa dang / 'od rtag tu gtong ba dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i 'ong dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i 'od dang / chags par 'gyur ba'i 'od dang /

296a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / bang phyug chen po dang / lha thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / chog mog phreng byed pa'i 'od dang / mdor bsdur 'ang thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i 'od de ni dri ma med pa/

296a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed pa/ sems can dge ba'i bsam pa can rnams la dge ba dang / yang ba dang / rtogs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / blo dang mchog tu dga' 'a byed pa'o// kun
296b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan mtha' yas mu med pa dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu gang ste/ bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan gyi las rgyur byas pa dang / 'od phun sum
296b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa las brtsams te brjod kyang / mtshan bstan pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// 
296b3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyi yon tan 'byor pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyi ga yang grangs med dpag tu med

296b8(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa brag 'di snyernyed cig cesa'i chang gzung bar srab ma yin no// kun dga' ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul la dbang thob pa/ de 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
297a1(dkon brtsegs): khams na/ skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed yod ba de dag thams cad nyid zhag gcig gis bgrangs pa de lta bu'i rnam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yod par gyur la/ de dag las gzhan mi byed/ 
297a2(dkon brtsegs): par lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi/ nyan thos dang po 'dus pa/ bgrangs kyang de dag gis brgya'i char yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur te/ stong dang / brgya dang / stong dang / 
297a3(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / dpe dang / rgyu'i ngar du yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po zabs su dngag tshad brgyad khri bani stong yod pa/ khyod dpag tu med pa la mi la la zhig gis/ skra
297a4(dkon brtsegs): tshal pa brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos/ chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ kun dgara' po 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sgra tshal pa brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa dang / gang rgya
297a5(dkon brtsegs): mtsha chen po'i chu'i phung po byin las pa de gnyis gang mang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tshad stong yang rgya mtsho chen po bas nyung / lags na/ sA tshal ba brgyar gshegs pa'i rje mos/ chang thibs pa

297a7(dkon brtsegs): dgal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong rnams kyis/ lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs te/ 'di snyed cig go zhes grangs kyis chod pa lta bu yin no// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po phyin las pa lta bu ni grangs kyis mchod par blta
297a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yin na/ nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa rnams lta smos kyang dgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de ltar mtha' las mu med de de ni dngag tu med do zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba yin no// 
297b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe chad kyang dpag tu med de/ bskal pa 'ani snyed cig ce'am/ bskal par brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am// bskal
297b2(dkon brtsegs): babargya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce bya
297b3(dkon brtsegs): ba nas/ bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig go zhes bya ba'i bar du de'i tshad rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sku tshe'i tshad de ltar dpag tu med/

297b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ji ltar nga ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bskal pa'i bgra sa dang / bskal pa bgrangs pa'i brdar brtags pa de lta bu'ibaskal pa bcu lon no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag
297b6(dkon brtsegs): med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa/ modag/ bdeg mo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba'o// kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na seMn dmyal ba med do// dud 'gro'i skye

298a1(dkon brtsegs): yid du 'ong ba can gyi tshogs kyis bsten pa'o// kun dgar bo rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag ni kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog dum pa/ kha dog brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa'o// kun dga' bo de ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa

298b8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin/ 'dras bu rnams gser gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' ngo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams be nu'i rang bzhin la/ sdong ba rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ yal ka rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ lom rnams
