299b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi rtse mo thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas sku gser gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ste/ de dag shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ 
299b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang / 'og dang steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa grangs med
299b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu meng pa dag tu gshegs nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ri nag po rnams le med de/ ri thams cad kyang rin po mi 'i ri sha stag go// ri'i rgyal po ri ba
300a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug chen po thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun tu mnyam pa/ nyams dga' ba lag mthil ltar mnyam
300a2(dkon brtsegs): gas phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ri rab
300a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ngos la gnas pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gong na/ 'thab bral/ 
300a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshang sa chen nas 'od min gyi bar gyi lha rnams gang na gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom
300a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du bgyid/ pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par
300a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rnyed par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyis rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ sus kyang mtha' 'am/ tshad rtogs pa 'am/ bsam
300a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi nus te/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes rab tu 'byed do// de ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul dang / 'byor pa
300a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de la dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom ma mchis te/ bdag ni ma 'ongs pa'i son rnams kyi dogs pa dang / yid
300b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / the tsom bsal ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di longasu zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'i gso lag so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// kun dga' bo 'jig cen
300b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bde ba can de na/ chu klung rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ de ni chu klung chen po kha tshon dpag tshad tsam kyang yod/ dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'i bar dang / kha tshon
300b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad tsam dag kyang yod de/ zab su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag go// chu klung de dag thams cad kyang spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyi char 'dab cing / rin po che'i me tog sil ma'i tshogs dag 'bab pa
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dag go// sgra dbyangs snyan pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag gro/ kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag las lha'i klu dbyangs yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sil snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis byas
300b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bas/ lhag pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ chu klung chen po de dngag / las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang / kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / brdzun ma yin pa dang / rna bar bad ba
300b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / snying du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan pas chog mi shes pa dang / mnyan pa dang mthun pa dang / mi rtag pa dang zhi ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mnyan na bde ba ste/ 
300b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grag go/ kun dga' bo/ chu klung chen po de dag gi 'gram gnyis ni rin po che'i spos kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang ste/ de dag la gal ka dang / 'o ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
300b8(dkon brtsegs): bu sna tshogs 'phyang ngo // de nas sems can gang dag chu klung gi 'gram de dag tu zang zing med pa lha'i dgara' ba dang / rtse ba myong bar 'dod pa de dag/ chu klung de dag tu 'jug pa'i tshe/ 'dod na chu long bu nung tsam du gnaso// 
301a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod na pus mo nub tsam dang / 'dod na rked pa rungab tsam dang / 'dod na mchan khung nub tsam dang / 'dod na mong ba nub tsam du chu gnas par gyur te/ lha'i dga' bdag kyang 'byung ngo // der sen gang dag chu
301a2(dkon brtsegs): grang bar gyur cig snyan du 'dod na yang / de dag la bsil bar 'gyuraro// gang dag dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la dro bar 'gyuraro// gang dag bsil ba dang dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la chu bsil ba dang / 
301a3(dkon brtsegs): / dro bar 'gyur te bde bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po de dag ni lha'i shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang / a ka ru dang / dus kyi rje su 'brang ba dang / rgya spos dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / spos mchog gis bsgos pa'i chus yongs su
301a4(dkon brtsegs): gang ste 'bab pa/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mra da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa dag gi me tog gis khebs pa/ khol khol dag na bya ngang pa dang / gzhad dang / khrung khrung
301a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / drang ba dang / ka ran pa dang / no tso dang / ri skyegs dang / khu byug dang / kun la dang / ka la ping ka dang / ma bya la sogs pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul
301a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya'i tshogs kyis bsten pa/ dang pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ 'bab stegs bde ba/ 'dam rdzab med pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal pa dag/ de na gang gi tshe sems can de dag bdag cag gi bsam pa/ 
301a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra ba yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa de'i tshe/ de dag gi bsam pa de lta bu dag chos dang ldan par yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo chu de las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des/ 
301a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la go bar byed do// de na sems can gang dag chu ngoms na 'khod pa dag sgra 'di bdag cag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags par ma gyur cig ces 'dod na/ de de dag gi
301b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i napa'i dbang po la grag par mi 'gyur// gang sgra rnam pa ji lta bu thos par 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra yid du'ang brdzas// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol phyin pa'i
301b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / sa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / sau yang dag par rig pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
301b3(dkon brtsegs): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu ni ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
301b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sgra dag thos// des sgra rnam pa de lta bu thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog
301b5(dkon brtsegs): tu dgar ba rgya chen po thob po// dben pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang / ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa dang / byang chub yongasu 'grub pa'i dge
301b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ngo // kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ mi dge ba'i ming yod med do// sgrib pa'i sgra yod med do// ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra yang yod me // sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang
301b7(dkon brtsegs): yod med do// kun dga' bo de na sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i sgra yang med na/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na/ rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi
301b8(dkon brtsegs): khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par bya na bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde can gyi de ba'i rgyu yong su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu ga zhim tha rtogs
302a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi nuso// kun dgar po 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can deng sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs dang / kha dog dang / stobs dang / mthu dang chu zheng dang / dang
302a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / bskyed mos 'tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa yongasu spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzugs dang m+ba dang / 
302a3(dkon brtsegs): dridang / ro / reg bya yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / longs spyod dang / yo su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu thams cad dang ldan te/ dperan/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang 'dra'o// kun dga' sa
302a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems can dag/ khams kyis za bar rigs pa'i kha zas mi za'i/ kha zas rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i 'byor pa nyid du shes te/ lus tshim par 'gyur/ lus gajug
302a5(dkon brtsegs): tshim par 'gyur ro// de dag yang lus la 'jug par mi byed do// de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i lha/ 'i spos kyi rnam pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gdug
302a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// de na gang dri de la sdom par mi 'dod pa de la spos dri'i 'du shes dang / bsgos pa tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar gang dag spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
302a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag gi rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongasu khyab par 'gyur ro// de dag gos kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma ci 'dra ba 'dod pa de
302a8(dkon brtsegs): sta bu'i gos rin po che dag gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad song su khyab par 'gyur zhing / lus la bgos par bdag nyid kyis shes so// de dag 'di lta ste mgo'i rgyan nam/ rna ba'i rgyan nam/ mgul ba dang / 
302b1(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / nang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste/ cod pan dang / rna cha dang / gdudu dang / dung rgyan dang / do shal dang / se mo dadang / rna rgyan dang / sor dub dang / gser gyi cong tsong dang / ska rags dang / gser gyi drang dang / mu tig gi
302b2(dkon brtsegs): dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che brgya stong du mas spras pa dag 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa la 'phyang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang bar
302b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong ste/ rgyan de dag gis brgyan par yang sheso// de dag gang kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng gi bar dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi bgam brgya stong gis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khri lnga'i ras bcos na
302b4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs bting ba/ sngas khra bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang / ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang de dag/ de dag gi mdun du 'byung ste/ de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang grub pa
302b5(dkon brtsegs): dedag gi nang na lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gis/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'khod de/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams den lhar mi rnams tha pa
302b6(dkon brtsegs): med de/ gnan du na kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis lha dang mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni ma gtogaso// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na mi ma rabs dang / mi zam ni lam me ma yin/ 
302b7(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin zhing / mi 'jigs pa ma yin la/ 'dogs la pas yin no// de bzhin du gnan 'phrul dang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste/ skyed mos tshal dang / 
302b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / pa dang / rdu 'drul dang / cho 'drul dang/ gang phyug gipa/ lam mim yin/ lhan nam yim thang nge ma yin te/ chos do pa rgo dang / chos la yangs myong bani/ 
303a1(dkon brtsegs): ma gtog so// kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra bar bded cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams bsgre bar bya'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan de na/ 
303a2(dkon brtsegs): snga dro'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ phyogs bzhin kun nas 'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste/ de dag gis rin po che'i shing ljon pa bkrab bltan sdug pa/ kha dog tha dad pa kha dog du ma yod pa/ 
303a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i blos dri rab tu nim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa/ de dag bskyod kun tu bskyod/ bskul kun du bskul nas/ de dag las me tog rnam pamang po yid du 'ong ba'i gsung cani/ blta na sdug pa dag/ rin po ma'i sa chen
303a4(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po de la 'phrul te/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri kun tu mi 'greng bdun srid du bkram par 'gyur ro// 'di la ste dper na/ skyes bus la me tog 'grems ma bas pa zhig gis lag pa
303a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyi gas bkram ste/ mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing ngalta/ na sdug go// de bzhin du me tog gsung dang kha dog tha dad pa dang / ldan pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun tsam
303a6(dkon brtsegs): du khyab par 'gyur ro// me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste/ deb tsam du de/ gos ka tsa la ni ngad ltar reg na ba de ba'o// de dag ni rkang pa 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing / rkang pa 'degs pa/ 
303a7(dkon brtsegs): na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro// snga dro'i dus 'das nas ni me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / dag par 'gyur zhing
303a8(dkon brtsegs): me tog snga ma rnams kyis brnyog pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyogs pani kun nas rlung langs te/ gang sngon ma byung ba'i me tog sar bdag mngon par 'thor ro// snga dro'i ltar nyi ma'i gung dang / byi drom
303b1(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi chedang/ mtshan pong srong dang / nam gyi bung dang / thongs kya de badzin// trAs d+ha sna tshogs kyis banas pa'i rlung de dag la sanas/ sems can de dag la regan/ 'di lta snyed per na/ dge slong 'jos
303b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ me dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / bza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i
303b3(dkon brtsegs): gzungs dang / mun pa mun nag gi ming du gdags pa yong med do// nyin mo dang mtshan mor gdags pa yang long med de/ khyim yong su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong med do// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams
303b4(dkon brtsegs): bad ba can den/ dus dus su lha'i spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon pa ru 'bab bo// lha'i me tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gdug
303b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// g+ha/ 'i bla re dag kyang 'dzin to// lha'i rin po che'i gdugs rnga ma'i drasil yab dang bcas padag kyang nam pa' la 'dzin to// lha'i rol mor
303b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs sgra dag kyang sgrogs shing / lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du
303b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di lta ste ma nges pa dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par gzhag pa 'am gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis
303b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par bstan na ni// bskal pa zang zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongasu brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi ma/ 
304a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par mi ruso// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la// dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste/ de dag bskal pa/ 
304a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'on te lhag par ni// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // bsngags pa'i phreng ba rab tu brjod pa na// bskal pa bye ba de dag zang 'gyur gyi// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar mi phyin// de dag spobs pa'ang zad par 'gyur/ 
304a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin// gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur pa// de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa ni// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i
304a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od mtshan dang // bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags rnams/ thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di'i char yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bas ni de bzhin gshegs de yi// yon tan thos nas
304a5(dkon brtsegs): mgu dang dang skyed la// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po skyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi// 'jig rten gyi// ming thos pa'i bsod nams de la ni// zhing mchog thag gru
304a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po dag kun// cha dang dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can// de dag de bas bsod nams mang du 'gyur// don dam thob phyir dang brtsab ste/ de lta bas na thos nas yid gnyis sol// kun dgar
304a7(dkon brtsegs): bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i
304a8(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mede'i mtshan yongs su rjod do// bsngags pa gsung ngo // grags pa rab tu sgrog so// yon tan rjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
304b1(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa nas/ dang ba dang ldan pas skyed pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// kun dgar bo sems can gang dag kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa dang / 
304b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'a
304b4(dkon brtsegs): dpag med de/ dge slong gi chags du mas yongasu bskor cing mdu/  gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom / na 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas/ rab tu nga ba'i sems kyis shi
304b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar la gyur ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong
304b6(dkon brtsegs): yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ lhags pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i
304b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsab rnams bskyed par bya zhing / yong su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yid la byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun tu skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing deng sems yang / 
304b8(dkon brtsegs): dag par gtong ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ongad dpag med de'i kha dog dang / dbyings dang / chu ning dang / zham ring ga dge slong gi dge 'dun ci la
305a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de 'dra nga'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang / brjed pa med pa'i dra pas shi 'phos nas/ sangs
305a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rje su dran par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar yang 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag
305a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chad pa na dga' ba 'thob cing / spying lug pa med la/ mi 'gong mi zhum zhing tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yid la byed de 'dod pa yang skyed na/ de dag mi lam na de bzhin
305a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od dpag med de mthong zhing / 'jig rten gyi kham sa bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo de bzhin
305a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu'ir jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshe gas pa 'od dang ga med de'i mtshan kyang longasu rjod// bsngags pa lnga
305a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung bstod pa yang sgrog so// kun dgar bo/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya
305a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yongasu dri ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dong ngo // 
305a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing / tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing // mtha' yas/ 
305b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi'i 'dren pa
305b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog la rab tu 'thor// 'dren pa 'od dngag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang // byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag
305b3(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim ying 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi'i 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis// mchod pa byas te dpag
305b4(dkon brtsegs): med 'ong zhabs la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes shes 'dzer// dga' zhing ma gu pa'i sems ni gzhal yas kyis// de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor
305b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'dren pa de'i spyan sngar 'di skad du// bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur ces smras/ de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag/ de tshe dang ga tshad brgya pa'i gdugs gyur te// legs par brgyan cing yub
305b6(dkon brtsegs): bkrabs mdzes/ sangs rgyas sku la kun tu khebs par gnas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du/ snyen bkur byas nas dga' ste 'di skad du// gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa// sems can de dag rnyed la
305b7(dkon brtsegs): legs rnyed 'dzed// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na// bdag cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed// bskal pa stong du ston pas gang bsgrungs pa// rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni ci 'dra ltos/ 'od ni dpag med gzi brji
305b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag med pa/ sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun dpag med pa// byang chub sems dpa'as bskor cing mdzes gyur pa// sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po mchog le ltos// de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas/ 'od 'phro bye ba khrag
306a1(dkon brtsegs): brig gsum cu drug/ de dganal gyi dkyil 'khor nas byung ste// zhing srong bye ba dag ni khyad par mdzad// 'od 'bro dag thams cad slar log ste// 'dred pa'i spyibacug deng ni nub par gyur// de tshe'
306a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phro rung bar gyur nas ni// lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed// de nas sangs rgyas sras po grangs chen po// spyad ras gzigs kyi dbang po langs te// gang slad 'jig rten mgon ngo mdzum mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'ad rgyud dang rkyen
306a3(dkon brtsegs): gang lags// sems can mang 'grol phan pa thugs brtse can// don dam mkhas pa den lung bstan gsol// gsung mchog yid du mchi ba de thos nas// sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sam su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang byas
306a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dag/ sangs rgyas blta smad ba can 'dir mchig/ de dag thos nas dga' ba cher bskyed de// myur du zhing 'di rnam par lta bar 'gyur/ rgya cher zhing 'dir lhags par gyur nas kyang // lha yi mig
306a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lha'i na pa dang // tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang / rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa// ngas ni sngon tshe smon lam 'di skad
306a6(dkon brtsegs): btab/ sems can dag ging yi ming thos na// nga yi ning du drag tu 'ong bar shog/ nga yi smon lam bzang po de rdzogs pa// 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'os// de dgang yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig
306a7(dkon brtsegs): las phyir mi ldog/ de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir// bdag gi zhing yang 'di 'drar 'gyur ba dang // bdag gis ming yang sgra dang lta ba kyang // sems can mang po dgrol bar byar 'dod pa// de ni myur du ris par
306a8(dkon brtsegs): la gor du// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams song la// 'od dpag med kyi gam du song nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod pa gyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi zhing mang song nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la mchod
306b1(dkon brtsegs): byas te// bde bar gshegs la mchong ba byas nas kyang // dro bar ba ba can du slar yang 'ang/ 'phags pa dkon mchog 'artsegs pa chen po mchos kyi rnam grangs smo
306b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ kun dga' bro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'bang du dpag tshad
306b3(dkon brtsegs): drug brgya yod pa/ yal ka dang / lo mdang / mdab ma dpag tshad brgyad rgya tshun chad du 'byang ba rtsa ba'i spoms khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ rtag tu lo ma chags pa/ rtag tu me tog chags pa
306b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa kha dog tha dad pa/ bdog/ brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lo mtha dad pa/ me tog tha dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba'i
306b5(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po ches yongasu gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches rnam par smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gis
306b6(dkon brtsegs): shin rnam par spras pa/ kha dog lha las 'das pa/ gser gyi skud pa 'byung ba/ se mo do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan breng dang / do shal tshig rkyang dang / mu tig dmar po
306b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan breng dang / mu tig sngon po'i rgyan phreng dang / seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin po che thams cad dang dung gis mngon par smras pa/ gser gyi dra
306b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bla res bres pa/ chu srin dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / zla gam lta bus legs par brgyan pa/ 
307a1(dkon brtsegs): nor bu khrol ba dang / gse nga/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa 'i lha bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun dga' ba/ byang chub kyi shing
307a2(dkon brtsegs): de rlung gis bskyod na sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rnal du grag pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'
307a3(dkon brtsegs): bar du na nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du/ byang chub kyi
307a4(dkon brtsegs): shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyi mi btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo// sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang / byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna
307a5(dkon brtsegs): nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can gang dag byang // chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mthun khar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// byang chub
307a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyab par gyur pa de dag kyang / byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos
307a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yang bar shes par bya'o// sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu bla na meng ba yang
307a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / 
307b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang / shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta ste/ sgra'i rje su 'gro ba dang / su 'thun pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos lalnga bzod pa rnam pa gsum
307b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
307b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtog so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'iri sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ go cha rgya chen po bgos pa/ sems can
307b4(dkon brtsegs): thams can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba la brtson pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos gang dag 'kho da pa de dag ni/ 'od 'doms gang ba sha stag go// byang chub sems
307b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni/ 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu snang
307b6(dkon brtsegs): bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyi ming ci zhes
307b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de gnyis la gcig gi ming ni/ byang chub se de sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// gcig gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo
307b8(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sadus kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thad ni/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu gnyis dang ldan pa/ 
308a1(dkon brtsegs): / lus yong su rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ dbang po bsdams pa/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ ma zhum pa/ nga
308a2(dkon brtsegs): bo mig yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa sha sta'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad na/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ byang chub
308a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthi' bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur gyi/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ gang dag dper na/ da ltar gyi nga bzhin du
308a4(dkon brtsegs): snyigs ma lnga'i dus na/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dga' jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas dkrugs pa dag tu gnas par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtog so// kun
308a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes/ pa de dag thams cad/ snga dro gcig bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu do nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la
308a6(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / klu
308a7(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod pa bya'o snyam du dris ji ltar sems bskyed cing / ji snyed 'dod pa rnams/ de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad
308a8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog nas/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i bar de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med/ grangs med pa dag kyang skyed cing
308b1(dkon brtsegs): lagaso/ gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu/ lag pa nas byung bar gyur ces 'dod na yang / de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ dri tha dad pa/ dri dum yod pa'i skon bu dag lag
308b2(dkon brtsegs): ba nas 'byung ste/ de dag gis sgron bu'i me tog rnam pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan las de dag la mthor/ mngon par mthong / mngon par rab tu mthor ro// skon bu'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las/ nang gi chung
308b3(dkon brtsegs): drugang yin pa de yang / steng gi bar snang la/ dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdug su 'gyur te/ phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar du snga mas la mi ltung ngo // de na skon bu'i me tog gtor bas gang na
308b4(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang la/ dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur pa yang yod/ dpag tshad sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yod/ steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs dpag
308b5(dkon brtsegs): tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de na gang dag dag rab dang / mchog tu dag rab rgya chen po skyed ni / sems dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs
308b6(dkon brtsegs): med dpag tu med pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas ste/ snga dro gcig la slar log nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gan so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa kye
308b7(dkon brtsegs): pa tshe dpag med de'i/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yong gu zin pa dang / sngon chos mnyan pa byin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam 'byor cing yongs su rdzogs
308b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mi nyung ba dang / shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / shin tu bsgoms pas smon lam btab pa 'grub bo// kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad
309a1(dkon brtsegs): ni rang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go// sas rgyas kyi zhing da sems can dag yol su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'gar yang mi skyed do// de dag thams cad las rgya
309a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing de kun tu 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na/ dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba mi skyed do// 'gro ba na'ang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'o// ltos pa dang bcas par ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dngos po yongasu 'dzin pa dang / gnas
309a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang / sems de lta bu dag de dag la yong med do// kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpar gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi
309a4(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med/ 'thab pa med/ rtsod pa med/ mi 'thun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad la sem su mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / 
309a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyen pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / rab tud ba'i sems dang / brtan pa'i senas dang / sgrib pa med nan sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / brtogs pa med pa'i
309a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sa pyad spyod pa'i sems dang / sems kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la blo rab tu zhugs pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho chen po mnyam pa/ blo rab dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan du ma bsags pa/ byang chub kyi yan
309a7(dkon brtsegs): lag yang dag par 'gro bas rnam par rtson pa/ sas rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa/ shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa/ chos kyi mig gi pha
309a8(dkon brtsegs): rol du son pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrub cing 'chad ston la/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing / chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa// khams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa/ sems dul ba/ sems nig/ 
309b1(dkon brtsegs): / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa/ kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ bsal ba dang mi bsal ba la mkhas pa// tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa'i gas
309b2(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar gnas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnams kyi snying po rtogs pa/ chos thams cad yong su tshol ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i
309b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul ba/ ci yang med pa/ len pa med pa/ sems med pa/ phung po med pa/ len pa med pa/ shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med
309b4(dkon brtsegs): ba la gnas pa/ sems chags pa med pa/ zhum pa med pa/ chos zab mo rnams la mngon par 'artson pa/ sgyid lug pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dga' ba la 'jug pas 'phags pa
309b5(dkon brtsegs): bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam rjesu thob pa/ the tsom med pa/ dogs pa la sa rgal ba/ shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ lhag rngu nga rgyal med pa/ ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te ri rab dang
309b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa/ 'khrugs pa med pa'i blos/ rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba/ shes rab kyi 'od dang / dkar zhing shin tu dkar la/ dag cing dge ba'i sems dang / gser bco ma'i kha dog 'dra bar snang zhing / 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog
309b7(dkon brtsegs): gis nyi zla'i 'od las shin tu 'das pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba bzod pas sa dang mtshungs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la rlom semasu byed pa dang / nyon mongs
309b8(dkon brtsegs): pa sreg pa'i phyir me'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad nges par phigs pa dang / thams cad du ci yang med pa'i phyir nam mkha'
310a1(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i phyir pad+ma dang 'dra ba/ chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par sgrogs pas/ dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i 'brug chen po nga mtshungs pa/ chos kyi
310a2(dkon brtsegs): chu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas/ khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa/ sems shin tu mchog tu dul bas/ glang po chen po dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dul bas/ 
310a3(dkon brtsegs): rta cang shes bzang po dang mtshungs pa/ rtsal dang mi 'jigs pas skrag pa med pa'i phyir/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad yongasu skyob pas/ shing gi rgyal po n+ya gro dang mtshungs pa/ 
310a4(dkon brtsegs): bas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g.yos pas/ ri'i rgyal gyi ri rab dang 'dra ba/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas nam mnya' rang mtshungs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i
310a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro bas/ tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ gnasu sogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad/ ma bar 'joms pas/ bya'i rgyal po na mkha' lding dang 'dra ba/ 'byung
310a6(dkon brtsegs): bar dga' ba'i phyir/ u dum pa ra'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ glang po che ltar shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa/ dbang po rmugs pa med pa/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa
310a7(dkon brtsegs): mngab/ pha rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas phrag dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa/ chos yongasu tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba/ tshul khrims kyi bai DUr+ya dang 'dra ba/ thos pas rin po ches
310a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung gnas dang mtshus pa/ chos kyi rnga sgra snyan pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po rdung ba/ chos kyi dung chen po 'bung ba/ chos kyi rgya mtshan chen po bsgreng ba/ chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po
310b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bar bar byed pa shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba/ rmongs pa med pa zhe sdang med pa/ tha ba btul ba/ dag pa/ dring med pa/ brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba/ btong ba btang ba/ sbyin pa la
310b2(dkon brtsegs): lag brkyang ba/ chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'ged pa la dga' ba/ sbyin pa la ser sna med pa/ 'dres pa med pa/ yid 'jigs pa med pa/ chags pa med pa/ brtan pa dpa' ba/ bces pa 'dzin pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ 
310b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa/ zug rngu byung ba/ gtan pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ nges pa 'grogs na bde ba/ don byed pa/ 'jig rten gsal bar byed pa/ 'dren pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags pa dang khong khro ba/ 
310b4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa/ dag pa mya ngan dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/ rgyu'i stobs can/ smon lam gyi stobs can/ mi dman pa/ gya gyu med pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
310b5(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ nga rgyal gyi drug rngu gton pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ti mug dang bral ba dag pa/ dge ba la mos pa/ rgyal ba dam pas
310b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa/ 'jig rten khams pa/ sbyangs pa'i ye shes yang dag por bsgrubs pa/ rgyal bas bstod pa/ sems dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rtul bod pa/ sran thub pa/ mnyam pa med pa// tha ba med pa/ 
310b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa/ 'dus pa rgya che ba ba khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ bden pa smra ba/ blo dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag ma can/ 
310b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ tha ba dang / dri ma dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos thams cad la thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo mdor bsdun
311a1(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas kyi nang ngo byang chung sems pa' rnams ni 'jis chug \u0f88\u0f90ga ste/ rgyam par byan gal de de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad 'anal 'bye ba khrag smrig rgya myong dugadas pas ban byung
311a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ba sa pa dag ga son tan gyimatha pa mi la/ de dugashe pa'i mi 'dzidas pa yang rgyan ca pa mi 'gyur ro// c-i byi na/ ku nga hU~MH/ byang chub se ma 'dan
311a3(dkon brtsegs): yod d+ha mas da/ de bani gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi stos pa blan me bdaganyig yang babs kyis mi khya cing / mnus pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun ga ba/ yongs ladu phyos su phyogs te/ me
311a4(dkon brtsegs): gtor la thal mo sbyor te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ rdul med cing rnam par dag pa bzhugs shing 'chol gzhes shing
311a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag 'tshal cig/ de'i mtshan/ de yang sgrib pa med par phyogs bcur grags te/ phyogs re re/ na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung chags pa mi mnga'
311a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing / gsung thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed dge/ lan 'ga' lan 'ga' ma yin par/ bsngags brjod cing stod de snyan par gsung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ 
311a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dang / tshe dpag med de dang / byang chub sems
311a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta 'tshalo// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
311b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i 'od phyung ngo // de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya
311b2(dkon brtsegs): stong thams cad na/ ri nag po 'am rin po che'i ri 'am/ lhun po chen po 'am/ btang bzung ngam/ btang bzung chen po 'am/ khor yug gam/ khor yug chen po 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ka ba 'am/ shing ljon pa stug pa
311b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bskyed mos tshal lam/ gzhal med khang ngam/ lha dang mi gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis/ thal bar gyur cing zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta
311b4(dkon brtsegs): ste dper na/ nyi ma shar nas mi zhig 'dom gang tsam na 'dug pa la/ mi zhig lta ba de bzhin du de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / 'od de yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / 
311b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gno n+ya dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam para' lding dang / mi 'am rtsi dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag sangs rgyas
311b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil
311b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhung nger mdzes pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun de la lta'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po 'di chu gcig tu gyur na/ de la
311b8(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa rnams med/ ri rnams med/ gling rnams med/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams med/ chu klung rnams med cing / ngam grog dang / g.yangs rnams mi snang ste// gzhan du nas chen
312a1(dkon brtsegs): po rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa ni ma gtog so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon par grub pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od
312a2(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtags sam/ mtshan ma cung zad kyang med do// bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des
312a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan nas/ phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun tu snang ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der/ byang chub sems dpa'
312a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / mi de dag thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdad 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi
312a5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun chen pos bskor cing / chos ston pa yang snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po/ mi pham pa la bka' stsal pa/ mi pham brgya
312a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi brgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / steng gi bar sdang la kun dga'i ra ba nyams dga' ba dag dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nyams dga'
312a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / chu klung dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dang / rin po che'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dag dang / 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam
312a8(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i ngos la/ me tog bkram pa dang / me tog gi phreng bas kun tu mdzes par byas pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyig pa'i phreng gis gang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis
312b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen pa mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs sangs kyi zhing thams cad sgras go bar byed cing / 
312b2(dkon brtsegs): des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dang mi bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa
312b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa dag tu zhugs te/ bar snang la chags pa med par 'gro ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom
312b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi bam pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed/ kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi
312b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes ma mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni
312b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na/ gnas pa mthong ngam/ 
312b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams/ gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa 'am/ dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga
312b8(dkon brtsegs): brgya ba rnam su zhugs te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig/ pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas par mthong
313a1(dkon brtsegs): lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de ni sems can rngus te 'byung ba gang dag pad+ma rnams la skyil mo dkrus te 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bcig 'ad+ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang / 
313a2(dkon brtsegs): cig pad+ma la skyil mo dkrung bcas nas/ rdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te/ 
313a3(dkon brtsegs): the tsom du ltung ba'i sems kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnaso// gang dag the tsom med cing som nyi chad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
313a4(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing / dad pa la mos pa de dag ni/ pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas
313a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzus te 'byung ngo // mingam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dag med la
313a6(dkon brtsegs): blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar sems bskyed cing / the tsom mi skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la/ sems nyi med cing / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang sogs pa de dag ni/ skyil mo krung bcas
313a7(dkon brtsegs): nas rngus te 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas/ ring po mo lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar/ yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// mi pham pa shes rab kyi khyad pa
313a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab kyi rim pa dang / 'di lta ste/ the tsom du ltung ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/ ji ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba las yong su nyams shing / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / chos
313b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam dang / dge ba'i spyod pa dang / dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad las yongasu nyams pa'i shes rab yongasu nyams pa dang / shes rab chung ba la ltos/ mi pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dag
313b2(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba la/ khri mon gser dang / baiDUR+Ya thams cad kyis spras pa/ dar dang / phreng ba dang / lnga ldi'i tshogs sbyangs pa/ tshon sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa/ ras bcos bu bting ga me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ bdug pa rgya
313b3(dkon brtsegs): chen pos bdugs pa/ khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / skar khung dang / kha khyer dang / rta babs dang / ba gam rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gser dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ gru bzhi lham
313b4(dkon brtsegs): ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ them skas bzhi bcas pa zhig yong la/ rgyal po de'i bu nyes pa zhig gi phyir/ bri mon der bcug ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi khong sgril du bcug la/ der de'i khri ba sham
313b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ stan go na ka bting la/ bar tshangs can dang / ba la li ka bting ste// yul ka ling ki'i ras kyi gding ba bting la/ de'i steng du dang bting ste/ g.yas g.yon gnyi su rten ma dmar po bzhag pa
313b6(dkon brtsegs): bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ de la de 'dug kyang rung ba nyal yang rung / de'i zas skom gtsang ma/ bzod pa rnam pa mang po du ma bshams no/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po'i bu de'i yongasu spyadapa
313b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya che ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa 'di snyam du sems/ des de'i ro myong bar byed dam/ ming par byed dam/ des dga' ba thob ma/ 
313b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ nongs pa gang gi slad du/ rgyal pos khri mon derang stsal pa de las thar bar 'tshal zhing / rigs bzang po/ rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / btsun po'i 'khor dang / tshong
314a1(dkon brtsegs): dngon dang / khyim bdag dang // khams kyi rgyal po ga gang gis khri non de las yong su tha bar 'gyur ba yongs su tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de brtson den/ dga' ba ma mchis shi rgya/ 
314a2(dkon brtsegs): bos ma gnang gyi bar du mi thar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi bam pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tsom du ltung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing / sas rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnya
314a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes la/ som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang / sems dang ba tsam des/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skye yang / pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas shing rngus te
314a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thung ba ma yin gyi/ pad+ma rnams kyi mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang du 'du shes shi nga gnas te/ bshang gci med/ mchil ma dang sngangs med/ yid du
314a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mthun pa mi 'byung mod kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas madz+ra ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong / ba dang / 'brel ba'i chos kyi gtam rnam par nges pa dang / dge ba'i
314a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa thams cad dang / bral ba yin te/ de dag na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi/ sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas/ de dag pad+ma'i mngal rnams las 'byung ste/ de dag de nas byung yang steng ngam/ 'og
314a7(dkon brtsegs): gam/ thad kar byung ba mi shes so// mi pham pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag bskyed
314a8(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang / the tsom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrungs par ma gyur pa la ltos/ mi pham pa the tsom gyis byang chub sems
314b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba ltos/ mi pham pa de lta bus na/ byang chub sems dpar dag gis/ the tsom yongasu spangs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ myur du sems can
314b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhug
314b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham
314b4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongasu grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gam
314b5(dkon brtsegs): nas ji snyed cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' yongasu grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag
314b6(dkon brtsegs): bdun cu rtsa gnyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par
314b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu 'grub na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
314b8(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig
315a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// 
315a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi sgron ma'i gam na/ byang
315a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu 'jig rten gyi byede ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa klu zil gyis gnon pa'i gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde
315a4(dkon brtsegs): ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'ong kyi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lta 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhinag
315a5(dkon brtsegs): pa seng ge'i gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// de bani/ gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phye
315a6(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig phrag brgya cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me'i dbang po'i gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi
315a7(dkon brtsegs): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams dad pa can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gabye
315a8(dkon brtsegs): ba me tog rgyal mtshan gyi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa/ 'jug pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa/ nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
315b1(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag dbu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil pa bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
315b2(dkon brtsegs): brag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bad ba can du sme bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i gam na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
315b3(dkon brtsegs): med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongasu dri ba dang / yongasu dri ba bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi pham pa rnam grangs de lha
315b4(dkon brtsegs): bus de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gi gam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dga'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag
315b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de bzhin gshes/ sa pa de dag gi mtshan/ bskal pa bskal pa bye ba khrag N+DI ga tshang bar/ brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nuso// mi pham pa gang
315b6(dkon brtsegs): dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag/ rnyed pa ji rnyed cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos/ sems can gang dag de bzhin
315b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od dngag med de la/ tha na sems dadang pa cig tsam rnyed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dad pa mi byed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro// mi pham pa de lta bas na khyod mos par bya/ 
315b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du/ chos kyi rnam grangs
316a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'azung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chuchu pa bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / bsgo ba la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// mi pham 'a chos kyi rnam grangs
316a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyin zhag gcig tsam yang gzung zhing bcangs te/ blags shing kun chub par byas la/ bsam pa thag pa nas gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// tha na glegs bam la legs par bris te/ 
316a3(dkon brtsegs): 'chang bar bya zhing de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o// gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
316a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa tshe dpag med de la blta ba dang / bdag nyid kyis rgyas kyi/ zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'a dgas pa yongs su bzung bar 'dod pa des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
316a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyan pa'i phyir nga/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas mes yongs su gang ba las rgal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs la/ ji mnyan par byora'o// thos nas kyang g.yor ma lhung ba'i rgyud kyis
316a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su dga' bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam gres 'di gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rlabs po chen po brtsam par
316a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// tha na pa gcig 'jos pa srid du yang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po si/ jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba de rgal nas kyang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi
316a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi pham pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig du ma dag/ chos kyi rnam gras rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di nyan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i
316b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// ma 'ongs pa'i sun/ dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du/ chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad
316b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas thamacad kyis gnang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur du sgrub pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed pa shin tu legs par rnyed cing
316b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin kyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya
316b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po thob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ya du dag par rab tu ston pa dang / bsgom pa la dga' bar 'gyur
316b5(dkon brtsegs): bdang / tha na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no// mi pham pa de ltar na ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa
316b6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ khyed kyang dathe tsom med par brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la som nyi ma za shig/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i btson rang chud
316b7(dkon brtsegs): dare/ mi bam pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dga'o// chos ston pa rnyed par dga'o// ngal pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o// mi pham pa ngas khyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
316b8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis// nga khyed kyis mngon par sbyor la sgrubs shig/ mi 'am pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung mi za bar bya ba'i phyir/ yongs su gtad pa chen po
317a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson par gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig/ yun rin por gnod pa dang / mi 'phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang / 
317a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / log par ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa// 'di 'dra 'di dag thos mi 'gyur// dpa' bo gang dag don
317a3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa// de dag gsung ba'i thos par 'gyur// gang gis 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni// gus dang bcas pas chos thos pa// de dag dga' ba dam pa 'tho// lta ba can dang dman dang
317a4(dkon brtsegs): zhums rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus// gang dragra sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan la slob// dper na skyes bu long ba mun kung na// lam yang mi
317a5(dkon brtsegs): shes bstan par ga la nus// de ltar nyan thos thams cad sangs/ rgyas kyi// ye shes mi rtogs sems can gzhan ci smos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen// lha klu lha min
317a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin nyan thos min// sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin// gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs/ ye shes rnam dag don dam mkhas gyur te/ 
317a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag bskal pa 'am 'on te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan rjod byed kyang // de dag bar du mya ngan 'das 'gyur gyi// bskal pa bye ba mang por rab brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes tshad rnyed mi 'gyur te// de ltar
317a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i ye shes ngo mtshar to// de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i rang bzhin ni// gang zhig nga'i tshig la yid ches de// rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod// brgya
317b1(dkon brtsegs): ma nan mi yi lus rnyed la// brgyal man ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// da dang shes rab yun ji rnyed par 'gyur// de bas don thob phyir brtson 'grus skyed// gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mos skyed pa// de dag 'das pa'i dus na nged dang bshes// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis
317b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnamal chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing / dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pas zag pa rnams las
317b4(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phraganyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha ha mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni/ sngon sems / 
317b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa las/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
317b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo bar byed do// de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang / mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu/ de bzhin
317b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes bya bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
317b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu
318a1(dkon brtsegs): smin par byas pa de dag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ sngon gyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// de'i tshe
318a2(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang kun tu snang ngo // me tog man nga ra ba dag kyang sa la pus
318a3(dkon brtsegs): mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// lha dang mi li sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par gyur to// 'og min rgyu gnas kyi bar du yang rjesu yi rang ngo zhes bya
318a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra grag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang // 
318a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu/ 
318a6(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa'i
318a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ lnga ba rdzogs/ bkra nas/ rig po/ sargyam dusam/ 
x1a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi/ ma rig pa med na/ 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur te/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang / 
x1a2(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha' mi rags pa dang / sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dashes pa dang / nang gi mi 'ashes pa dang / phyi mi shes pa dang / nang dang phyi mi shes pa dang / sdug bsngal mi 'ashes pa dang / kun 'byung ba mi 'ashes pa
x1a3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam mi shes pa ste/ de ltar rkyen mi shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba mi 'ashes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang / nag po
x1a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / dkar po dang / rkyen dang / rkyen ma yin pa dang / snang ba dang mi snang ba dang / kha na ma mtho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha nam mtho ba med pa dang / brten par bya ba dang / bsten par bya ba ma yin
x1a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams gang mi shes pa dang / mi mthong ba dang / mngon/ mi rtogs pa dang / khong du ma chung ba de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yang la byed pa yod na/ mi rig pa gang/ 
x1a6(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur gyi/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na/ ma rig pa bdags par 'gyur tegatshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam// 
x1a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa// 
x1a8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kur rtog pa las byung ba/ rkyer la rag las pa/ stobs med pa/ rkyen rnams las 'byung ba yin te/ rkyen med na/ chos rnams
x1b1(dkon brtsegs): gdags par mi 'gyur ro// khyim bdag chos thams cad ni brtags pa tsam ste 'di la lam chang ba mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par/ skye ba 'am/ rga ba 'am/ 'pho ba'am/ 'byung ba gang ya
x1b2(dkon brtsegs): mang ngo // khyim bdag rnams 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i mtsho chen po la nya gnas par gyur pa/ khyim bdag rnams de ji snyam du sems/ nya de dag ci zhig gi mthu/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom
x1b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chab kyi mthu'o// bde bar gshegs pa chab kyi mthu'o// de yi khyim bdag rnams ci chu de sems sam// de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags
x1b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag rnams de ltar chu sems pa me dpal ci'i stobs shig yod na// bcom ldan 'das stobs ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa rtobs chung ngo // bka' stsal
x1b5(dkon brtsegs): pa khyim bdag rnams de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag/ ba ma yin pa/ kun rtog pa las byung ba/ stobs med pa/ nyam chung ba rkyen rnams las 'byung ba ste/ rkyen
x1b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yod ma chos rnams bdags par 'gyur ro// khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni brtags pa tsam ste/ 'di la lam chang ba mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par/ skye ba 'am/ rgab 'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ 
x1b7(dkon brtsegs): 'pho ba 'am/ 'byung ba gang yang med do// khyim bdag khyed rnams de bas na/ rkyen de dag la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pa/ de'i tshe yid brtan du mi rung / yid brtan pa ma yin pas skrag par gyis
x1b8(dkon brtsegs): shig rnga skrag par gyur pa den 'bros par gyis shig/ chos gang las 'bros pa'i chos de gang zhes tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs shig/ tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa de na/ chos gang chos las 'bros pa'i chos pa
x2a1(dkon brtsegs): / ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod meng bar zhugs nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbe su bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi rangan 'dang
x2a2(dkon brtsegs): chags bya dab ma mang la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ ngang ga tshad sum brgya ba zhig yod par gyur la/ de yang nga nas 'dzam du'i gling 'dir 'ong bar sems te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na
x2a3(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'idi ji snyam du sems ci bya 'dang ma med pa des slar bdag nyid sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bzhags par nus snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
x2a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra ti'i bu yang gal te bya 'dab med pade de nas lhung bzhin du 'di snyadam du sems te/ kyem mal bdags smras ma snang bar 'dza m+bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na
x2a5(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci phy-i dang ma med pades smras ma/ snang bar 'ja bru'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/ de ni smras pa dang / 
x2a6(dkon brtsegs): snangad ngakhon la ng+gA'i gling du ltu ba ni 'gum pa 'am/ 'gul ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du nen/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phyagang yang rung bzhig lus che zhing 'dab sa ma mchis par
x2a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur la mngon po nig nas lhung ba de ni nga bzhin du 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/ shar dwa tI'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin/ shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang
x2a8(dkon brtsegs): zag gis skal bu mang po zhig tu sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan dag bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms su zin kyang / de shes rab
x3a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis sor 'phreng can la bka' stsal te/ khyod pa glang mo'i drung du song la 'jis
x3a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bdag gis ni mi yang mang du bkum na ji skad
x4a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na/ gos dag pa/ nag po dang bral ba/ tshon du bcug na myur du tshon 'dzin pa de bzhin du// khyim bdag lnga brgya bam po dngadagul// chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag
x4a2(dkon brtsegs): par brtan// yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te/ khyim bdag rnams mig kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/ 'dod
x4a3(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro// skye ba dang / rgab dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yang mi bde ba dang / 
x4a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrug pas kun tu 'bar te/ bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo/ zhes bshad do// khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi bar du kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar zhe
x4a5(dkon brtsegs): mang 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gis me dang / gti mu/ ga gi me dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pas kun
x4a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar te/ bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bshang ngo // khyim bdag rnams gzugs kun tu 'bar te/ cis kun tu 'bar te/ 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi sems
